Like humans! When we discovered your species, we were very interested in meeting you.”

That is an answer, but it doesn’t tell you enough. “But Enoa, why are my people interesting to you? What makes the Erimosi curious about us?”

“Mmm…” Enoa says slowly. “The Erimosi aren’t curious about everything like you, just very interested in very particular things. And some of those are things that humans definitely have, that you definitely have… it….” You look at Enoa attentively as she seems to be on the verge of telling you some kind of secret, but to your disappointment, she stops herself and changes the topic. “Actually, human… once we were aware of your arrival, some of the crew have been petitioning to be allowed to meet with you. While I cannot permit you to interact with large numbers of the crew, you could meet with an individual. If you are interested....”

“Actually, that’d be great!” you tell Enoa. “The Erimosi have done so much for us back on Earth. I’d like to meet someone outside of the Embassy. And if they really want to see me, I think that’s only fair.”

Enoa bows slightly as you walk. “You’re very kind. The petitioners held a lottery for just such a contingency. Under the circumstances, I can authorize a little time with the winner for you. She’s a young security officer named Balla. I can take you to her quarters.” You agree to Enoa’s suggestion amicably. While you were here for the Yathi, it wouldn’t hurt to spend some time with the crew. After all, they are taking time out of their duties to accommodate you. And if they really want to meet with you, who are you to say no? Still, it is a little strange that you’re being separated from them so much. And the fact that Enoa only agreed to let you meet with more of the crew when she was talking about something she was uncomfortable with. What was she about to say back then?

“Here we are.” Enoa says, stopping your train of thought. You were standing in front of a door, one of many in this hallway, another sign of how big this ship was. You idly wondered how many Erimosi were on this ship. “This is Balla’s quarters.” Enoa pressed a button at the wall, opening the door. Inside was an Erimosi in a red garment, again little more than a bikini covering her waistline and chest. If she were human, you’d put her around 20 years old, but you weren’t exactly sure how long lived Erimosi were, or long long they were children. “Balla, since you won the lottery I’m letting you meet. You can spend time with the human until your duty shift begins, and you are not to invite additional crew during that time. Agreed?”

Balla jumps up from her sitting position at her bed, grinning enthusiastically. “Agreed! Thank you, Enoa! Come in, human! Come in!” Balla calls to you energetically, grabbing your hand and bringing you into your quarters. You turn around to see Enoa bowing slightly as the doors automatically shut behind her.

Balla’s room is small, but comfortable enough for two people. The only place to sit is on Balla’s bed, against the far wall. She sits down there, and motions for you to join her. “This is so exciting, I actually get to meet the human!” Balls says gleefully.

“I still don’t understand why the Erimosi on this ship are all so interested in meeting with me. Is it because I’m the first human to travel into deep space?” you ask her curiously.

Balla leans in close to you, her face mere inches from yours. “I suppose there’s not point in hiding it from you now, human. Now that you’re here, what I really want is to…”
11233.title: Am I that distracting?

113.content:
"What's the story with these Kichi?" you ask Erin. She pulls up an image of a Kichi for you: and you were right about them reminding you of snakes. Below the waist, these creatures have a long, snake like tail with no arms or legs. Scales of a golden brown color cover this specimen. But above the waist, she appears almost human. She has what appears to be long black hair and a humanoid face, although the pointed ears, yellow-gold skin and vertical, reptilian eyes are out of the ordinary. Her torso is also human-like: she has a normal and attractive chest of a human woman, clothed in some kind of black wrap around her chest and shoulders in an "X" shape. Her body is somewhat elongated compared to a human, and it makes you notice her stretched out, smooth stomach and long narrow navel.

"Their homeworld of Kich is a hot, dry world dominated by reptilian-like life forms." Erin tells you. "The Kichi have acquired significant territory near human space, making them an important race to contact. But you need to be careful when dealing with them, the Erimosi have described their interactions with the Kichi as deceptive and deceitful. The Kichi are cunning and sly, using any means of flattery and trickery to achieve their goals. They are also not reluctant to lie or steal, and could be characterized as effectively amoral. Thankfully, the Kichi don't believe in violence, and can be considered more mercantile than militaristic.

"The most unique aspect of Kichi physiology are their eyes, which contain certain pulsating chromatophores capable of flickering faster than human or Erimosi eyes can detect. Simply by making eye contact, the Kichi are capable of sedating most sentient races into a hypnotic state, at which point you can guess how willing the Kichi are to take advantage. The Erimosi recommend using protective eye-wear whenever in close proximity to Kichi. The probability is high that their eyes will be quite effective on humans. However, the visor on your helmet is designed to prevent this effect, so I suggest you keep it on at all times."

Great, you think. Sneaky, amoral snake aliens that can hypnotize you to do their bidding. Why can't the galaxy have more friendly aliens in it? "Alright, so I'm supposed to keep my helmet on the whole time and not trust a word they say. Sounds like a ton of fun. How's this first contact supposed to be productive at all?"

"The Erimosi believe that if you can convince the Kichi that humans will not be easily manipulated, your two races can engage in productive dialogue, even trade. Kichi-Erimosi relations, while difficult, have evolved to this point, even helping each other on occassion. The Kichi are not a warlike people, and prefer to rely on cunning. If the first human they see is perceptive enough to see through their tricks, they might have a high opinion of humans in the future." Erin tells you logically. It does make sense, if you get pushed around by these people, they'll think all of humanity can be taken advantage of just as easily. You'll have to be careful as a representative of all Earthlings.

"Noted, Erin. So, where do we go to meet these Kichi?" you ask, starting to get an idea of how the mission will go.

"You do have some options." Erin elaborates. "First, you could be straightforward and travel to Kich. Your suit will protect you from the heat, and your helmet from Kichi eyes, as long as you keep both of them on. Second, the Kichi have colonized a world that produces a gas that, if inhaled by humans, produces… side effects. This offers a plausible excuse for you to keep your helmet on at all times. Finally, you could intercept a Kichi ship. Many Kichi vessels are one-person ships like this one, and it would give you the opportunity to meet with the species one on one. Which method do you prefer?"
113.title: Kichi

choices: Weaken human muscles, effectively paralyzing you
1132.content:
“I think the best thing to do would be to go to that Kichi colony.” You tell Erin. “That gives me a plausible excuse to keep my helmet and suit on all the time. I'd be protected from that hypnotic Kichi eyes and I could stay in close contact with you through the suit.”

“Yep!” Erin says happily. “And I'll be able to monitor your vital signs as long as you keep the suit on. Just don't let them take it off of you, then I won't be able to track any physical phenomena affecting you.” You hear the engines gearing up as Erin plots the coordinates. “So, the plan is heading to the Kichi colony of Resha Prime. I should let you know that its also home to one of the Kichi noble families. Merchant princess Ssuna of the Resha house is there, at least if she's not on vacation. If humanity can make one of the Kichi houses pro-human, it'd be a big victory for your species.”

You think about that fact. Pulling up information on the view screen, it looks like Kichi government is complicated and decentralized. These merchant princesses, rich heads of dynasties that hold entire planets and vast riches, are the closest thing their race has to leaders, and Kichi decisions are made by a vote of the five most powerful princesses. If you could make even one pro-human, it would be a big start to developing a good relationship with the Kichi species.

“Good to know, Erin. Set course for this Resha Prime, and engage when ready.” You tell your AI, who doesn't respond aside from beeping in what you assume is an affirmative. But before you have time to read any more about the Kichi or this Princess Ssuna, the warp drive engages and you are immediately disoriented by the jump to another system. You blink your eyes and try to focus, the strange experience of traveling faster than light taking a moment to wear off. When it does, you're looking at an alien world: One with fewer oceans and more deserts than Earth, but otherwise very similar. Instruments indicate gravity is slightly less than Earth standard, and the warning against breathing the air is also displayed.

Your screen fills with an image of a Kichi as the planet hails you. “Unknown alien vessel, you are in Kichi space, under the authority of the Resha Dynasty. Identify yourself immediately.”

You gulp, but realize that the question is a fair one. You did pop in unannounced. “Greetings, Kichi. I am a human of the planet Earth. We have been informed of your races existence by the Erimosi, and I have been sent to Resha Prime in order to establish peaceful relations with your people. If possible, I would like an audience with the Princess Ssuna.” You try to look authoritative and diplomatic, but in reality the whole thing makes you nervous.

But it looks like you don't need to be. The Kichi smiles back at you. “Interesting. It has been some time since the Kichi have encountered a new species, and we are honored that you have chosen Resha Prime as the location to contact the Kichi. Her serene eminence Princess Ssuna is residing in the palace, and I will see if she is available to meet with you. You are authorized to land at the Palace Spaceport, and an honor guard will be sent to greet you. I hope you enjoy your stay with us, human.” The Kichi tells you, and the view screen goes blank.

Erin sets the ship down where instructed, and before you notice, you've arrived on the Resha Prime. You exit the Swift Feather, making sure to keep your suit and helmet on and secured. As you do, you see four Kichi, presumably your honor guard. They are all women, and each holds what looks like a ceremonial staff in one hand, a long metal rod with a stiff feather on the end. These Kichi look a little different than the image on the ship: their scales on their lower halves are a crimson red instead of a pale gold, and the same goes for their eyes. They also seem a little taller. Perhaps this is a regional difference for this planet, or for memebers of the Resha house? Either way, it's something you note, as you look from one of the attractive female guards to the other.

“By the way, Erin...” you say into your helmet, in a way that the Kichi can't hear. “What 'side effects' does the air on this planet have on humans?”

“Oh, I forgot to tell you!” Erin says. “If you breath in the air here, there's a biological chemical here that will…
1132.title: Kichi colony Resha Prime

choices: You relent and remove the suit
You compromise and remove part of your suit
11321.content:
“The chemical here will make your skin extremely sensitive if you breathe it in,” Erin notifies you.

Although you are curious about why this is so bad, the honor guard approaches you before you can ask Erin anything. “Welcome to Resha Prime, human,” one of the Kichi guards announces. “We are here to take you to meet with Princess Ssuna in the throne room of the palace. Please come with us.”

You go quietly towards the palace, your honor guard surrounding you on all sides. Within a couple of minutes, you have arrived, and the guard takes you to the awe-capturing throne room. Looking around, you see several expensive jewels intermixed with feathers and trophies on the walls. A Kichi, whom you assume is Princess Ssuna, is leaning back on a couch on one side of a table, and a Kichi attendant appears to be tickling her bare belly with a feather as she laughs hysterically, causing you to think of this as a reason why extreme sensitivity could be bad for you. However, as you and the honor guard approach the table, the attendant ceases the tickling and leaves. The Kichi ruler calms down for a minute before getting up off her couch, standing tall to make her rank known. “Human, I present to you Merchant Princess Ssuna of the Resha Dynasty!”

“Thank you for having me here, Princess Ssuna,” you address the ruler.

“It is our honor to be the place where you first encounter the Kichi,” the princess responds. “However, since this is the first Kichi settlement that you have visited, my scientists will need to take some basic measurements on you.” You nod in affirmation, and two Kichi scientists come and take you to a wall. While one measures your height, the other one has you step on a scale to measure your weight. The scientists report their findings directly to Ssuna when they are done, departing the throne room afterwards. “Well, my scientists are finished with their measurements. It appears that you weight slightly less and are quite a bit shorter than a standard Kichi. Now that they are done, would you like to sit down and talk?”

“That would be appreciated,” you reply, and the two of you head to the table where Princess Ssuna was being tickled earlier. As the two of you sit down, two Kichi attendants come over to you, both wielding a couple of feathers.

“It is a tradition at the Resha Dynasty Palace that during first contact conversations, both species in the conversation get tickled with feathers,” Princess Ssuna proclaims. “It is a way of establishing common ground between different species, as well as getting both participants to smile and laugh. I must ask you to take off your suit for this; it will make the tickling much more enjoyable and… effective.”

Right away, you begin to worry about the effects removing your spacesuit would have on your sensitivity and consider whether to remove it or not. You think for a minute before deciding…
11321.title: Sensitive Skin

choices: “the honor guard will tickle you now.”
“what could humans offer the Kichi for business?”
113213.content:
“I cannot remove my entire spacesuit, or I would not be able to breathe,” you announce to Princess Ssuna, “but taking off part of it would not affect me.”

“Of course,” Princess Ssuna responds. “We want you to survive, but any skin that can be seen without harming you is optimal for tickling. Our favorite way to tickle and be tickled is on bare skin, and we would like you to share in this.”

“I would like to be able to share in your customs,” you affirm. “I am going to adjust the top of my spacesuit to expose my stomach for tickling.” You separate the top and bottom parts of your spacesuit, lifting the top up to show your bare belly. Once it is exposed, you and Ssuna both take a seat on the couches.

“Well, let’s get started,” the princess proclaims as her attendants move the feathers to your abdomen. “First up, HAHAHAHAHAW TIHIHIHIHICKLIHIHIHISH IHIHIS THEHEHE HUHUHUHMAHAN RAHAHAHACE?”

Before you can tell her, the Kichi attendant next to you begins dancing her feathers on your midriff. “HAHAHAHA!” you yell out. “THIHIHIHIS TIHIHIHICKLIHIHISH! HAHAHAHA!”

“GOHOHOHOHOD!” Princess Ssuna laughs. “AHAHAHAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAHAS YUHUHUHUHU CAHAHAHAN SEHEHEHEHEHE, THEHEHEHE KIHIHIHIHICHIHIHI AHAHARE AHAHAHALSOHOHOHO VEHEHEHEREHEHEHE TIHIHICKLIHIHISH! WHAHAHAT DOHOHOHOHO HUHUHUHUHMAHAHAHANS THIHIHINK OHOHOHOF TIHIHIHICKLIHIHING?”

“WEHEHEHE DOHOHOHON’T TIHIHIHIHICKLE VEHEHEREHEHE MUHUHUHUCH!” you burst out in even more laughter as the attendant probes your sensitive torso with the feathers. “IHIHIHI THIHIHIHINK IHIHIHITS FUHUHUN, THOHOHOHOHOH! WHEHEHERE AHAHARE KIHIHIHICHIHIHI MOHOHOHOHOST TIHIHIHICKLIHIHISH?”

“OHAHAHAHR TUHUHUHUHUMMEHEHEHES!” the princess manages to get through her laughter. “OHOHOHOHOHKAHAHAY STAHAHAHAHAP!” The feathers on your midsection slow down and then stop completely, and you struggle to catch your breath. Looking over, you see that your Kichi companion is in the same boat as you as she covers up her tickle spot. You both take a minute to recover from the intense tickling that you just went through. Once you are both ready to talk again, Princess Ssuna speaks up, “Human, I am impressed by your endurance. We both lasted through ten minutes of tickling, and you were going to undergo more had I not stopped my attendants. Most aliens do not stand up this long under intense tickling; I am surprised by my own stamina. Since I was not able to ask you before I gave in, where are humans most ticklish?”

“It depends on the human, but the clear majority are most ticklish on the stomach or feet,” you notify her. “Personally, I am more ticklish on my torso, but as I said, it varies from person to person.”

“That is very interesting,” Ssuna notes. “I would like to learn more about humans, so…
113213.title: A Ticklish Conversation

choices: “I would like you to tickle me.”
1132132.content:
“I am wondering what humans can offer the Kichi as far as business goes,” Ssuna questions. “As you probably know, the Kichi are very active in trade, and we are always looking to expand. What can humans offer us to have mutually beneficial trade?”

“I can’t guarantee this, but I’m guessing that when humans learn about all the tickling that goes on, tickling machines will become a big deal on Earth,” you notify the princess. “We currently do not have many of these, so the Kichi would definitely be able to begin to trade with us on that. As for what humans can offer to the Kichi, we have many unique food sources, as well as several different technologies that the Kichi might be interested in.”

“Interesting,” the merchant princess notes. “I would like to focus on the first part, where humans want to buy Kichi tickling machines. Do you think that some humans would like to be hired as test subjects, with a large salary of course, for the tickling machines?”

“I’m sure that some humans would do that,” you respond, “but I’m not sure how many would. It really depends on how they are presented to the human population.”

“That sounds like a good foundation,” Ssuna proclaims. “I am glad that humans and Kichi will be able to establish good relations, starting here. I will promote the human welfare in the Kichi culture. Now that you have given me good cause to work with humans, I believe it is time for us to have some fun. Accordingly, …
1132132.title: Down to Business

11321321.content:
“I would like you to tickle me,” Ssuna declares, causing you to put on a quizzical look.

“You want me to tickle you?” you question, trying to make sure you heard her right.

“Yes, I do,” she states matter-of-factly before realizing why you were confused. “Oh, I almost forgot that this is very unusual for you. In Kichi culture, it is just an honor to be tickled. Since we are very ticklish, but we love tickling, we are sometimes honored by getting tickled on our bellies or armpits. Oh, I have an example. Remember how we were both tickled to begin the talks. That was a tradition rooted in establishing the honor of both myself and you. Having the representative of another species tickle the royalty is another tradition rooted in honor. Of course, if you do not like to tickle, we can pass this one by, and I will not hold it against you.”

“Oh, I’m happy to be the tickler; I just wasn’t quite expecting this,” you announce. “I’d be happy to participate in your tradition.”

“Wonderful!” the Kichi princess proclaims. “Attendants, can you put me back on the couch, and restrain me this time?” The attendants rush over to their princess and take her to the couch she had been getting tickled on when you walked in, quickly tying her down. “Now, human, don’t go easy on me because I’m royalty. I really enjoy being tickled and testing how much I can take. However, if I say ‘scales’, that is when you need to stop because I’m getting exhausted. No one that I’ve been tickled by has gotten me to say that, though. Take it as a challenge.”

You smile and walk over to the bound princess, eyeing her attractive, stretched out body. Soon enough, you get down to business, beginning to tickle the exposed stomach of your target. “Tickle, tickle, Princess Ssuna!”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” she quickly breaks out into hysterical laughter. “THAHAHAHAHAT REHEHEHEHELY TIHIHIHICKLEHEHES!”

“Well, of course it does, princess,” you tease your ticklee, two minutes into the tickling. “It’s supposed to tickle.”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Princess Ssuna continues laughing uncontrollably as a couple of your fingers find her bellybutton and stick inside it. “NAHAHAHAT THEHEHERE! AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Although you are initially unsure of what to do, you continue tickling her navel, remembering that she told you not to go easy on her. The other hand continues finding tickle spots across her midriff as you torture her most ticklish spot. “OHOHOHOHOHOHO AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Princess Ssuna lasts about four minutes and fifty-one seconds after this, and then she screams out, “HAHAHA SCAHAHAHAHALES!” Hearing the safeword, you immediately stop, and the princess’s attendants rush over to release her. She brings her arms down as she tries to catch her breath. After a few minutes, Ssuna catches her breath and looks up at you. “Wow! I can’t believe you actually got me to say the safeword. As I said before, no one ever has gotten me to say it, even my royal ticklers, in double the time that you made me give in. That is really impressive. Thank you! That was the most fun I’ve had in a long time.”

“You are very welcome, Princess Ssuna,” you respond. “I also had a lot of fun tickling you.”

“Well, this incredible skill you just displayed has given me some ideas I think you will like for after the ceremonies are all done,” Ssuna declares. “However, we still have some formal ceremonial activities to complete. After tickling a royal Kichi, you must be tickled by…”
11321321.title: Tickling a Princess

113213212.content:
“the honor guard,” Ssuna continues. “As much as I would like to be the one honoring you with a good tickling, tradition dictates that it must be the honor guard who tickles you first. However, I still hope that I can get my fingers on that bare belly of yours for a good tickling later. By the way, you will need to expose that ticklish tummy of yours again, and we will need to bind you to the couch. Like me, you will be tickled for a maximum of fifteen minutes, although you can end the tickling by uttering a safeword that you will pick out. What do you want for your safeword?”

“I’ll take the word ‘Gold’,” you declare as you pull your spacesuit up. “So, what exactly do I need to do?”

“I’ll let Sashes answer that question,” Princess Ssuna gestures to one of the guards.

“Just lie down on the table,” the Kichi honor guard speaks for the first time. “We will restrain your wrists and then begin the ceremonial tickling.” You do as the guard orders, and soon one of the attendants restrains your wrists, leaving your upper body vulnerable. “Remember that you can say your safeword at any time, and we will stop tickling. Otherwise, we will be tickling your stomach with our feather staffs. Are you ready?”

You nod for the honor guard to begin the tickling, and within a few seconds, four feathers begin tickling your bare belly. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you cannot contain your laughter as the feathers traverse your ticklish torso. “OHOHOHOHO MYHYHYHYHY!” You squirm around a little, but your restraints prevent you from escaping the feathers, which are finding more and more ticklish spots on your midriff. When a feather creeps into your navel, you find yourself emanating the same behavior as Princess Ssuna, screaming for the tickling to stop. “OHOHOHO PLEHEHEHEHESE NAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHEHERE! AHAHAHAHA! PLEHEHEHESE! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Your squirming becomes slightly more intense, but you manage to hold off saying the safeword as the feather continues to tickle your bellybutton and the others traverse your tummy. After five minutes, your pleading dies out, as you run out of energy to do anything but just laugh. “AHAHAHAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Seeing this, the honor guard slows down their feathers a little, although they keep them on your most ticklish spot. However, after going into pure laughter, you get a new determination not to beg, even though you really cannot stand the tickle torture you are being put through. The Kichi seem to notice the newfound determination and continue fluttering their feathers across your abdomen. You continue to resist the urge to yell out the safeword as your midsection is relentlessly feathered, and after fifteen minutes, the tickling stops, leaving you collapsed on the couch. Quickly, the princess’s assistants rush over and untie you as you breathe heavily.

Princess Ssuna walks over and sits next to you, observing your behavior carefully as you recover from the honor tickling. Right as you begin to breathe normally again, she questions, “Human, how are you feeling?”

“That tickled a ton,” is the only thing you are able to think of as you sit up, next to the princess.

“Well, that’s kind of the point,” she smiles. “Are you alright?”

“Yes,” you affirm. “I’ll be fine, just a little tired.”

“I guess the good news is that the official introduction ceremony is finished now,” Princess Ssuna proclaims. “I will have to say that I am amazed at your resilience with that tickling the honor guard was giving you. Most aliens would have given up very quickly with a feather staff in their bellybutton, but you managed to persist through it. Because of this, I will support humans in the Kichi government. I will be honored to establish peaceful relations with humans. On another note, I have a proposal specifically for you based on your endurance and your skill when you tickled me. I do not want an answer now, but I would like to offer you a position as one of my royal ticklers. We will give you a tour of the royal ticklers’ quarters and responsibilities, as well as what you would expect if you choose to accept, later, but your skill has impressed me very much. Right now, though, Sashes and the remainder of the honor guard will take you to our best guest room for the night. I will meet up again with you in the morning.”

“Thank you, Princess Ssuna,” you respond. “I am very happy that we will have peaceful relations between our two species, and I will consider your offer as I get more information.”

“Please come with us,” Sashes instructs you. You follow the honor guard to a large room. It has a fairly large bed, as well as a couch, a few chairs, and a pole, which you guess is used for tickling willing guests. “This will be your room for at least this night. We will be in the adjacent rooms if you need anything. Is there anything you would like right now?”

“This may sound weird or normal, but can I tickle you?” you wonder.

The Kichi guard breaks out into a wide smile. “Of course, human,” she eagerly answers. “I love being tickled, and you don’t know how long I’ve been waiting for a good tickling. Where do you want me to be tied?”
113213212.title: Honor Tickling

choices: Tickle machines you’ve never used before
1132132122.content:
“How about the pole?” you ask Sashes.

“A wonderful choice,” she compliments before calling over another guard. “Veseli, can you tie me to this pole for some tickling from the human?” The other guard quickly comes over and restrains the head guard’s arms high up on the pole and her tail near the bottom of the pole, leaving her stretched out. “Human, there are tools in the closet if you would like to use them. Otherwise, you may tickle when ready.”

“I have a question first,” you address her. “Where is your most ticklish spot?”

“My most ticklish spot is my belly, although much of the rest of my body is also very ticklish,” she answers.

“I suppose that is expected,” you remember Princess Ssuna confessing this under tickling. You wiggle your fingers as you move towards the Kichi guard. “Tickle, tickle, tickle.”

When your fingers hit Sashes’ stomach, she breaks out into laughter, “OHOHOHOHOHO! THAHAHAHAHAHAT TIHIHIHIHIHCKLEHEHES SOHOHOHOHOHO MUHUHUHUCH! KEHEHEHEHEHEP GOHOHOHOHOING!” You continue to dance your fingers on her ticklish tummy for a few minutes before momentarily pausing. “OHOHOHOHO!” she keeps laughing for another minute, and then she addresses you. “Why’d you stop?”

“I like tickling with my fingers, but I was wondering if there are any tools around that I could use on you,” you proclaim.

“Of course,” she answers. “Look in that closet. There should be several feathers, as well as brushes and my own personal favorite, tickle stimulators.”

You go to the closet indicated and open it, revealing an array of tickle tools. After standing in awe of it for a few minutes, you decide to tickle Sashes with…
1132132122.title: Pole Tickling

choices: You hear her call you to board her ship.
She's hostile, and runs into your ship!
Another ship links up with both your ships!
1133.content:
"Hmm... Intercepting a Kichi ship... Sounds dangerous and fun! I think I'm up for that!" You exclaim to Erin, excited for what the next step might be.

"Okay, we just have to find one, and we can start making contact." Erin cheerfully responded, all her systems beginning to boot up. After a few seconds, you hear the loud roaring of the thrusters and engines, as you feel the whole craft starting to move forward. The ship quickly gained speed, before achieving lift and getting off ground. "Ok, now I just have to configure a few key systems in here... If you'll just sit tight, we'll be in space in just a few more minutes..." You AI says, as you see a screen to your right flashing with numbers, some you recognize as the altitude and longitude. You comfortably lean back in your seat, just looking at the blue sky and clouds as your ship climbed even higher and higher.

After some time, you see blackness all around you, along with some glittering lights dotted around randomly. You were in space! "Ok Erin, now do you have any ideas on how do we find a Kichi ship?" You ask her, unsure of how to actually find one to intercept. "Well lucky for you, my careless little pilot, my sensors have picked up a ship that is close by us, with signs telling us that it is a Kichi craft." Your AI quickly says, obviously also excited to explore who was inside this new craft. "I'll set us up for a course to intercept. ETA in 3 minutes..."

The Swift Feather triggers its warp engines, and Erin blasts you to the coordinates of the Kichi ship like a bullet being shot from a rifle. The effect is disorienting, but by the time you've adjusted you see the Kichi ship growing larger in your viewscreen. As your own spacecraft flies in closer to the Kichi ship, you see the other spacecraft slow down, almost beckoning you to board it. Both of your ships quickly link up, as a button on your panel lights up, indicating that both of your ships were linked up, and ready to be boarded. As you get ready to board, you remember Erin's warnings, and quickly checked whether your helmet was put on tight. After a few seconds, you get ready to board her ship to greet the Kichi when...
1133.title: Find a Kichi ship

11331.content:
"Why hello there, whoever is on the other ship. I hope that you aren't hostile. If you would, kindly meet me in my ship, we can talk about why you wanted to link up your ship with mine." You heard the sultry voice over your own radio, coming from the other ship. You give an audible gulp, as you you cross the bridge linking both of your ships. You wonder what sort of people the Kichi are like. Would they be hostile towards you? Shy away from you? Or maybe take a liking to you? As you finally cross over to her ship, you notice that the interior of the ship is quite small. In fact, if you had to guess, this ship could only hold one passenger, albeit that one Kichi you heard over the intercom.


Walking in awe of this new ship, you didn't realize that you were finally at the airlock of the Kichi's ship. As you wait for the airlock to open to allow you permission inside the Kichi's ship, you heard a voice over the speaker's in the airlock.

"Ohh, it seems that my visitor is a "human", hmm? Well, I heard that your species just recently achieved interstellar transportation. Congratulations on that! Now, before you come over to my ship to discuss business, I need to dis-infect you. You know, you might be carrying space germs for all I know. Now, if you would kindly take off that suit of yours, we can start the dis-infection process." You nod, seeing logic in her statement. As you start to step out of your space suit, leaving your in your shirt and long pants, you notice the doors to your ship silently close behind you. "Ohh, I almost forgot. Please take off your shoes too. The dis-infection machine needs to be very thorough to clean everything." Nodding, you quickly take off your shoes, and place them next to your space suit.

"Okay, let's begin the dis-infection process!" You hear somewhat of an excited tone in the Kichi's voice, as you begin to wonder why was she so eager about this "dis-infection". Your answer came soon, as two metals hands grabbed at your wrists, pulling them over your head. You see a hole open up in the walls of the airlock, as a appendage with what looks like a rotating brush on it's end slowly crept towards you. "Ohh human, I think you're going to have a giggle of this..." You hear the Kichi say, before the intercom clicks off. As you struggle, the appendage slowly crept up in your shirt, until it was at your underarms. You stifle a giggle, feeling the ticklish bristles make slight contact. However, as soon as the brush started to whirl and rotate, you burst out giggling, surprise at how ticklish the brush was.

"Hhehehehheeey! Leheheheeet meehhehee gooohoohooo! Theehehee brushes! It tehehehheeeckles!" You manage to splutter amidst your frantic giggling.

"Why of course it does. This is the dis-infection process, you ticklish human! Just hang on for a few more minutes, the brushes will clean everything off you. And by everything, I truly mean everything." You hear the Kichi says impishly, the ticklish sensations making it hard to hear her over your own giggling.

As you start to control your giggles again, you start to see multiple slots pop open in the airlock, as more of those whirling brushes came out, attached to long metal tubes. The brushes quickly went to work, another one joining in the 'cleaning' of your underarms. Another brush quickly rotates at your belly, making you burst into a long stream of belly-aching laughter, as another zips down the rim of your pants, bristles tickling your sensitive inner thighs. Lastly, another two brushes went to town on your tootsies, cleaning your arches and soles with tickly bristles.

"STAHAHAHAAAP! I CAAHAHAHAAN'T TAHAHAHAHAKE IT! PLEEHEHEHHEASE! NOOHOHOHOOH MOHOOOHOOORE! HAHAHHAHHAAA! IT TEEHHEHEECKLES SOOHOHOHOHOOHO MUCH!" You snort and chuckle in bouts of giggles and laughter, your whole body struggling to escape the metal clamps. Finally, when you thought you were going to pass out, the brushes slowly retracted in their sockets, and the clamps release you down on the floor, giving you a much deserved rest.

"Well human, you didn't do too bad, I guess. Why, you did quite good for a..."
11331.title: You hear her call you to board her ship.

113311.content:
“male human. Please come inside, and we can talk. I’ll be in the room to the right of where you will come out of the airlock.” You slowly walk out of the airlock, freed from the robotic hands. As you turn right, you see the Kichi sitting on what appeared to be a beanbag at a table.

“Please come sit down,” she states, gesturing towards a beanbag on the other side of the table. You sit down, and she continues speaking. “So, this is what a human looks like. Very interesting. I heard that you have only met the Erimosi so far. We are glad to finally meet up with your species. From the Erimosi, we have learned that you are a very ticklish species, and I have confirmed that with the cleaning. So, human, you have done fairly well at the first test for being so ticklish. Let’s get down to business, though. Where are you most ticklish?”

Remembering Erin’s advice about the Kichi’s perceptions based on manipulation, you decide to negotiate and try to manipulate the Kichi herself. “I’m afraid I can’t tell you that, unless you are willing to make some exchanges with humans.”

“What kind of exchanges?” the Kichi asked, seeming curious.

“First and foremost, I must be guaranteed safe passage from this ship back to my own when we depart,” you begin the negotiations. “Secondly, when you return to your home planet, the human race is to be respected as a fellow species in the galaxy. Thirdly, I will need to know your most ticklish spot. Fourthly, I will need to tickle you and be able to tell the human race how ticklish the Kichi are. For this, you will need to return to my ship so we can get proper measurements. With the tickling, we must make sure that no one gets exhausted, so five Earth minutes is the maximum time for a session of tickling. My watch will beep when the tickling should stop. Lastly, you must tickle me on my ship, as to assure me that I will be respected as a fellow species. How does that sound to you?”

“I think we might be able to make this work,” she answers, “but before we go back to your ship, I will need to be able to tickle you here to finalize the measurements on the ticklishness of humans. I must also be tickled here before we go back to your ship so that I can be guaranteed, as you say, to be ‘respected as a fellow species’. Following this, we can go to your ship and perform the experiments there. Also, as you said first, I will need to be guaranteed safe passage from your ship back to mine prior to departure so that we can both go free. Finally, the Kichi have advanced in science, and I received an operation that allows me to endure more tickling than normal, so I can stand double the normal tickling. If you want, you can tickle me for ten Earth minutes. Are these conditions agreeable?”
113311.title: Male human.

1133111.content:
“Those conditions can work,” you affirm.

“Follow me,” the Kichi instructs. “We will go to the experiment room, where all of the measuring equipment is.”

The two of you slowly walk to the experiment room, and on the way, you see several feathery tools along the walls, mixed in with all lengths of feathers. “What exactly does a Kichi do on one of these spaceships?” you wonder.

“Various things,” the Kichi replies. “I usually just travel from world to world for work, but when I do not have anything to do, I just allow my ship to float free in space. The universe is marvelous when you can observe it in its natural beauty without having to worry about what you must do next.” She pauses as the two of you look outside, and then continues on her way. “Ah. Here it is.”

The two of you enter the experiment room, where all sorts of furniture and bondage cover the majority of the area. Wherever there is not furniture or bondage, you notice multiple kinds of tickle tools, scattered in no apparent order. Your host hurries to start picking up the tools, unintentionally allowing herself to be tickled some as she cleans. “I apologize for the mess. It has been a while since I have had a visitor. Also, do not be concerned about the bondage. Sometimes that comes in handy for work, but your terms will prevent me from using it.” At this point, she has created a path where you can walk without being guaranteed a tickle torture. “I will tickle you first, and then I will tell you my most ticklish spot and you can tickle me. Now, your most ticklish spot?”
1133111.title: Deal

11331111.content:
“My belly is by far my ticklish spot,” you reveal to the Kichi.

“Well, come over and lay down here,” she instructs. “I apologize for not doing this sooner, but I should have introduced myself. My name is Marilu.” You walk over to Marilu and lie down on the table she stands next to, which is surprisingly comfortable. “Please raise your hands up a little bit. It will make the tickling much easier.” As you raise your hands above your head, Marilu grabs some wires from equipment nearby you and uses tape to attach them to your arms. “These will be used to measure your sensitivity. You can start your timer now.”

Marilu leans down and begins moving her fingers over your stomach, causing you to break out in squirming and laughter. “AHAHAHA!” Liking your reaction, Marilu wiggles her fingers all over your ticklish tummy, looking for weak spots. It only takes a minute for your resistance to fully crumble, and you bring your arms down to try and protect yourself. However, by this time, Marilu is prepared, and she moves her fingers around so that your hands cannot protect you. She tickles all around your sides for one of the minutes, and when you try and defend this, Marilu goes back into the center of your abdomen. As you squirm to try and get away, the Kichi easily manipulates your movements to keep you safe on the table while remaining a very ticklish mess. Marilu reaches your bellybutton at around three minutes in, and you break down even more, squirming even more and laughing harder. “NAHAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHRE!” Your hands dart in to try and protect the sensitive spot, and the Kichi begins wiggling her fingers in there faster, causing you to yell and scream for mercy. “PLEHEHEHEASE! NOHOHOHOHO!” Unfazed by your resistance, Marilu simply pushes your weak hands out of the way as she tickles out to the sides again. She quickly goes lower, and just as she reaches the bottom of your midriff, the Kichi pulls up the top of your spacesuit, revealing your bare belly. With all the newly exposed skin, Marilu uses a new tactic for the last minute of your tickle torture. She bends down and sticks her tongue out, rolling it all around your bellybutton. At the same time, Marilu uses her hands to continue and tickle your sides and the rest of your tummy. This new tickling method leaves you rolling over in laughter, and you are completely unable to protect yourself. “HAHAHA! I CAHAHAN’T TAHAHAHAKE IHIHIT!” Once the minute is finally up, your timer beeps loudly, and the Kichi gives up her tickling effort.

“You did very well, human,” Marilu declares as she takes the sensors off you. “The machine is indicating that your species is at the top of the charts in terms of ticklishness. I am surprised that you were able to stand that much tickling. You are not as weak as I thought you might be. Well, I should keep my promise, so you may tickle me here. You can use the machines here, or we can just wait until we get to your ship to use your measuring devices. My most ticklish spot is my…”
11331111.title: Your Ticklish Belly

choices: “Sorry, but I really need your ticklishness measurements.”
113311111.content:
“My most ticklish spot is also my belly,” Marilu reveals as you get up from the table. “Do you want to use my machines or wait until we get to your ship?”

“I’ll wait until we get back to my ship,” you decide. “Please lay down on the table.” The Kichi does what you request, raising her own hands above her head and exposing her entire body to you.

“Go ahead; you can tickle me for ten minutes,” she allows. You nod and bend down, reaching your fingers to Marilu’s bare stomach. When they make contact with the Kichi, a stream of giggles immediately escapes her mouth. “HEHEHEHEHE!” Soon enough, however, you upgrade the tickling to a full wiggling on your ticklee’s tummy, searching it for the most ticklish spot. Her sides are not very ticklish, so you go in towards the middle, and her response increases to full laughing. “HAHAHAHA! THAHAHAT TIHIHICKLES!” Enjoying being in control of the tickling, you wiggle your fingers a little harder against Marilu, and she starts to squirm a little bit, although she manages to keep her arms up. You tickle like this until four minutes of the tickle session have passed, and then you decide to test her resolve, and you go into the Kichi’s bellybutton. “NOHOHOHO!” Marilu explodes in laughter, clenching her fists and wiggling from side to side. Observing that this is clearly the Kichi’s most ticklish spot, you decide to give her a taste of her last method of tickling: mouth tickling. You blow a raspberry on Marilu’s navel at five minutes, and her arms shoot right to her head, but she is able to stop them there. “HAHAHAHAHA! AHAHANYHEHEHETHIHIHING EHEHEHELSE!” Noticing the effectiveness of the tickle method, you keep blowing the zerberts on the Kichi. You combine this with your fingers tickling the front of Marilu’s midriff to tickle torture the Kichi for the remainder of the tickle session. Nevertheless, when your timer beeps to show that ten minutes have come, you cease the tickle torment. Marilu continues to laugh for another minute following the tickle session, and then she sits up.

Once Marilu has recovered, you change the subject to another question you had. “Earlier, you said that you usually travel from world to world in this ship looking for work,” you announce.

“Yes, that is what I usually do,” Marilu confirms.

“What kind of work do you usually get?” you inquire. “I was curious.”

“I am hired by different companies to tickle people for information,” she discloses. “The company hires someone to kidnap the person, and the kidnapper brings them to my ship. I tickle them in this room until they divulge what the company wants, and then I turn them over to the company.”

“So you tickle interrogate different aliens?” you wonder.

“Yes,” Marilu affirms. “It is a very lucrative job. That’s why there is so much bondage in this room and so many tickle tools here. Different species require different tools and different spots to get them to talk. However, my favorite species to tickle is my own. I always try to get the interrogation job when someone needs something from a Kichi. Most Kichi, like me, are very ticklish on their bellies, so I tie them to that torture frame.” She walks over to a bondage device that would restrain the victim in a Y position. Once she is there, the Kichi pulls several parts of the frame right outside where the ticklee’s stomach would be, and you realize that these can hold different tools. She moves them to position the supposed tickle tools right at the ticklee’s abdomen, and then Marilu presses a button beside the machine, causing the different tickle tool holders to move in random patterns. “As you can see, I can place tickle tools in the holders and bring them out to touch my ticklee’s tummy. There are about twenty holders here, and all of the feathers and other tools you saw around here are fitted so they can be held in these. When I press the button, all the tools will start to rotate and tickle torture the entire midriff. Then, it is only a matter of time before the ticklee gives me the information that I want to know. What do you think?”

“That would tickle quite a bit,” you proclaim as you look at the tickle holders moving around.

“Would you like to try it out for a few minutes?” Marilu offers. “I can stick some feathers and dusters in the holders, and you could get in the machine. I know it would be a break from our original agreement, but I will still make sure you get out and back safely onto your ship. You will get a safe word, and when you say it, I’ll stop the machine. After that, you can choose tools and put me in the machine until I say the safe word. You would have to pull up your suit to expose your midsection to me, though. All of my tickle tools only work on bare skin. Also, I will adjust the restraints so they will fit you. Most Kichi are taller than you, so unless I adjust it, they wouldn’t restrain you. When you are finished, I will put them back for me. What do you think?”
113311111.title: A Kichi's Belly

choices: But keeps you in the machine
1133111111.content:
“Sure, I’ll take a turn in the machine,” you decide.

“Good,” Marilu proclaims. “Grab a combination of twenty feathers and feather tools that you would like to be tickled with. I’ll adjust the restraints so you can be held in here.” You nod and go around to the tickle tools that the Kichi somewhat organized when you entered. When you head back to Marilu, you have picked a combination of five long feathers, three feather dusters, ten short feathers, and two feather drills. “Hand me those, please. Also, please place your feet through the bottom restraint and then your arms through the top holes.” The Kichi sets the tools down while she locks you in the restraints, and then she pulls out the holders and places everything in them. Once this is done, she raises your suit to expose your tickle spot, and then she moves the holders so all of the tools are just touching your tummy, making you let out a little giggle when they hit. “Your safe word is ‘Prison’. When you say it, the tickling will stop. Got it?” You nod in affirmation, and she continues, “Alright. It’s time to start!”

All at once, you feel every tickle tool that you had placed on the machine start to shift around your midriff, and you break out in hysterical laughter. “HAHAHAHAHA!” you laugh as you try to alter your position. However, the chains are so tight that you cannot even squirm an inch, and you soon realize that you are going to be tortured until you give Marilu the safe word. As all of the feathers move across your most ticklish spot, you feel the urge to say the safe word, but you want to prove yourself to the Kichi. You end up lasting for eight minutes and twenty-five seconds before you yell out, “PRIHIHISOHOHON!” Hearing the safe word through your laughter, Marilu stops the tickling…
1133111111.title: In the Tickle Machine

11331111111.content:
Marilu moves all of the holders away from your exposed abdomen, and soon the chains holding you to the machine release, letting you go. “You lasted for around eight and a half minutes,” she announces as you pull your spacesuit down to cover your midsection. “I’m very impressed at your endurance; I was expecting you to give in before five minutes passed. It will be my turn in the machine once I put the restraints back to normal. While I am doing this, can you get seventeen more feather dusters? I want to be tickled by all dusters.” You comply with her request, setting the dusters down on the table by the machine as the chains are adjusted. Once everything is back to normal, the Kichi removes all of the tickle tools except the three dusters from the holders and replaces them with the new feather dusters. “That black button tightens and loosens the restraints. When I am in, move all the holders to my stomach, and the red button starts and stops the tickling. My safe word will also be ‘Prison’. I’ll get into position, and then you can lock me in.”

At this, Marilu quickly positions her body so the chains will go over her, followed by you pressing the black button and locking her wrists and tail. With a tied up prisoner, you move all of the holders so the feather dusters are touching all over the Kichi’s bare belly. You head back to the edge of the tickle machine and press the red button, initiating the tickle torture. As the feather dusters randomly pick patterns to take over the ticklish tummy, Marilu leans her head back and breaks out in high-pitched laughter. “HAHAHA IHIHIT TIHIHICKLEHEHES! HAHAHAHA!” Your ticklee is soon violently attempting to squirm away from her own interrogation methods, but the restraints secure her in place. Following six minutes, the Kichi begins begging for the tickling to stop. “PLEHEHEHESE! MAHAHAKE IHIHIT STAHAHAP! NOHOHOHO MOHOHORE!” Nevertheless, you do not acknowledge these protests, as she has not uttered the safe word. Finally, at seven minutes and forty-eight seconds, Marilu screams out, “PRHIHIHIHIHIHIHSOHOHON!” Recognizing the safe word though the hysterical laughter, you press the red button again, and the tickle torture stops. You take all of the holders away from the Kichi’s midriff, and then you free her by pressing the black button. “How long did I last?”

“Seven minutes forty-eight seconds,” you notify her.

“So I lasted a little bit less than you,” she comments. “Well, I guess you did very well then. It usually takes around fifteen minutes for the average Kichi to divulge all of the information that I interrogate them for. Of course, I typically put tools in only half the holders for interrogations, so we did remarkably well, you exceptionally so. Let’s head back to your ship and get finished with the business of the first contact now.”

You nod your head, and the two of you cross over into your ship. Who gets tickled first?
11331111111.title: Marilu's Turn

choices: Is in the bar above the table
113311111111.content:
“I’ll get tickled first again,” you announce to Marilu as the two of you enter the scientific room of your ship. You walk over to a table and start to lie down when the Kichi speaks.

“Can I please get a chair over here?” she requests.

“Sure,” you oblige, retrieving a chair to set by the table. “Anything else?”

“One more thing,” she responds. “I would like your spacesuit up like in the tickle machine to make this a little easier.” You pull up the suit to show your midsection, and your guest indicates that is all she wants. Since she is now content with the situation, you lie down and hold onto a bar above your head. This is so that you are less likely to try and defend yourself from the tickling. Once you are on the table, Marilu sits in the chair and brings her tail up to the table. “You can start your timer now.”

You turn the timer on, and the tip of the tail begins wiggling against your right side. As it tickles a little, you giggle a bit and shift towards your left side, but you still hold on to the bar. “HEHEHE! THAHAT TIHIHICKLEHES!” The tip keeps wriggling for half a minute, and then Marilu moves it above your midriff to your left side. Suddenly, the tickling resumes on your other side, and you travel back towards the Kichi, beginning to laugh. “HEHEHEHE! HAHAHAH!” Her tip tickles this side for the remainder of the first minute of your time, and then it ceases again. Slowly, the tail comes up your ticklish tummy, oscillating between the top and bottom of your stomach as it travels towards your right side to keep you laughing. The tail suddenly stops at the tip enters your bare bellybutton, at which point it twists rapidly inside the cavity. You burst out in hyper-ticklish laughter as you violently squirm to get out of the tickle torture. “NOHOHOHO! HAHAHAHA! STAHAHAHAP! PLEHEHEHESE!” It takes all of your effort to keep your fingers wrapped around the bar above your head as the tip of Marilu’s tail tickle torments your navel. Refusing to escape, you allow the tail tip’s tickle torture to go on for the rest of the time you are obliged to be tickled. When your five minutes are up, the Kichi removes her tail from your bare belly, and you get up after recovering.

“Erin, where can I get the equipment to measure ticklishness?” you ask your computer. She informs you that the equipment…
113311111111.title: You

1133111111112.content:
“The equipment is in the bar above the table you were just tickled on,” Erin notifies you. “In order to get an accurate measurement, the ticklee must be touching the bar all the time while being tickled.”

Marilu lies down on the table, and then you ask her, “Is it alright if I tape your wrists to the bar to make sure we get an accurate measurement?” Since the two of you have been very trustworthy with each other so far, the Kichi immediately allows this. You retrieve some tape from a drawer by the table and secure her wrists to the bar.

Once your ticklee is bound, Erin speaks up again. “Would you like me to conduct the tickle test?” she questions.

“You can do that?” you wonder in surprise.

“Of course,” Erin responds. “That is a tickle table, after all. As well as the ticklishness measuring equipment, I have plenty of tickling devices available there to conduct tests. A measurement can be taken with just the subject in the room; no other people are needed.”

You look at Marilu, who seems unopposed to Erin doing the test, so you state, “Yes, Erin, you can do the test. Tickle her bare belly for ten minutes.”

“Will do, sir,” the computer confirms. With that, another strap goes across the ticklee’s tail, making it so she cannot move side to side anymore. Four hands come out from the side of the table and travel straight to the Kichi’s midriff, beginning to tickle all over it. “Kitchy Kitchy Koo!”

While two of the four hands tickle her bare sides, the other two are occupied with wiggling over the front of Marilu’s ticklish tummy, and the reaction is instant. “HAHAHA NOHOHO! IHIHIT TIHIHICKLEHES TOHOHOHOHO MUHUHUHUCH!” she cries out in hysterical laughter as she fails to escape the tickling. After two minutes, a two-fingered hand emerges from the right side and travels straight into the Kichi’s long bellybutton. Both of the fingers fit in comfortably, and they start sliding back and forth, covering the full length of the most ticklish spot. Unable to do anything, Marilu’s laughter and pleas increase a couple of octaves. “PLEHEHEASE! NAHAHAHAHAT THAHAHAHAT! STAHAHAHAP! IHIHIHIHILL DOHOHOHOHOHO AHAHANYTHIHIHING!” You sit back in the chair that you had brought over, enjoying seeing the Kichi go through the computer tickle test. After nine minutes, though, the tickling slows down and stops on time. All of the hands retract back to their original positions, but the ticklee is still laughing from the aftereffects of the test.

As Marilu’s laughter dies down, you ask Erin, “What was her ticklishness? I’m also going to need some context on the measurement.”

“The Kichi had a measurement of 88760 guwaks,” Erin announces. “The guwak scale goes from one to one hundred thousand guwaks, with one being not very ticklish and ten thousand being the most ticklish possible. One guwak means that you will burn one calorie in a week of tickling. I also measured your ticklishness, and you were at 95000 guwaks on your stomach. Both of you are very ticklish there, if you ask me.”

At this, you look back at Marilu, who is still bound, and think about how ticklish she is. It wouldn’t really be breaking the promise if you kept her in there a little longer and tickled her a little more after giving her a break, would it? Then again, maybe you should let her go right away. You eventually decide to…
1133111111112.title: The Tickle Test

choices: “I know some Kichi that would like your tickling.”
11331111111121.content:
You eventually come to the conclusion that such a ticklish tummy must be tickled some more. It makes sense, since the Kichi is tied to a tickle table, that she should be tickled for more than ten minutes. “You know, Marilu, I think that I should tickle you some more before I let you out,” you announce. “I now realize how ticklish we both are, and I need to take advantage while I have a super ticklish lady tied up in my presence. However, once I’ve had just a little more fun, I’ll untie you.”

“That’s fine with me,” Marilu declares, surprising you a little bit. “I like being tickled, and I don’t mind being tickled a little longer.”

A little surprised, you dictate, “Well, then I guess I should make you laugh now. Tickle, tickle!”

You reach down and begin dancing your fingers over the Kichi’s bare belly, causing her to burst out in laughter. “HAHAHA!” she yells. “IHIHIT TIHIHIHCKLEHES!” Starting at her sensitive sides, you run your fingers all over the exposed midriff of your victim, with her cries of laughter increasing as you get closer to the middle. You alternate your tickling between her sides and the front of her stomach for five minutes, keeping her guessing when you will tickle her most ticklish spot. Suddenly, you lower your mouth and blow a raspberry on Marilu’s bellybutton, and her laughter spikes to hysterical. “NOHOHOHOT THEHEHERE! HAHAHAHAHA!” Seeing that you now have your ticklee weakened, two of your fingers enter her cavity and wiggle back and forth, causing her to squirm back and forth and scream for mercy. “PLEHEHEHEHESE! MEHEHERCY! STAHAHAP NAHAHAW!” You tickle torture the Kichi’s navel for a full half hour, when she finally goes into silent laughter. At this point, you decide to have some mercy on her, moving your fingers out to her sides. Marilu regains her voice, and sweet laughter flows out of her mouth. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Following another five minutes of tummy tickling, you remove your fingers from her midsection and take the tape off the Kichi. Her arms slump down onto the table as she struggles to catch her breath.

Once she can finally speak again, Marilu sits up and proclaims,
11331111111121.title: Just a little more fun

113311111111212.content:
“You tickled me pretty good there,” Marilu proclaims. “In fact, I know some Kichi that would really enjoy being tickled like that. One of the companies I frequently contract jobs with has two executives that really like my tickle interrogation work. They said that if I get a partner who can tickle as well as I do, they would pay me and the other tickler a large sum to take them onto my ship, tie them up, and tickle their bare bellies. While I do not know how long they want to be tickled, they did say they were willing to have it go on for a while. I could lend you some of my tickle tools if you want to use them in tickle torturing these executives, and you would make quite a bit of money. However, there was one more part of the agreement. The executives said that they were very ticklish, and they wanted to be able to get their revenge after we were finished tickling them. For this, they desired to tickle our bare bellies for five minutes, although they expressed no desire to restrain us. All they requested for their revenge was that my fellow tickler and I have nothing covering our stomachs and that they have access to any tools we have on board. They also informed me that we would be tickling them longer than they tickled us. What do you think?”

“Well, I have a few questions,” you respond. “First of all, where are these executives?”

“They are on the Kichi colony Feather Jewels,” Marilu notifies you. “It is a few light years from here, but we can get there in a matter of minutes. The colony is inhabited by around one hundred thousand Kichi citizens, as well as their tickle slaves. For our stay, we will be going to the capital city, Feather Prime, where most of the businesses are centered. Feather Jewel is a center of commerce in Kichi lands, so it holds many businesses and executes, and I know it very well. Most of the business I get requires me to come there to pick up ticklees. Specifically, the tickling industry is very prevalent on Feather Jewels, and this translates to everyday life for the citizens there. For instance, there are laws on the colony that prevent anyone from wearing any more than what I have on, except in special circumstances. This is to create more opportunities for tickling by exposing all tickle spots, which can be tickled by anyone at any time. If you were to step foot on the colony, you would probably have to remove your suit and shoes, as they cover up various tickle spots, but you would be able to keep on your helmet. This is because no Kichi would want you to not be able to breathe, and it is clear that the helmet keeps you alive. In addition, there is a law that all who are on the planet, even for a short time, shall undergo a basic tickle test to map out their tickle sensitivity. The most ticklish spot on everyone is marked by a special pen carried by the customs guards. When one leaves the planet, the customs guards give a ticklish washing that removes the pen marks on their tickle spot. Those are probably the major laws on Feather Jewels that will concern our stay there, and there is one more thing I should tell you before you ask further questions. The planet is called Feather Jewels for a reason: there are feathers everywhere, and they are treated as precious jewels. As you walk around, it is not uncommon to see all sorts of people getting tickled with feathers, and you will surely get tickled with at least a feather or two during your stay. The most common tickle spots are midriffs and armpits, though sometimes an unlucky Kichi will be pinned and have their tail tickled. Often, ticklings only last a few minutes or so unless they are to tickle slaves; it is against the law to tickle a free person for more than five minutes without written permission. Police monitor the streets very thoroughly, although they will pick up feathers and tickle people too. Additionally, it is against the law to restrain a free person while tickling them, but not to pin them down. I will make sure that you are not tickled too much as we go through the colony. Do you have any more questions?”

“Yes, why is there such a focus on tickle slaves?” you inquire.

“Well, the Kichi enjoy tickling in all forms,” Marilu dictates, “and some like being tickled more, while others like tickling others more. In addition to this, the Kichi are very mercantile, so we are always looking for ways to make money off our passions. Tickling is a common enjoyment among different species, not just the Kichi, so some Kichi buy and sell tickle slaves of all races. Unfortunately, the tickle slave industry has advanced so that people are sometimes kidnapped off the street and sold as tickle slaves, but I will not let that happen to you. We will get a security escort to protect us; however, they will also likely give us a taste of the spirit of Feather Jewels and tickle us some on our journey. Getting back to the topic of tickle slavery, I would not be surprised if some of the aliens that I tickle interrogated were sold as tickle slaves after I tickled the information out of them. The Kichi have legalized voluntary tickle slavery in their lands, which means that someone can volunteer to be a tickle slave, and they have also legalized selling traitors as tickle slaves. The second provision allows some companies to make former employees tickle slaves if it is proven that they committed corporate espionage or sold company secrets. Still, it is not legal to force someone into tickle slavery if they have done nothing wrong and have not volunteered. The volunteer clause requires the new tickle slave to sign forms that state how long they will be a tickle slave and their willingness to become a tickle slave in front of an official judge to make sure that they are not being forced into it. All in all, I guess that is what you should know about tickle slaves, and I want to reassure you that I will get us protection to make sure that we stay free. Are there any more questions?”

“What would happen with my ship?” you wonder. “You said that you were getting us both security, so I figure that we have to go in together. Would we need to both be in on one ship or could we land two ships in the same place?”

“Most of the landing ports are large enough that two ships can fit, so we could both travel on our separate ships,” the Kichi announces. “I will inform them that we are together, and they will direct so to an appropriate port. Any more questions?”

“One last one,” you answer. “At the beginning, you said that the executives offered you a chance to tickle them if you got a partner. Was you asking me if I wanted to do this a job offer?”

“Yes, it was,” Marilu confirms. “If you want, we can become partners and tickle interrogate suspects together. We could do it on either of our ships or even use both of them for different interrogations. I think I gave you a brief description earlier, but in a job, someone brings the suspect to the ship, we tie them up, and then we tickle them until they give in. After that, we give them and the information to the company who hired us and get our reward. With two ticklers, we stand to make a lot of money and get more job offers. So, what do you say? Do you want to be my fellow tickle interrogator?”
113311111111212.title: Executive Ticklees

1133111111112121.content:
“I would love to be your partner in tickle interrogation,” you affirm to Marilu. “Now, I think we have some executives to find and tickle, right?”

“Soon,” Marilu answers. “I am also glad to engage in this new partnership with you. Now that we are partners, we must engage in the Kichi ceremony for becoming tickle partners. We both have to tickle the other partner’s stomach with our tail, or in your case feet, until they say mercy. While the tickling is conducted, the ticklee will be tied vertically, and the tickler will sit in a chair in front of them. The ceremony is conducted to show the other tickler how effective their partner will be.”

“We should probably head back to your ship, then,” you announce. “I don’t know if I have any vertical restraints here.”

“Let’s head there,” your new partner declares, and you both walk back to the Kichi ship. When you get on, you head to the experiment room. “Earlier I told you that this was an experiment room, and I do use it for experiments sometimes. However, now that you know about my work, you should know the official name for this room. It is my ship’s tickle interrogation room, where the vast majority of ticklees are tied tightly with no chance of escape until they give me what I want. Here is a place where we can do the ceremony.” She gestures to a wall with chains for restraining arms above one’s head. In addition to this, there is a chair right in front of the wall, which could allow the tickler to sit down and reach their feet to the ticklee’s midriff. “So, would you like to start as the tickler or ticklee?”

“You can tickle me first,” you offer, removing the top half of your spacesuit and raising your arms to the chains. Marilu locks you in, and then she sits down in the chair. Slowly at first, her tail begins to slide up the bottom of your spacesuit towards your tickle spot. It soon reaches your bare belly, and then it goes straight to your vulnerable bellybutton. All at once, the tail begins wiggling inside the hole, and you break out in laughter, “HAHAHAHAHAH! THAHAHAHAT REHEHEHELLEHEHE TIHIHICKLEHEHES!” Smiling, Marilu continues to move the tail back and forth inside your navel, causing you to squirm a little bit to try and get away. You take the tickle torture for what seems like forever, and then you finally yell, “MEHEHEHERCEHE!” By the time you give in, the Kichi’s tail is dancing back and forth at top speed, and you are thrashing around in the chains, vehemently trying to get out. Your partner’s tail comes to a sudden halt, sneaking outside of your tummy button and retreating back towards the ground. When you recover from the tickle torture, you wonder, “So, how long could I stand your tail tickles?”

“You lasted for eleven minutes and twenty-eight seconds,” Marilu notifies you as she unlocks the chains on you. “That’s a pretty good time for such a ticklish species. I guess it’s my turn now.” Your hands are now free from the restraints, and you turn around and lock up the Kichi. Once you are seated in the chair with your spacesuit back on, you lean back and bring your feet up, resting them on her exposed abdomen. Your toes begin to wriggle on your partner’s ticklish tummy, and she immediately reacts. “AHAHAHAHA! YOHOHORE NAHAHAT TOHOHO BAHAHAHAD!” Soon after you start tickling, you realize that Marilu’s bare bellybutton can hold two of your toes, and you take advantage of this, sending the torment to her most sensitive spot. “HAHAHAHA! YOHOHOHORE EHEHEHEVIHIHIL!” The Kichi’s laughter jumps an octave when you go inside the comparably large hole, and she begins to struggle against the chains. Looking to force her to give in quickly, your toes pick up speed, and her laughter keeps on increasing. Following a long time of tickling, she finally gives in and screams, “MEHEHEHEHERCEHEHEHE!” You stop wiggling your toes and move them back to the ground. As she gets her breath back, you release your partner, and then she inquires, “So, how long did I last?”

“You got through ten minutes and fifty-five seconds,” you state. “That seems like a pretty good time.”

“I agree,” Marilu confirms. “Now I guess we should head to get the executives. Would you like to go to Feather Jewels on my ship or your own?”

“I’d like to go on my ship,” you decide.

“I’ll give your computer the coordinates,” your partner proclaims. “When we get close, I will direct you to the correct landing port.”

“Alright,” you reply, and you head back to your own ship. By the time you get back, Erin has received the coordinates from Marilu’s ship, and the two of you disengage from each other. Both vessels take off towards Feather Jewels, and you get to the outskirts of the planet within minutes.

All of a sudden, your communications screen fills with the head of a Kichi, but not Marilu. “Hello,” the Kichi broadcasts. “The ship before you, who identified herself as one Marilu, said that you two were together, and I want to make sure that her information is correct.”

“It is,” you affirm.

“Then I will give you the same landing coordinates I gave her,” the Kichi responds, and soon enough, Erin has the coordinates. “I have one more thing that I would like to tell you because you are a human, and as far as I know, humans have never been to Feather Jewels before. On our planet, we have a law that prohibits you from wearing a full spacesuit. You should take the spacesuit itself off, but not your underwear, once you reach the planet’s surface. You can also keep your helmet on so you can breathe. Thank you!”

“I did already know that, but thank you for making sure,” you announce. Erin brings you down safely next to Marilu’s ship, and you remove your spacesuit, leaving all of your tickle spots vulnerable. Once you have the proper amount of clothing on, you exit your spacecraft and walk to Marilu, who is waiting for you near a building. Four Kichi soon come out of the building and head towards you. “Who are they?”

“They are the customs agents,” your partner informs you. “They will give us a choice between allowing them to conduct a tickle test on us or telling them our most ticklish spot. When they know our tickle spot, they will mark it, and then we can find the executives.”

The four Kichi soon arrive at your position, and one of them declares, “Welcome to Feather -Jewels! By law, we are obliged to mark the most ticklish spot on your bodies. We can find it out one of two ways, and you can both choose different ways or the same one. The first option is conducting a tickle test on you, where we will tickle you all over and then mark your tickle spot. Your other option is to just tell us your most ticklish spot, at which point we will tickle you there to confirm its sensitivity. Once your tickle spot has been marked, you are free to go wherever you would like, and when you leave, we will clean the mark off your body for you. So, which option would you like to pick?”
1133111111112121.title: Partners

11331111111121212.content:
“I’ll tell you my most ticklish spot,” you announce.

“I will do the same,” Marilu declares.

“Then come with us,” the head Kichi directs. “I am glad that we will be doing this the easy way. The two of you will be able to explore Feather Jewels without much delay.” The Kichi leads you inside the building to a room with a few tables in it. “Our human guest can lie on the closest table, and the Kichi can lie on the second closest table.” Marilu and you lie down, and the head Kichi continues, “So, what is your most ticklish spot, human?”

“My stomach,” you answer.

“Tickle him,” the Kichi orders one of her fellow agents near you. “And your most ticklish spot, our fellow Kichi?”

“My stomach as well,” your partner repeats your answer.

“Tickle her,” the head Kichi orders a different agent.

Before you can do anything else, you feel your hands being pulled over your head, and then fingers suddenly dance on your midriff. “AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you burst out laughing as you are tickled. The female customs agent runs her fingers all over your bare belly, hitting all of your sensitive spots and causing you to struggle. After a couple minutes, the tickling ceases, and the agent leaves to get a pen. You glance over at Marilu, who has endured the same treatment as you, and see that she is exhausted from all the tickling she has gone through today.

“Well, it looks like you both were right,” the head Kichi proclaims. “Your tummies are certainly the most ticklish spots on your bodies. Now we will just mark that with our special pens, and then you can be on your way.” The agent returns, and she draws a red line on your stomach with her pen, causing you to squeal a little bit. Once you have been marked, your hands are released, and you get up. “Have fun in Feather Jewels!”

Marilu guides you out into the lobby, and she quickly calls over a different customs agent. “Hello,” she states. “We were looking for some security to go with us while we travel. We are heading to Navel Enterprises on business.”

“Of course,” the Kichi responds. “I’ll call a team for you, but I do need your name.”

“Marilu,” your partner reveals. “Thank you.”

“Follow me,” the Kichi instructs. You follow her to a desk, and she picks up a phone. “Yes, I was looking for a security team to escort two to Navel Enterprises. One is a Kichi, and the other is a human. The name is Marilu. Thank you! I’ll send them there.” She hangs up and turns to you. “Your security detail will meet you in the lobby in five minutes.”

“Thank you,” Marilu states. She leads you to a couch, and the two of you sit down. Before long, your partner tells you to get up, and the two of you go to four Kichi with red lines across their abdomens, one of whom is holding up a sign with strange writing. “I am Marilu. Are you our security detail?”

“Yes,” the Kichi holding the sign confirms. “You wanted to go to Navel Enterprises?”

“Yes,” Marilu affirms. “Once we get there, I will pay you, and we will be fine. Shall we go?” The security nods, and the six of you head out onto the streets of Feather Jewels. On the way, you observe the people of the planet, and it is not long before you see some Kichi being tickled with feathers. You keep walking, but you are soon interrupted when you feel a feathery sensation across your own midriff. Laughing, you look down to see one of the guards tickling you with a feather. Your partner is also being tickled by a security guard with a feather, and both of you give them a good laugh for the minute that they tickle you. After this tickling, you keep a close eye on your tickle spot until you see a feather lying on the ground, and you decide to get revenge. You pick up the feather and slide it up an unsuspecting security guard’s side, and she begins giggling. Enjoying being the tickler again, you move the feather across the entire ticklish tummy of the guard, tickling her for a full two minutes.
