You find out while tickling her that she is most sensitive in her navel, and you begin to wonder if this is a common trait in Kichi. Following about fifteen minutes, you reach a large building. “Here we are. Thank you for your services.” Your partner gives some money to the security guard, and they depart, letting you walk into the business. “This is the building that holds the executive offices of Navel Enterprises. I interrogate people for them on a very regular basis, and they are my best contractors.”

The two of you walk up to a receptionist, who broadcasts, “Hello, and how may I help you?”

“I was looking for Reclos and Nolujo,” Marilu notifies her. “I am Marilu, and both of us need to see them.”

“I will give them a call and see if they are available,” the receptionist responds. She makes a quick call before turning back to you. “They are on Floor 53, and they are expecting you and the human. The elevator is to your left. There will be a receptionist on near the elevator to direct you to them.”

“Thank you,” Marilu states, and the two of you go to the elevator. Once you are in, she presses the correct button, and before long, you are at the 53rd Floor. The door opens, and you both head out to see a new receptionist.

“Are you the ones looking for Reclos and Nolujo?” the receptionist questions, to which your partner nods. “They are in the first room on the left.”

“Thank you,” Marilu repeats the polite phrase. The two of you go to the room, where two Kichi are sitting in chairs. As you look over them, you notice that both of the executives have a red stripe on their bellies. The gesture you to the two empty chairs in the room. “Nice to see you again, Reclos and Nolujo.”

“As it is to see you,” one of the Kichi, whom you later learn is Reclos, agrees. “So, is this about our offer if you got a partner?”

“Yes,” Marilu confirms. “You said that my partner and I could tickle you aboard my ship, and this human is my partner. I am sure you will be very satisfied with his tickling skills.”

“I would like to see a small demonstration,” Nolujo declares. “Could you tickle Marilu’s midsection for thirty seconds, human?”

“Of course,” you reply. You walk over to your partner and reach down to her abdomen, wiggling your fingers. Once you begin touching her, Marilu breaks out in laughter and begins squirming. You tickle all over her tickle spot in the thirty seconds provided, showing your skill at the art.

“You may stop now,” Reclos dictates after thirty seconds, and you immediately cease. “You have proven yourself worthy to become Marilu’s partner. Now we shall head to Marilu’s ship in…”
11331111111121212.title: Feather Jewels

choices: You arrive at the customs building
Reclos and Nolujo decide to tickle you more
113311111111212121.content:
“We shall head to Marilu’s ship in a limousine,” Reclos proclaims. “I will arrange for it to pick us up at the bottom floor. Let us go.” The four of you get up and walk over to the receptionist. “Please have a limousine for the customs building meet us at the bottom floor; we will be out for at least a few hours.” The receptionist nods, and the four of you get in an elevator. When you reach the bottom floor, you walk outside and see a limousine waiting. “You two can sit on the seats on the left side; Nolujo and I will take the right side seats.” The four of you get into the limo on the left side, with Reclos and Nolujo closer to the driver. “Please take us to customs, and take the long route out with special treatment. We will be leaving the planet.” As the limousine begins to move, you and Marilu feel your hands being grabbed and pulled to the ceiling, where they are secured. “On our way to the ship, we have a few questions for the human. These are questions that we always asked potential employees so we can learn about you and your species. However, our version has a twist. If you give us an acceptable answer, we will tickle Marilu with our tails. If you do not, our tails will tickle you. We will be tickling your bellybuttons because our company is named Navel Enterprises. Do you understand?”

“Yes,” you affirm, hoping that they do not ask embarrassing questions.

“Good,” Nolujo states as the two executives move their tails up in the seat between Marilu and you. “First off, when you and Marilu became partners, did you do the tail tickling ceremony?”

“Yes, we did,” you confirm. “I gave in after almost eleven and a half minutes, and Marilu lasted for just under eleven minutes.”

“Good,” Nolujo responds. The tails slither over to Marilu and enter her navel, and soon your partner breaks out in laughter. For five minutes, the tails wiggle inside her tummy button, and then they suddenly stop and return to the seat. “Next question. Do you have any experience in tickle interrogation?”

“Not any professional experience,” you answer. “I came into space as a human scout, and I chose to establish peaceful relations with the Kichi.”

“We appreciate your honesty, but that wasn’t the answer we were looking for,” Reclos informs you.

The tails slide over to you, and you immediately begin to try to break free. Suddenly, both of them creep into your bellybutton, and they begin to wriggle around, making you burst out in laughter. “HAHAHAHAHA! NOHOHOHOHO!” The appendages frequently touch each other as they dance around in your innie navel, and you laugh hysterically, begging for mercy. Nevertheless, after five minutes, the tails cease the tickle torture and go back to their resting place.

“Before we go on to the next question, I would like you to know that because of your experience, we would have tickled you no matter what answer you gave,” Reclos announces as you pant. “If you had said that you had experience, we would have tickled you for lying. You got tickled now because we prefer to hire interrogators with experience. However, that will not stop us from hiring you, as Marilu has plenty of experience and I think you will pick up quickly. Now that you have caught your breath, I think we should go on. These questions will have a thirty-second tickling. What does the human race breathe?”

“We breathe oxygen,” you reply. “That is what this helmet is giving me now.”

“Thank you,” Nolujo declares. The tails move over to your partner and tickle her tummy button for thirty seconds. “Next question. What is the average height and weight of a human?”

“Around 1.65 meters tall,” you respond, “and 69 kilograms in weight.”

“Interesting,” Reclos says. The tails immediately begin to tickle your partner again, but they quickly stop. “The average Kichi weights 60 kilograms and is 2 meters tall. How is the human planet, Earth, governed?”

“The Earth is divided into six hundred sectors that all fall under one central government,” you answer. “The government is divided into three branches. The legislative branch has two houses, one representing population of the sectors and the other treating all sectors equally. In this, the members pass laws and send them to the executive branch. The executive branch has a leader called the President, who has limited power over which laws pass and which do not. In order to become the President, he or she must win a majority of the electoral votes. Each sector has the same number of votes as representatives in the legislative branch. The winner of each sector takes all of the electoral votes. In addition to the President, there are different administrative and enforcement bureaucracies that apply the laws that pass. Lastly, there is the judicial branch, which deals with challenges to both sector and federal law. The members of this branch are appointed by the President with approval of the equality-based house of the legislative branch. Over all of the branches of government is the Constitution, which says how the government is to be run and what government can and cannot do. I can tell you more if you want, but that is the basic overview.”

“Thank you,” Nolujo affirms before the tails make a dash for Marilu. Your partner’s bellybutton is tickled for another thirty seconds, and then the tails sit down on the seat. At this point…
113311111111212121.title: Limo Ride

choices: New option: Go to the ship
1133111111112121211.content:
“We have arrived at customs,” you hear from the driver, and you get released from your chains.

“Thank you,” Nolujo announces as she turns to pay the driver. Once the fare is paid, the four of you exit the limousine and head into the customs building. You all walk to a receptionist, and Nolujo speaks up. “The four of us are going to leave the planet. The ship we will be taking is parked in Docking Bay 18.”

“Please wait for agents to come,” the receptionist replies. “They will remove the ticklish spot markings from you and then take you to your ship.” Nolujo nods, and you wait by the desk.

Soon after, eight official Kichi come to the desk. “Please come with us,” one of the agents proclaims. “We will be assisting you with taking the markings off.” You all walk with the agents to a room similar to the one you were tickled in earlier. “Please choose a table and lie down on it, arms up above your heads.” From closest to furthest from the door, the tables are picked as follows: you, Reclos, Marilu, and Nolujo. Once you are on the table, you raise your arms up, and then restrains hold onto your arms and legs. Two Kichi agents leave the room and return thirty seconds later with two buckets, which they set between you and Reclos and Marilu and Nolujo. “We are going to scrub the markings off of your abdomens. We have to be very thorough in the removal, so this might take a little bit of your time. Let’s get started.” The customs agents position themselves so that there is one on each side of the travelers. Once they are ready, each agent by the buckets pulls two scrub brushes out of the buckets, handing one to their partner.

You flinch as the agents by you reach down and touch the brushes to your bare belly, and then the ‘cleaning’ begins. “HAHAHAHAHA!” you exclaim as the brushes are scribbled around your tickle spot, echoed by everyone else being tickled. You squirm around to try to avoid the tickles, but the Kichi agents attack you ruthlessly, pressing the brush in to limit your movement. As your sensitive stomach is tortured, you can only laugh and scream for mercy. “PLEHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAP! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The brushes scrub all around your midriff, on occasion stopping for a short period as it is put back in the bucket to get new water. Even when a brush is taken off to refill the water, the other brush is still tickling you, and you are in a constant state of tickle torture. This torment continues for fifteen minutes, and then the brushes cease. Right after the tickling ends, your chains come loose, and you sit up to watch the others continue to get their tummies tickled. You notice that Reclos is squirming around the most, while Marilu is controlling herself the best. Finally, following another fifteen minutes, all of the tickling on the Kichi concludes, and they are let loose.

“Wait here for a minute,” the head customs agent declares as four of the agents depart for an unknown reason. A minute later, the agents return with eight large feathers in their hands. “This is the first time we have had a human on Feather Jewels, and we would like to give his whole party a gift. There are two options for you to pick from. You can either tickle our bare bellies with these feathers for five minutes, or you can let us tickle you for five more minutes with the feathers. What would you like to do?”
1133111111112121211.title: A Ticklish Scrubbing

choices: Nothing else. Go onto Marilu’s ship and tickle the executives
11331111111121212111.content:
“I’d like to tickle you,” you announce to the customs agent.

“Very well,” the agent proclaims. “Give them the feathers.” When you get two feathers, you observe that although they go up to your waist from the ground, they are still very light. The four of you all get two feathers each, and then the Kichi customs agents lie down on the tables, two to a table. “You may tickle our midsections with the feathers now.”

You easily lift the feathers up and bring them over to the two Kichi lying on the table you were on earlier. Lowering the feathers to their stomachs, you begin swiping them back and forth, causing the Kichi to start laughing. You alternate between wide and short strokes to try and find the most sensitive spot on your ticklees as they squirm around from the tickling. Like the other Kichi that you have encountered, the agents appear to be most ticklish on their navels, so you slide the feathers in and wiggle them around. The ticklish customs agents bring their arms down to try and block the feathers, but you manage to keep the tools in the large bellybuttons. For the rest of the five minutes, you torment your ticklees, doing your best to make them pay for giving you a harsh tickling. At the end of the tickle time, you lift the feathers off of the bare bellies, and the customs agents get up from the tables. One of the agents collects the feathers from everyone, and the head agent instructs you to follow her out to your ship.

When you get out to the ships, Reclos joins you in the Swift Feather while Marilu and Nolujo opt for the Kichi vessel. You get your spacesuit back on, and then your partner calls you over the communications system. “Human, I am sending you coordinates for space to meet up at,” Marilu informs you. “We will see you there.”

“Got them,” you respond before you temporarily cut off communication with her. “Reclos, you can sit on the couch right over there.”

“Thank you,” the executive replies as she sits down on the couch in the living room, still close enough that you can speak. “So, is the rest of your body as ticklish as your navel?”

“No,” you answer. “That’s my most ticklish spot. I have a question about the Kichi. Do all Kichi have their tummy as their most ticklish spot?”

“The vast majority do,” Reclos reveals. “A few have more ticklish tails or armpits, but the midriff, which is always bared on a Kichi, is almost the universal tickle spot for my species. In fact, the most severe sentence a criminal can receive is life in the tickle dungeons with belly tickling. This means that they spend the rest of their life in the tickle dungeons, with their stomach being tickled sunrise to sunset. Of course, there are breaks so they can be fed, but it is still torture for the ticklees. Why do humans cover their ticklish spots with their clothes?”

“We lived in some very cold areas where it was beneficial to cover ourselves up, and it became a tradition,” you explain the presence of your spacesuit the best you could. “Since I have never been a tickle interrogator before, I was wondering what kind of jobs I could expect to receive from you.”

“We typically will send Marilu and now you former employees who have been hired by a rival company,” Reclos declares. “Since you appear to be very capable, you will get the highest-ranking employees with the most knowledge about our operations. We only occasionally go after the lower-ranking employees, as they usually do not know company secrets. The good news for you is that the higher the former employee was, the more you will get paid for interrogating them. Because of this and the fact that you will be getting the highest-ranked departures, you will be bringing in quite a lot of money, up to forty-five million chiiks per interrogation.” Erin quickly translates this into $5.9 billion. “I have another question for you. Where is your favorite place to tickle?”

“I think I’m going to stick with the abdomen,” you decide. “It’s pretty fun to tickle a ticklee there, and it’s really easy to bare. Why?”

“You will find out later,” Reclos dictates. “I have noticed that you do not appear to have had much experience with tickling before you encountered Marilu. Do humans not tickle each other often?”

“No, humans do not tickle frequently,” you admit. “Our clothes are one of the reasons that we do not tickle as often as different species do. Without exposed tickle spots, we do not have the access that you do to each other to tickle them. On occasion, we will bare our tickle spots, such as if we go to a warm place, and more tickling occurs then, but it is still not big. I have certainly enjoyed participating in all the tickling that goes on with the Kichi, though. What does Navel Enterprises sell?”

“We develop and sell tickle machines that focus on the navel,” Reclos broadcasts. “Since humans do not tickle as much, you would probably like to see our micro-sized tickling machines. They are often flown into the bellybutton, and the ticklee does not notice them until the machine is activated. These machines actually tickle the nerves themselves, stimulating the tickle sensors to make it appear as if different tickle tools are tickling the navel. Since the ticklee cannot see, much less remove, the machine, it is pure torture for them. We only sell the micro-sized machines to the government for tickle dungeon use. The vast majority of our revenue comes from self-tickling machines and the remotes for them, which consumers buy to use on themselves or friends. The machine comes in many different sizes, all visible to the eye, and the median size is about the size of your bellybutton. Of course, there are many that are smaller than that, and also some that are larger. You place these directly inside the ticklee’s navel and then press a button on your remote to control the intensity of tickling. Along with tickling themselves, which is the main application for this, consumers have found this optimal for tickling between friends and punishing the person who fell asleep first at a sleepover. This type of tickle machine comes in many different forms, each one utilizing a different tool on the ticklee. I think that is a good overview of what we do at Navel Enterprises. I have one last question for you. Where is your favorite spot to be tickled?”

“Probably my tummy,” you disclose. “It can get pretty torturous if it gets tickled too long, but I still enjoy it the most. Actually, having it tickled for a short time is pretty fun.” At this time, you feel the ship’s warp drive turning off, and you realize that you are almost to the meeting point. “I think we’re close to where Marilu wanted to meet.” The Swift Feather drifts to the meeting point, where you see Marilu’s ship and…
11331111111121212111.title: Ticklish Agents

113311111111212121111.content:
Marilu’s ship was the only one in view when you arrived at the meeting point. Once Erin linked up the ships again, you followed Reclos onto the Kichi vessel. “You are going to need to go through the disinfection process, human and Reclos,” Marilu’s voice came inside the airlock. “We can never be too careful with space germs. For your information, I also made Nolujo go through this before she entered my ship. Remove your shoes and spacesuit, human.”

Within seconds of you obeying the orders, metal hands come out and grab the Kichi and you. The full complement of brushes appears from all over the airlock, heading towards the two of you. This time, two brushes go to your bare belly, while one takes each of your armpits and each of your feet. When they reach you, the brushes begin whirling over your tickle spots, causing Reclos to break out in laughter. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you scream out as you are tickled. Determined to outlast the executive, you refuse to beg as you are tickle tortured. Reclos gives in within a minute, pleading for Marilu to take the brushes off her. Hearing your fellow ticklee begin to beg, you hold steadfast and try to stay strong through the whole tickling experience. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The brushes on your ticklish tummy focus in on your navel, causing your laughter to spike; however, it does not take away your strength. Following five minutes of tickling, you feel the brushes slow down, and then they cease. Reclos and you are dumped to the ground, and you quickly recover and get up. After putting your spacesuit back on, you head over to the executive, still lying on the ground. You reach down and start tickling her stomach, and she immediately curls up into a defensive position, so you stop. “Get up. We’ve got to go into the ship.” You help her up, and the two of you head inside.

Outside the airlock, you immediately spot Marilu and Nolujo. “We’re heading to the interrogation room,” Marilu notifies the two of you. “You two can follow Nolujo and me.” The four of you walk to the interrogation room, with you following Nolujo and Reclos behind Marilu. While it is tempting to tickle all the bare skin that the executive is showing, you manage to refrain from an early tickle torture. You quickly reach the interrogation room, and you all sit down, Reclos with Nolujo and you with Marilu. “So, you gave me a vague description of what you were going to pay us to do. Can you elaborate more now?”

“Yes, of course,” Nolujo answers. “We want the two of you to tie and tickle interrogate us on our bare bellies. As Marilu probably knows, tickle interrogators are being used more to get company intelligence from rival companies, even if the employees have not switched sides. We want you to tickle us until we give you a safe word, which would signify the information that the rival wants in a real tickle interrogation. We are trying to practice being tickle interrogated so that we are prepared if it happens for real. If the interrogation takes less than thirty minutes, you are to continue tickling us until thirty minutes have passed. Once the interrogation is done, we would like to tickle your bare bellies for five minutes. You do not have to be restrained, but we do want to have access to all the tools that you use on us. Are those terms agreeable?”

“Yes,” Marilu confirms as you nod your head. “We will restrain the two of you on these tables. Reclos’s safe word will be ‘Jewels’, and Nolujo’s safe word will be ‘Snake’.” Your partner quickly binds the two Kichi executives down to the tables, stretching out their bodies to make them more ticklish. Once the executives are helpless, Marilu goes to a closet and picks out several things from there. She brings them over to you to observe. As you look over the tools, you see that she has brought over several feathers, as well as a few dusters, feather drills, electric toothbrushes, brushes, and some machines that you do not recognize. “Who would you like to tickle, human?”
113311111111212121111.title: Tickling Prep

1133111111112121211112.content:
“I’ll tickle Nolujo,” you announce. You pick out several feathers, a couple feather dusters, a feather drill, and some electric toothbrushes and head over to the executive, while Marilu takes several feathers, a few of the machines, a feather drill, and a feather duster and takes a seat next to Reclos.

“Before you start, I need to teach you how to properly tickle interrogate a victim,” Marilu proclaims. “First off, a tickle interrogator restrains their victim. After that, the tickler teases the ticklee.” Your partner takes out a single feather and lightly flicks it over Reclos’s bellybutton, causing her to flinch. “Ticklish? Good. I love ticklish bellybuttons. I’m going to get really acquainted with your navel during your time here. Where else are you ticklish? How about your sides?” A feather is flicked over each of the executive’s sides, and she lets out a little ‘Eep’. “I heard that giggle. Your sides are ticklish. Why, I bet that whole tummy of yours is ticklish, isn’t it? Should we test that? I think we should.” She picks up a feather duster and swipes it across Reclos’s midriff, and the executive begins laughing. “Wow! A really ticklish tummy. We’ll have to spend a lot of time here.” At this, Marilu gives you a nod, and you start teasing Nolujo.

“I hear you’re ticklish,” you declare to Nolujo. “Is that true?” The tied up Kichi doesn’t respond, so you continue, “Well, I guess I’ll just have to find out. Is your bellybutton ticklish?” Just like Marilu, you take out a feather and quickly run it in and out of the navel. Nolujo gives you a giggle in response, failing to contain her reaction. “You’re ticklish there. That means that this is going to be fun. Let’s see where else you’re ticklish. If your bellybutton is ticklish, I bet the front of your stomach is just as sensitive. I can hear it calling me to tickle it, with you leaving it exposed and all.” You press a feather duster down to her abdomen and pull it across, and while Nolujo tries to restrain herself, she gives in and laughs. “You can’t resist laughing for the tickler, ticklish Kichi. You’re going to get tickled all over that bare belly, but I still have one more place to cover my bases. Are those sides of yours ticklish? I bet they are.” You set the duster down and pick up two feathers, flicking them up Nolujo’s bare sides. The executive lets out some giggles as the feathers make their way towards her ribs, showing you that her sides are sensitive. “You’re also ticklish here. This sounds like the perfect package for your tickle torture.”

You look back at Marilu after giving Nolujo a steady dose of teasing, and she broadcasts, “Once a subject has been sufficiently teased, they will often be more ticklish. This is the perfect time to tickle interrogate them. Make her say ‘Snake’!” Your partner picks up a feather duster and swipes it across Reclos’s midsection, and the executive begins to laugh. “Say the safe word or I will just keep tickling you.”

“NOHOHOHO!” Reclos laughs as her tickle interrogation commences.

“Are you going to say the safe word?” you give Nolujo one last chance before you interrogate her. She shakes her head defiantly, and you lower your fingers to her midriff, wiggling them against her skin. “Tickle, tickle!”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Nolujo gives in to the ticklish feelings. You spread your fingers across the bare belly, tickling all over her sides before moving in. Testing out the entire tummy, you find that like nearly all the other Kichi, her navel is the most ticklish spot here. “NOHOHOHOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHERE!” Two of your fingers fit into the hole, and you use them effectively, making sure that they hit everywhere in the divot.

“Are you ready to give in yet?” you press the executive as you torture her.

“NEHEHEHEHEHEVER!” she refuses. “IHIHIHIHILL NEHEHEHEVER GIHIHIHVEHEHE YUHUHUHU WHAHAHAT YUHUHUHUHUHU WAHAHAHAHANT!” A few minutes in, you realize that your fingers, while effective, will not get her to give in. You pick up the feather drill with one hand and an electric toothbrush in the other. Noticing that you can fit both of these in her navel, you switch them on and insert them into Nolujo’s tickle spot. Suddenly, the executive’s laughter levels spike a couple of octaves when the real torture begins. “NOHOHO! DOHOHOHOHNT!”

“I’ll stop if you say the safe word,” you promise, looking at the clock and seeing that it has been six minutes and ten seconds so far.

“HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Nolujo is reduced to just laughing as her bellybutton is tickled. Without any more protesting, you keep pressing the tickle tools hard into her skin and enjoy hearing her laughter. You tickle everywhere inside the hole on Nolujo’s sensitive stomach, and her laughter just keeps getting louder. Wanting to wear her out before she can stop laughing enough to say the safe word, you continue moving the drill and toothbrush around for a full ten minutes. You then remove the feather drill from Nolujo’s navel and pick up a feather duster. At this point, Nolujo can finally utter intelligible words through her laughter again. “HAHAHAHA! IHIHIT TIHIHIHICKLEHEHES!”

“Are you going to say the safe word now?” you demand to know of your ticklee as the clock hits sixteen minutes and twenty-one seconds.

Laughing, Nolujo yells out,
1133111111112121211112.title: Tickling Nolujo

11331111111121212111121.content:
“SNAHAHAHAHAHAKE!” Nolujo yells out in laughter as you tickle her with the duster.

Hearing the safe word, you lift up the feather duster before checking the clock to make sure you saw the right time. “You lasted just sixteen minutes and twenty-one seconds, Nolujo,” you inform her. “That means I’m going to have to keep tickling you until we get to thirty minutes.”

You pick up the feather drill and the electric toothbrush that you were using earlier and reinsert them into the executive’s bellybutton. Turning them on, you restart the tickle torture on the Kichi, who immediately begins laughing. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOHOHOHOHO! STAHAHAHAP!” Ignoring the pleas, you continue to torment your ticklee, who struggles violently against her bonds. The navel tickling continues, as the bondage holds Nolujo fast to prevent her escape. As you approach the end of the half hour, you blow a few raspberries in the stomach hole, making Nolujo squeal each time your mouth hits her tickle spot. The term finally concludes, and you remove all of your tickle tools from Nolujo’s navel. Once you set everything down next to the table, you free the Kichi from the restraints, and the two of you watch as Marilu interrogates Reclos. The other executive gives in after forty minutes, and then she is released by your partner.

“As promised, you can tickle our bare bellies for five minutes,” Marilu declares when both executives have recovered from their interrogations. “We will lay down on the tables, and you can use any of the tools next to the tables.”

You remove the top of your spacesuit, exposing your upper body to Nolujo, and lay down on the table. Smiling, she grabs the feather drill and the electric toothbrush and tries to place both of them inside your bellybutton. However, it is too small, so she keeps the feather drill in there and moves the toothbrush out to your left side. She suddenly turns both of the tools on, and you burst out in laughter. “HAHAHAHAHA! NOHOHOHOHO!” The Kichi bends and moves her tools to get the most ticklish reactions out of you, and you squirm around laughing. Nevertheless, as the five minutes come to a close, she relaxes her tickling method, and the tickle torment ceases on time. You sit up after you catch your breath, putting back on your spacesuit top.

“That part was very fun,” Reclos proclaims after both Marilu and you are up as you are both handed a large stack of paper. “You are each getting paid two hundred and forty chiiks for your services, and we will contact you when we have a job for you.” Before Reclos speaks again, Erin converts the value of the money you just received to three hundred and twenty thousand dollars. “For right now, we would like to invite you to spend some time with us on Feather Jewels. We would like to give the human a free tour of Navel Enterprises, and Marilu is certainly welcome to come, too. Would you like to go?”
11331111111121212111121.title: Punishment and Revenge Tickling

113311111111212121111211.content:
“I would love to take a tour of your company,” you announce, pleased that the two executives would offer. “Would anyone like to come back with me?”

“I will,” Reclos responds. The two of you walk back onto the Swift Feather, and you set course for Feather Jewels. As the two ships detach, Reclos, who has reclaimed the couch, comments, “I saw that your tickling technique was superb. Nolujo may be very ticklish, but she does not give in easily to torture. You humans must be great ticklers because of how sensitive your species is. I am glad that we will have you in our employ when we need to get something out of a ticklee.”

“Thank you,” you accept the compliment. “I have a few more questions about the Kichi while we ride back. Earlier, you said that tickle torture is used in the prisons as a form of punishment. What offenses will you serve a tickle dungeon sentence for committing?”

“For you, likely none until the Kichi and humans establish formal relations or become enemies,” Reclos notifies you. “If our two species were to become enemies, for coming to a Kichi planet, you would be sentenced to life in the tickle dungeons with belly tickling, our most severe punishment. However, since you had productive contact with Marilu and you are now engaging in business with the Kichi, that is not likely to happen. With formal relations, the smallest punishment that would get you in the tickle dungeons is four hours in the tickle dungeon with light tickling, and this is only applied if the alien had knowledge of the law already. This is actually a fairly common sentence to receive, as you can be put there for doing something as simple as covering up too much of a tickle spot, stealing something of small value, being unemployed for more than a week, or not showing up to work on time without cause. In fact, I have had this sentence for not showing up to work on time a total of ten times already. The dungeon ticklers that administer this sentence are very nice, and they only tickle you for a few minutes before giving you a break. On a slightly different note, the unemployment law does not apply to anyone under 16, and most Kichi get a job at 14 or 15. Time spent in the dungeon is supposed to encourage them to go and find a job. On the complete other hand, with formal relations, you can get the ultimate dungeon penalty for only murder or treason. Criminals that commit these crimes are put with the most ruthless Kichi ticklers and tormented for hours upon hours. You seemed fairly nice, and I doubt you would ever get put in a Kichi tickle dungeon, much less get a very severe punishment. For Kichi, the punishments are the same as for other species with formal relations. I have a new question for you. In general, where is the most ticklish spot on humans?”

“The majority of humans have either their stomach or feet as their most ticklish spot,” you inform the Kichi. “I think that the feet are usually more ticklish than the stomach, but it depends on the person. What do you do outside of work?”

“Well, there are usually tickle clubs open all day,” Reclos declares. “Whether you want to be tickled or be doing the tickling, the tickle clubs have it all. They always have a vast assortment of tools to help you enjoy yourself at the club. In addition, there are hired ticklers and ticklees that service you and anyone you bring along, and they are very good at what they do. All ticklees, whether it is you or a hired ticklee, are tied down and tickled until the customer has had enough or the ticklee is completely worn out. In addition, you can even hire a tickler and then assist them as they tickle your friends or get tickled by both them and your friends. These are just some of the perks of going to tickle clubs. Other than the clubs, I do have a family and a modest home that I like to spend time with and at. In addition, I own twelve Kichi tickle slaves, all of which are very sensitive to feathers. The theme parks my family and I go to always involve tickling in some form on every ride, mostly midriff-focused. In fact, nearly everything on Feather Jewels has tickling involved in it, and because of the Kichi’s tummy ticklishness, the midsection is often the target. A new question for you. Where do humans enjoy being tickled the most?”

“Typically whatever is less ticklish, the belly or feet,” you answer. “However, this is not always the case, as some humans, like me, enjoy being tickled more on their most ticklish spot or another spot on their body. Most humans like being tickled on bare skin more, but as I said before, tickling is not very common among adults on Earth. How much tickling should I expect to endure on this tour of Navel Enterprises?”

“That would depend on the type of ¬tour that you pick out,” Reclos dictates. “There are two types of tours that we do at Navel Enterprises, the interactive tour and the observation tour. In the interactive tour, you test out several of the devices that we make at the company as you pass by where they are produced. The observation tour allows you to watch different Kichi endure the tickling as you go by the device production lines. For a normal tour group, the observation option is not available, but you’ve endured tons of tickling today. I think that if you want to take the observation tour, we can arrange it for you. However, I do want you to experience the micro-sized tickle helicopter, which I told you about earlier. We won’t tickle you with it for long, but it is a magnificent piece of innovation that the first human to meet the Kichi should have the honor of being subjected to. When you are done with the tour, it will likely be closing time. Nolujo and I usually go to a tickle club for a few hours after work, and then we head to our separate homes. You and Marilu are welcome to join us for free or you could head somewhere for the night. If you come with us, you can stay at either of our houses for the night. Anyways, you can decide which tour you want when we get back to the company. It looks like we’re almost back to Feather Jewels.”

A few seconds after this, a Kichi head comes onto your view screen, and the voice on the other end says, “Hello, and welcome to Feather Jewels! A ship with a pilot named Marilu said that you would be landing in the same port as you. Is that true?” You confirm this, and then the Kichi continues, “I am transmitting the coordinates to your ship. When you land, we will have agents come out to mark your tickle spot. Thank you for visiting our planet!”

Erin guides the ship down to the ground, and you remove your spacesuit before heading out with Reclos. Outside, Marilu and Nolujo are waiting for Reclos and you, and you are soon joined by four customs agents. Once again, you tell the agents your tickle spot, and they test and mark it. Your party exits the customs building, and you head back to Navel Enterprises...
113311111111212121111211.title: Returning to Feather Jewels

choices: You have arrived at Navel Enterprises
It is time for Marilu and Nolujo to get revenge
Feathers fill the backseat and tickle everyone
1133111111112121211112113.content:
“I’m calling a limousine to take us back to Navel Enterprises,” Reclos announces. A few minutes later, a limo pulls up near the customs building. “Nolujo and Marilu, get in the left side; the human and I will take the right side.” The four of you get in the same way as before, except that you have swapped places with Nolujo. “Please take us to Navel Enterprises, the scenic route with special treatment for our passengers in the back.” The limousine begins moving, and before a few seconds have passed, Marilu and Nolujo have their arms taken up above their heads by chains. “I guess we will get to have some fun, human. This shall be our reward for the interrogation practice. You get a reward for breaking Nolujo before the thirty minutes, and I get one for lasting more than thirty minutes against Marilu.” Reclos slithers her tail up to her colleague, who presses back against the seat in response. However, this does not prevent the tail from reaching its target, Nolujo’s bare bellybutton.

“HAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHO!” you hear an outburst from Nolujo as the other executive’s tail wiggles inside the ticklee’s tummy button. “STAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIT!”

Very quickly, you decide to join Reclos in the tickler’s chair, and you lift your feet to Marilu’s stomach. Marilu does not pull back, knowing that it would be a futile effort. “AHAHAHAHA!” she yells in laughter as your toes dance on her midriff. “PLEHEHEHEHESE DOHOHOHONT!” Ignoring your partner’s pleas, you tickle torture her stomach with your toes, going into her navel on occasion. You continue to tickle her like this for fifteen minutes, when the limousine comes to a stop and the chains on her and Nolujo come off.
1133111111112121211112113.title: Tickle Limo Round 2

choices: Actually, I don't want to go on a tour...
11331111111121212111121131.content:
“We’re here,” Nolujo announces as the doors open. Reclos quickly pays the driver, and then the four of you exit the limousine. You head inside the large building, and the Kichi executives guide you back to their offices. Once you are in there, everyone takes a seat.

“So, I explained this to the human earlier, but there is more than one type of tour,” Reclos proclaims. “First off, there is the interactive tour. In this type of tour, you would be tickled by the different products as we walk by them. This is the standard tour, and typically, the tourists do not get the option to take the other tour, the observation tour. In the observation tour, you just watch different employees get tickled by the machines. I thought this might be better because of all the tickling you have already gone through today. However, no matter which type of tour you pick, I want to make sure you feel how the micro-tickle helicopters work. We will tickle your bellybuttons with these for one minute at the end of whatever tour you go on. So, which tour would you like to go on?”
11331111111121212111121131.title: Arrival at Navel Enterprises

choices: Long arms with five fingers at the end
A large collection of pom-pom-like objects
Two scientists with remotes in their hands
113311111111212121111211312.content:
“I’d like to go on the observation tour,” you announce. “I don’t know how much more bellybutton tickling I can take today.”

“Alright,” Reclos responds. “Let’s head to the tour center.” The four of you go back to the elevator and go down to the twentieth floor, where Reclos and Nolujo lead you to a ¬¬¬large room with a single desk. “Hello. We would like to go on an observation tour, and at the end, we would like to have these two get tickled by the micro-sized tickle helicopters.”

“May I see your bellybutton?” the receptionist questions, and you wonder why. Nevertheless, Reclos leans over the table, showing her navel to the receptionist. The receptionist takes out a small scanner and points it at Reclos’s tickle spot. Once the device is nestled in, she pulls the trigger to scan, causing the Kichi to squeal with laughter. A beep comes from the scanner, and the receptionist removes the scanner from Reclos’s midsection. “Thank you, Reclos. Your tour guide will be out in a minute. Her name is Weselj.”

Soon after, another Kichi comes through a door behind the desk. “Hello,” she proclaims. “My name is Weselj, and I will take you on an observation tour of Navel Enterprises today. Now I have to ask this for my curiosity: Who is the executive here?”

“I am the one that scanned in, and Nolujo here is also an executive,” Reclos answers.

“Nice to see you down here,” Weselj declares. “We don’t get executives with small groups here very often. Now I have another question that just popped up, also because of my curiosity. I have never seen anyone like you; what is your species?”

“I am a human,” you inform her, knowing that the question was directed at you. “We achieved interstellar travel very recently. I am the first human to come here.”

“I am honored to be able to host you, then,” Weselj dictates. “Well, let us get started on the tour. Follow me.” The four of you follow Weselj through the door, and you soon find yourself in a very narrow path, where you have to raise your arms above your head to keep walking. “If you were on the interactive tour, this pathway would be your first tickling. This hallway is usually filled with feathers at the belly level, and in order to get through, you have to endure the tickling. We will get to see our first tickle scene when we get through here.” When you exit the hallway, you come upon a group of Kichi, one holding a small round object. “This is our most basic tickle device, the bellybutton ball. The ball goes into a ticklee’s bare bellybutton, and with the press of a button, the ball begins to tickle the ticklee.” The Kichi with the round object places it inside her navel, and then she takes out a remote, handing it to Weselj. When the guide presses the top button on it, she immediately bursts out into laughter. “The ball is now sending feathers all around the inside of her navel. We have several different tools on the balls, ranging from feathers to fingers to brushes and everything in between. In addition, we have different sizes of balls to fit multiple sizes of bellybuttons, so even this human can get a bellybutton ball to fit him. On each remote, there are three buttons. The top button turns the machine on or off, while the middle button increases the tickle intensity and the bottom lowers the intensity. Bellybutton balls are available at Navel Enterprise locations all around, and even in the gift shop here, for 2.25 chooks each (which you later learn is $3). I think that is all for the bellybutton balls, so let’s head to the next product.” Weselj turns off the ball, and the Kichi who had been getting tickle tortured during her speech relaxes and takes it out. Following this, the guide hands the remote back to her ticklee, and you all walk into another narrow hallway.

The first thing you see in the new room is a Kichi with a vest covering her midriff. “This device is a tickle vest,” Weselj explains as everyone files in and the Kichi hands her a remote. “It tickles an entire tummy when activated with the different tools on it. You can pick and choose which tool to use with the remote. For instance, this is the feather setting.” Weselj presses a button on her remote, and the Kichi collapses with laughter, clutching her stomach. After twenty seconds, the guide deactivates the tickle vest. “Along with the feathers, there are also fingers, a tail, and electric brushes to use on the vest. There are five different settings available for the speed of the tickling on tickle vests, which are available for 9 chooks. That is all for this section; let us head to the next product.” The five of you walk through another narrow hallway into a room containing…
113311111111212121111211312.title: Observation Tour

1133111111112121211112113123.content:
As you walk into the next room, all you can see are two scientists, and both of them have remotes in their hands. “Since we do not have as much time as typical before Navel Enterprises closes down for the day, we could not get to all of our products,” Weselj explains. “Since the executives who came with you emphasized that they wanted you to experience the micro-sized tickle helicopters, we are ending the tour in this room. These two scientists have remotes that control two helicopters, and they will be tickling you. How long did you want them to get tickled?”

“Just one minute,” Reclos quickly replies. “We only want them to experience the helicopters, not exhaust them with it.”

“Alright,” Weselj declares before looking to the scientists. “You may tickle them for a minute.” The two scientists nod and stare down at their remotes, which look like controls to fly a drone.

As they begin to press buttons and appear to fly the helicopters, you wonder where the machines are, as you cannot see them. Suddenly, you feel something tickling a nerve inside your navel, and you clutch your midriff, starting to laugh. “HAHAHAHAHA!” you yell in laughter. “WHAHAHAT IHIHIHIS GOHOHOHOING AHAHAHAN?” The tickling quickly increases in intensity as more nerves are targeted by your tickler, and before long, you fall down to the ground. Hysterically laughing, you try to get rid of the torturous feeling in your bellybutton, to no use. You feel as if all the several million nerves in your navel are being targeted for tickle torture by the time thirty seconds have passed, and you give up struggling at this point. This extreme tormenting continues for another fifteen seconds, although it feels like several minutes to your hyper-ticklish tummy. With only fifteen seconds left, the tickle intensity drops as rapidly as it built up. You remain collapsed on the ground for a few minutes after the tickling completely ends, at which point you look over to Marilu. Laying down on the ground, your partner appears to be just as exhausted as you from the short tickle torture. Eventually, Reclos and Nolujo walk over to the two of you, and they roll you onto your backs. Apparently tired of waiting, Reclos reaches down and begins poking your bare belly, throwing you into another fit of laughter. “HAHAHA NOHOHO!” You pull your arms back to protect your stomach, and the executive ceases her fun and helps you get up.

After Marilu and you are both standing and recovered from the tickle torture, Weselj grins at the two of you and announces, “Well, that was fun, wasn’t it?” Marilu and you simply glare at her, so she continues, “That was the last stop we are making, so let’s head back to the tour room.” She takes you through another couple of hallways, and you end up back in the tour room. “Thank you for taking this tour of Navel Enterprises, and have a nice day!”

You all thank Weselj for the tour before Reclos and Nolujo lead you out of the room. “How did you enjoy the tour?” Nolujo inquires.

“It was pretty interesting,” you comment, and Marilu nods in agreement. “I liked learning about the different products and seeing them in action.”

“Would you like a bellybutton ball or a tickle vest?” Nolujo wonders. “We would be happy to buy you the products if you want them.”
1133111111112121211112113123.title: Micro-Tickle Helicopters

choices: Go to a hotel for the night
11331111111121212111121131233.content:
“I would like that,” you accept. “Is it alright if I get one of each or should I buy one myself?”

“We will buy you both,” Reclos inserts. “You are our guest on this planet. Let us go to the gift shop.” The executives lead you to the gift shop on the main floor, and when you enter, you see several different tickling devices. You follow Reclos to a section with several hundred bellybutton balls. “What’s your bellybutton size?”

“I’ve never heard of a thing like that before,” you respond, confused at the question.

“It’s the diameter of your navel, and it determines what size bellybutton ball fits in it,” she explains. “We’ll just try out some to find out what it is.” The executive picks out a ball a little less than the size of her bellybutton, and she tries to stick it in your tummy button, but it is too big. “That’s probably about two sizes too large. Let’s try a different one.” Reclos grabs another bellybutton ball and places it in your navel, where it fits snugly. “That one works! Your bellybutton size is 8. Just to let you know, the average Kichi has a bellybutton size of about 12. So, what kind of tool or tools do you want on the ball?”

“What kind of tools are there?” you question.

“There’s a ton of possible tools,” Reclos answers. “You can get fingers, feathers, electric toothbrushes, Kichi tails, and even things like paintbrushes or raspberry machines. Does that give you some ideas?”

“Can I try out the raspberry machine?” you ask, curious about what it does.

“Sure,” Reclos confirms. She goes and grabs another bellybutton ball, bringing it back to you. “Put this in your bellybutton.” You insert the ball, and then Reclos continues, “I’m going to put this on low intensity with a raspberry every ten seconds. I’ll let it blow a couple on you and see how you like it.” She presses a button, and you feel a small raspberry being blown in your navel, causing you to squeal and giggle in surprise. However, this ticklish feeling goes away in a few seconds, and you wait for the second raspberry to come. You giggle lightly when another raspberry enters your tummy button, enjoying the low-intensity tickling. After the second zerbert, the executive turns off the machine. “You can take the ball out of your navel now. How did you like it?”

“It was fun,” you proclaim. “I really enjoyed it.”

“Well, that is one of your options,” she announces. “Would you like the raspberry bellybutton ball or something else? We are willing to pay for up to three of these bellybutton balls for you.”

“I think I’ll take this,” you decide. “I think I’ve decided on the other two, but I have a question first. How do they make the Kichi tail bellybutton balls?”

“They replicate a tail from natural materials and put it in the ball,” Reclos notifies you. “No actual Kichi tails are in the machine; it just feels like a tail is tickling you.”

“That is good,” you declare. “I think I’d like one Kichi tail and one electric toothbrush bellybutton ball, along with this raspberry ball.”

“I’ll go get them, and Nolujo can take you over to the tickle vests,” Reclos dictates.

“Come with me,” Nolujo broadcasts. “We just need to find your stomach size to get a correct tickle vest.” You follow Nolujo a few aisles over, where you see several different sizes of tickle vests. “You look like a 25 to me. Let’s test it.” She takes out a tickle vest and hands it to you. When you place it around your midriff, it covers the clear majority of the midsection, but a tiny bit is left uncovered. “Hmm, that looks one size too small for you. We want to make sure the vest is tickling your whole tummy instead of just some of it.” You remove the vest and replace it with a new one from Nolujo. “That looks perfect on you! You can take it off now so we can buy it. Let’s find Reclos with the bellybutton balls.” As you head back towards the entrance, Reclos joins you. The two Kichi executives purchase the tickle tools for you, and then all of you head outside the gift shop, where you meet up with Marilu. “Reclos and I are headed out to a tickle club. Would you like to join us? We will pay for you if you come.”
11331111111121212111121131233.title: Bellybutton Balls and Tickle Vests

113311111111212121111211312331.content:
“I’ll go tickle clubbing with you,” you announce to the two Kichi executives. “Marilu, are you coming with us?”

“I’m always willing to go tickle clubbing when I’m on Feather Jewels,” your partner responds. “Let’s go.”

“Follow me,” Reclos proclaims. “My pod is out back. We can take it to the tickle club.” Everyone heads out to Reclos’ pod, which is like a car, but thinner and circularly shaped. When all of you are in the pod, you are next to Reclos in the front, while Nolujo is behind you and Marilu is to the rear of Reclos. The executive begins to drive away from Navel Enterprises, and you hear a little giggle escape from the back seat. Turning around, you see that Nolujo has been tied to her seat and feathers from your seat are covering her bare belly. “It’s a function of the pod, human. I can tickle anyone that I want to with the push of a button. I thought Nolujo needed some laughs right now.” You continue to watch as Nolujo’s laughter increases with the tummy tickling. After about five minutes, Reclos broadcasts, “We’re almost at the tickle club. When we get there, we’ll help you navigate it.” Soon after, the pod stops, and Nolujo’s backseat tickle torture ceases. The four of you exit the pod and walk into a cylindrically-shaped building where laughter can be heard from the outside.

Once inside, you follow Nolujo and Reclos to a counter. “Hello, what can I do for you?” a Kichi behind the counter, who is wielding a large feather, asks as she brings the feather over to your side.

“We’d like to get a room for a group of four with accompaniment,” Nolujo states. “All Kichi with stomachs as the most ticklish spot.”

“Would you like to be ticklers, ticklees, or both?” the Kichi inquires as she takes the feather back and swipes it under the counter, causing laughter to come out from an unknown source.

Nolujo turns to you, and you decide that you would like to be a…
113311111111212121111211312331.title: Tickle Clubbing

choices: Get back to tickling her with your fingers
1133111111112121211112113123313.content:
“I’ll be a switch,” you request to the Kichi at the desk as the laughter from under it increases substantially.

“We can arrange that,” the desk Kichi states as she uses her free hand to type on a small device. “That will be 152.5 chooks.” Nolujo hands over some money, getting a small amount back. “Your accompaniment will meet you on the fifth floor in Room 34. Have a wonderful and ticklish time!”

“Thank you,” Reclos says as you follow the three Kichi away from the desk. You head over to a machine appearing to be an elevator, getting in with a few more Kichi. As you get in the elevator, Nolujo quickly reaches out and presses a button with a strange symbol on it, pulling her arm back in just as fast. One of the other Kichi darts her arm back and forth at the same speed, lighting up another button on the screen. After this, the doors close, and the elevator begins to move upward slowly. When it first stops, the other Kichi exit, and you are left alone with Marilu, Reclos, and Nolujo. You wait for the elevator to travel vertically for another thirty seconds before it halts again. This time, Marilu, Reclos, Nolujo and you walk out, and you follow them through a maze of a hallway. As you walk, you see several different alien species on the ground, some tickling and some being tickled, and laughter filling the halls of the tickle club everywhere you go. Eventually, Reclos directs the group into a room, where four Kichi are waiting for you.

“Hello!” one of the Kichi announces as the four of you enter. “I’m assuming you are the four that are supposed to meet us here for some switch tickling? In this, you can choose whether to be tickled or to tickle us, and you can switch roles back and forth with us whenever you want.”

“Yes, that is us,” Reclos confirms. “I suppose we should pair up.” Your three Kichi quickly pick out partners, and you are left with an employee that is 2.2 meters tall.

“Hello; my name is Sorwd,” the tall Kichi introduces herself with a smile. “I’ll be your partner for today. Have you ever been to the Feathers Club before?”

“No, I have not,” you respond.

“Well, welcome,” Sorwd proclaims. “I’ll give you a little explanation; you looked a little lost. What we are in now is a switch room, so we are free to switch back and forth from being tickler and ticklee. You are in control of when we switch and how the tickling occurs. This includes tools, time, restraints, and tickle spot. In this room, we have some chains on the wall and chains on the floor that ticklees can be locked in. We also have stocks in case someone like you with feet wants them tickled. As far as tickle tools go, we have a wide variety: you ask for it, it’s probably here somewhere. Now I think we are ready to get down to the important matters for starting. If you are being tickled and want the tickling to stop, just tell me and I will stop immediately. However, if you are tickling me, you only stop when you want to or if I stop laughing. So, do you want to begin as the tickler or ticklee?”

“I’ll start out tickling you,” you declare. “I’d like to use the wall chains on you.”

“Alright,” she replies. “Just so you know, my most ticklish spot is my midsection.” The two of you head over to the chains that are resting on the close wall, and Sorwd slips her wrists into the restraints. Before she has a chance to think about getting out, you close the chains and lower your hands to her bare belly. Your fingers commence wiggling, and your ticklee quickly breaks down any defenses. “AHAHAHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Enjoying seeing Sorwd laugh, you tickle all over, trying to find a particularly sensitive area of her stomach. Like all the Kichi you have tickled, you find your target at the center of the tickle spot, right in the navel. Both hands descend on the small tickle spot and drive the ticklee to high pitches of laughter, but she does not plead for mercy at all. “OHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHA!” Following six minutes of the tickling, you slide your fingers out to her sides and then give her a break, and her laughter dies down quickly. “Did you enjoy it?”

“Yes, I did,” you affirm. “It was very fun!”

“So, what do you want to do now?” she questions. “I can direct you to tickle tools if you want, you can just keep tickling me with your fingers, or we can switch spots. Whatever you want.”
1133111111112121211112113123313.title: Switch

11331111111121212111121131233131.content:
“I’d like to get some tickle tools for this,” you state.

“Of course,” Sorwd responds. “There’s a stock in the closet to the right of the door. You can pick whatever you want to get from there. Also, there is a stock of ticklishness-enhancing oils on the left side of the door.” You stroll over to the oils first, looking over the foreign writing on them. Eventually, you decide on a couple to try on your ticklee, and you head over to get some tickle tools. You select a feather drill and another tool with a small clamp-like object at the end, wondering what it does.

Upon returning to Sorwd, you set the feather drill and oils down and hold up the clamp tickle tool and inquire, “What does this tool do?”

“It clamps onto a vulnerable area, such as a navel, and sends vibrations through the ticklish area,” Sorwd informs you. “That one is a very effective tool, and it typically cannot be used for more than ten minutes on even the best-protected species. This is because the intensity of the vibrations, if continued over a long time, can injure a species. Don’t worry about this constraint; all our tools here automatically shut off after a minute to give the ticklee a break from tickle vibrations, and there are zero negative effects from this amount of tickling. In fact, I like the tickling that the vibrations produce, so don’t feel bad at all about using that on me.”

Comforted by the Kichi’s admission that she enjoys the ticklish vibrations, you clamp the tool on her bellybutton and flip a switch on it, lighting up a button. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” she screams out in laughter. “IHIHIT TIHIHICKLEHEHES SOHOHOHO MUHUHUCH!” Sorwd thrashes from side to side as much as she possibly can, trying to escape the tickling in a futile effort. As promised, once a minute hits, the vibrations quickly die out, and the light on the machine turns off. You give Sorwd a minute to stop laughing as you unclamp the machine and return it to the stock of tickle tools. When you return, she has calmed down and speaks up to you. “Whew! That was quite the tickling. I always love that, even though it is temporarily exhausting. I’m ready for whatever you want now.”

“What’s this oil?” you question, holding one of the bottles close to the Kichi.

“That is 4 Guwak midriff enhancer,” she notifies you. “We measure ticklishness in guwaks, and this increases the ticklishness of abdomen where it is applied by 4 guwaks for an hour. Relatively speaking, this is a weak oil, but it does make the ticklee slightly more ticklish. If you place it anywhere but the midsection, it will not take effect, as it only interacts with chemicals that are present in the midsection.”

Curious to see how much of an effect this will have on Sorwd, you take some out and rub it on her bare belly. You lift your fingers up to the Kichi and spider them over her tickle spot, and she bursts out laughing. “HAHAHAHA! THAHAHAT REHEHEHELY TIHIHICKLEHEHEHES!” As your fingers scramble around the ticklish tummy, you notice that Sorwd seems to be just as ticklish as when you were tickling her before. You continue to tickle her for a minute, and then you cease your efforts, and she catches her breath easily. “I guess that one didn’t have much of an effect on me; my stomach is already super sensitive.”

“Yeah, I guess not,” you admit. “What does this one do?”

“That one will affect my ticklishness,” Sorwd announces. “That’s 400 Guwak midriff enhancer, so it will increase my ticklishness by 400 guwaks for half an hour. I suggest that if you want to get really good laughter out of me, take advantage of the half hour you have.”

Excited to see just how ticklish this oil will make Sorwd, you rub a full complement of it all over her most ticklish spot. “I wonder how much this will tickle for you,” you tease, running a single finger up her side. Sorwd gasps and giggles a bit as the finger travels on her skin. “Let’s really test this now.”

At this, you run all your fingers across the Kichi’s ticklish tummy, and she rapidly breaks down in laughter. “OHOHOHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOHOHOHOHO! PLEHEHEHEHESE!” Smiling as you continue the tickle torture, you spider the broken ticklee’s bare belly mercilessly for ten minutes, and she continues to struggle and beg for mercy. You pick the feather drill up where you had set it on the ground. Turning the device on, you insert it into your victim’s navel. “NAHAHAT THEHEHE BEHEHELEHEHEBUHUHUTOHOHOHON! IHIHIHITS TOHOHO MUHUHUHUCH!” The drill eliminates the remaining resistance inside Sorwd, and she stops squirming, only laughing helplessly. After ten minutes, you have a little mercy on her as you remove the feather drill from her bellybutton. She is still laughing from the aftereffects of the drill when you blow a raspberry in her tickle spot, causing another spurt of laughter to exit her mouth. “HAAHAHAAHA!” Seeing that the Kichi is very weakened, you reduce your tickling to light strokes and wait a minute before blowing another zerbert in her navel. You end up raspberrying her once every minute for the remainder of her time of enhanced ticklishness, at which point you completely cease the tickling. Still recovering from the intense tickle torture, Sorwd continues giggling through the time you put the drill and both the oils back in their respective places. It takes her a full ten minutes to regain her normal breathing pattern, and she finally addresses you. “You’re quite a good tickler, human. What do you want to do next?”
11331111111121212111121131233131.title: Tickle Tools

113311111111212121111211312331313.content:
“I’d like to have a tickle fight with you,” you proclaim.

“Of course,” Sorwd states. “The release mechanism is the same as the trapping mechanism for the chains here.” You release her from the chains and she lands on the ground softly. “Are you ready to start?”

You nod, and the Kichi begins to slither towards you, waving from side to side. Trying to quickly come up with a plan to get her, you are surprised when her hands reach out and begin tickling your sides. “OHAHAHAHAHA!” you laugh out in shock. You squirm backwards, and Sorwd cannot keep up with you, giving up the tickling and taking a defensive posture.

“Humans are very ticklish, aren’t they?” she questions. “I’d like to tickle that bare belly again; it was fun.”

Ignoring her teasing, you formulate a plan to get back at your current partner, and you slide to the side, attempting to attract her attention to the other tickling going on in the room. Marilu is soon tickle torturing her partner behind you, and you see the glimpse in the Kichi’s eyes that she is distracted, so you make your move. Sprinting towards you, you catch Sorwd off guard, and you tackle her to the ground, starting to tickle her tummy. “HAHAHAHAHAHA!” she laughs at the newfound tickle torture. Pinned down with nowhere to move, the Kichi does the only thing she can to help herself: she brings her tail to your bare feet.

“HEHEHEHEHEHE!” you laugh as the tail wriggles over your bare feet. “YOUHUHUHUHU NEHEHEHED TOHOHOHOHOHO GIHIHIHIVEHEHE IHIHIHIHIHN!” You press harder against the midriff, and soon your tickling pays off as the tail loses its energy to tickle. Right away, you punish her for tickling you by blowing a raspberry on her bellybutton.

Within a minute of ending her tail offensive, Sorwd screams out, “HAHAHAHAHA! IHIHIHIHI GIHIHIVE IHIHIHN!” You raspberry her once more after she surrenders, and then you cease all tickling. “You tickle too well. How much training do humans give their children on tickling methods? I’m guessing they start pretty young.”

“Actually, humans are just naturally good at tickling,” you declare. “We don’t train on tickle techniques.”

“That’s interesting,” she remarks. “Well, what should we do now?”
113311111111212121111211312331313.title: Kichi Tickle Fight

choices: “No, I want to tickle you again”
“Yes, but add some tools this time”
1133111111112121211112113123313132.content:
“I want to see how a professional Kichi switch works on the tickler end,” you tell Sorwd.

“I’d love to do that,” Sorwd states excitedly. “Anything you want or don’t want in particular?”

“Umm, I think it’d be better if you just use your fingers,” you decide. “No tools for sure. Also, I think you should focus on my belly. That’s my most ticklish spot, and I enjoy it there the most.”

“Alright, I’ll do that, then,” Sorwd affirms. “What do you want as your safeword?”

“Umm, how about orange?” you suggest. “It’s a color on Earth.”

“That will work; it’s actually a really good choice,” Sorwd encourages you. “Now, do you want to be tied to the wall like I was, tied somewhere else, or not tied up at all?”

“I’ll do the wall,” you decide. “You will let me out if I say so, right?”

“Yes, that’s part of the job description,” Sorwd dictates. “I always follow the rules of this club, and if you want at any point to be tickled without being tied up, I’ll be very happy to do so.”

“That’s alright; I’ve just never done this before,” you announce, a little more confident in yourself. “Let’s do this.”

Sorwd restrains you to the wall, and she immediately begins teasing you, “Ooh, looks like I’ve got a ticklish human in my grasp. I wonder just how ticklish he is, especially here!” Her fingers start tickling all over your bare belly right as she finishes talking.

“HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you scream out in laughter, unable to contain yourself for even a second, as you see that being good at tickling is a Kichi trait. “THAHAHAHAT TIHIHIHIHICKLEHEHES!”

“Oh, I didn’t even think it tickled a tiny bit,” Sorwd teases as she digs in a little more, increasing the ticklish sensation. “I mean, it’s not like we’re in a tickle club where everyone gets tic-tic-tickled! Otherwise, you might be in a ticklish situation, all tied up like that. And this tummy of yours might just be getting the tickling of a lifetime. So it’s a good thing we’re not in a tickle club here.”

“STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP TEHEHEHEHEHESIHIHIHING MEHEHEHEHE!” you protest through laughter, as the teasing seems to be making the tickling more effective.

“Stop teasing? I don’t think I can stop teasing until I stop tickling,” Sorwd denies your request as she continues tickling you.

Soon enough, you realize that you are enjoying this tickling at least a little bit as you feel the Kichi fingers tickling all over your midriff. However, everyone has their limits, and you realized that this just was tickling too much over ten minutes in when you yelled out through all your laughter, “OHOHOHOHORAHAHAHAHANGE!”

The tickling immediately came to a halt, and Sorwd looked you over carefully to make sure that you were fine. “Human, are you alright?”

“Ye-yes, I-I’m fi-fine,” you stutter, still feeling the aftereffects of the tickling. “That was quite fun.”

“Would you like me to continue after I get you something to drink?” Sorwd questions.

You pause and consider this before answering…
1133111111112121211112113123313132.title: Tickled by Sorwd

choices: Tied down with two Kichi tickling your tummy
With a Kichi standing over you
1133111111112121211112113123313133.content:
You are about to respond when you hear a voice behind you. “Human, it is time for us to go,” Reclos announces. “We need to get back to my house for the night.”

“Alright,” you declare. “Well, it was fun to meet and tickle you, Sorwd! I had a really great time.”

“As did I,” the Kichi dictates, “especially for the short time that I got to be the tickler. I hope you are able to visit again later, and maybe I can even be on the other side of the feather then. Have a wonderful stay on Feather Jewels!”

You wave goodbye to her, and then you head over to where Marilu had been. An exhausted Kichi, obviously having been tickle tortured the entire duration of your visit, slumps in her chains as your partner sets her tools away. Once all her things are placed back, your group of four heads out of the tickle room back into the hallways of the tickle club.

In the halls of the tickle club, alien laughter continues to fill the air as a mix of ticklers and ticklees interact. A few orange aliens of an unknown species begin to approach your group, and you become suspicious about their purpose. Looking right next to you, you can see that Marilu also appears concerned, as she slides her hand into her pocket subtly. The aliens continue to come closer, and your partner removes a small piece of equipment from her pocket, preparing for a confrontation. Suddenly, you feel something tickling your bare sides, and you burst out in ticklish laughter, “HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Your tickler is not using fingers, but something smooth that brushes against your sensitive sides. Unable to turn around, you collapse as the tickling extends to your entire abdomen, driving you crazy with laughter. You manage to roll onto your back just in time to see the rest of your group being taken down with midriff tickling. Within a few seconds, the unknown aliens lean down and tickle everyone in your group. Your bare belly is a target of interest for two of the new aliens, as they explore just how ticklish your most ticklish spot is. After what feels like hours of tummy tickle torture, the aliens finally cease -their activities, during which they restrain you and you have become a ticklish wreck.

“State your species name,” one of the orange aliens orders you.

“I am a human,” you stumble out.

“A human,” the alien repeats. “I have not heard of this species, but you seem suitably ticklish. I shall tickle your stomach some more.”

“No, please DOHOHOHONT!” you are cut off as the alien gets back to running a tickle machine against your stomach. This particular tickle machine is like a small car that drives across your midsection, tickling as it goes. Nevertheless, this tickle session does not last nearly as long, as you hear some new laughter in the air before the machine is removed and you are untied.

“NOHOHOHO!” the orange alien, who is now the target of the tickle car, yells. You look up to see that a Kichi who appears to work at the club is the one that has freed you.

“Thank you,” you thank the Kichi who has rescued you from the strange alien.

“No problem,” the Kichi announces. “Roliers are infamous for trapping anyone they can get their machines on and tickling them for extended periods of time. Luckily, they’re just as vulnerable to the machines as other species. I’ll make sure she stays occupied with these for a little bit. You are free to go wherever you want now. Enjoy the rest of your night!”

“Thank you again,” you repeat before linking up again with Marilu, Reclos, and Nolujo. “So, we are heading to Reclos’ house, correct?”

“Yes,” Reclos confirms. “Let’s head down to my pod.” The four of you make an uneventful trip down to the bottom floor and out of the tickle club. Once you exit, everyone enters the pod in the same configuration as earlier. The pod drives to what you figure is Nolujo’s house, and she is let out there. After Nolujo departs, the pod continues to run until it parks at a different dwelling.

“Welcome to my home,” Reclos proclaims. The place is shaped like a dome, and it is decorated with feathers around the windows and doors. When you enter, you see several more feathers and what appears to be a tickle room. Various machines reside around the room, as well as chairs and recliners. “This is my living room; it is where I typically spend most of my time here apart from sleeping. Plenty of tickling goes on in here during the day, but as you can see, no one is currently here. Right now, let me show you to where you will be staying tonight; you must be tired.” The three of you head through a series of hallways with feathers hung up until you near the end. “These two rooms are where you will be staying tonight. Human, you will be on the left, and Marilu will be on the right. Please feel free to let me know if there is anything you need.”

“Thank you,” you both respond. You stroll into the left room, turning the light on as soon as you enter. In the room, you observe a bed, a few chairs, a closet, and surprisingly enough, chains hanging from the wall. Opening up the closet reveals tickle tools and oils intermixed throughout the shelves. Finally, you head to the bed, and you notice another difference: there are restraints on the edges of the bed. However, you do not worry about these right now, as you are very tired. You get under the blanket on the bed and fall asleep, waking up…
1133111111112121211112113123313133.title: Tickle Ambushed

choices: Chains bind you to the recliner, and your tickling starts
You are moved to a chair, and your tickling starts
You are put in a tickle machine
11331111111121212111121131233131331.content:
“HAHAHAHAHAHA!” you laugh as you jolt up to the feeling of twenty Kichi fingers dancing over your bare belly. “STAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIHIT!”

“Well, hello there, ticklish human,” one of the Kichi teases as they continue to tickle torture you. “We came in to wake you up, but you are way too ticklish for us to stop now. Isn’t that right, human?”

“YUHUHUHUHU CAHAHAHAN STAHAHAHAHAP!” you yell in hysterical laughter. “PLEHEHEHEHESE!”

The aliens’ fingers travel all around your stomach, although they ensure that your bellybutton has at least one finger in it at all times. “Oh, does that human want us to stop tickling him?” the other Kichi taunts. “It seems as if the human does not know our customs for this situation.”

“What a pity,” the first Kichi comments. “Looks like we’ll just have to teach him what happens to males who are guests in a Kichi’s home.”

Suddenly, you hear the door open. “You can stop and release him; I think he’s had enough tickling for now,” Reclos’ voice commands the two Kichi.

“Of course, Mistress Reclos,” one of the Kichi responds as they withdraw their hands. Soon after, you are released from your bonds, which they had put you in during your slumber. “Well, human, I think it is time for you to eat. Follow us.” You follow the two Kichi to a room next to the living room. When you walk into the room, the Kichi usher you to a chair next to a table. “Sit down.” You sit, and the Kichi head over to a counter, bringing back a plate of food and a cup of water. “Here is your food, human; we read that humans eat this. We hope you enjoy it. Please let us know if you need anything else.”

“Thank you,” you reply. Looking down at your food, you see that they have given you some meat, most likely ham, and some fruits. You eat the contents of the plate and drink the water, enjoying your meal. Once you are finished, you call out to the two Kichi, “I am finished; what would you like me to do with the cup?”

“We will take them for you,” one of the Kichi states. Once the Kichi has set the cups at another place in the room, she returns to you. “Please come with us again.” The two Kichi lead you to the living room, where Reclos is sitting down.

“Hello, human,” Reclos declares. “Please take a seat. How did you sleep last night and how was your meal?”

“They were both great,” you answer as you relax on a recliner. “By the way, I never have gotten the chance to ask yet: who are these two Kichi?”

“They are my tickle slaves,” Reclos notifies you. “They will be your hostesses today, and they will perform the Kichi customs for you.”

“Kichi customs?” you inquire.

“As you perhaps know, it is rare for a male visitor to come into a Kichi household, given that there are so few Kichi males,” Reclos explains. “So a male visitor is always honored with fourteen hours of tickling. Of course, this includes appropriate breaks for meals and rest, but we must appropriately honor the presence of the male. Those feathers that my slaves are holding will make great friends with your midriff today.”

“Wait, are you telling me that you honor your male guests by tickling them?” you inquire.
