“Yes, that is the common method of greeting them,” Reclos responds, looking at you as if you were crazy. “Ticklishness is held in high esteem among Kichi. The most ticklish Kichi are often elevated to the highest positions, and tickling is used for many awards. I must have neglected to tell you this earlier. But now to honor you being a guest here.”

Suddenly…
11331111111121212111121131233131331.title: A Ticklish Awakening

choices: Reclos tells them to take a break
The Kichi Tickle Police knock on the door
113311111111212121111211312331313311.content:
Suddenly, you feel your hands being pulled above your head and your feet being pulled out to the edge of the footrest. Chains bind your wrists and ankles in place, and then the two Kichi tickle slaves lean down. Very quickly, their feathers travel down to your bare belly, swiping across the ticklish area. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you burst out with the familiar sound of laughter. The feathers persist in their effort to make you laugh, simply tickling all over without regards to a spot on your midriff. As you are tickled, you thrash around in the recliner, trying to escape without any success.

“Oh, is the human really ticklish?” a tickle slave teases. “I think he should enjoy the honor of being tickled, but right now, it doesn’t look like that’s happening. He wouldn’t want to disrespect the Kichi traditions, would he?”

“OHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you continue to laugh as the feathers shower your ticklish tummy with attention. “IHIHIHIHI REHEHEHESPEHEHEHECT IHIHIHIT! IHIHIM JUHUHUHUST TOHOHOHOHOHO TIHIHICKLIHIHISH!”

At the mention that you were too ticklish for the treatment, a feather dips into your bellybutton, causing your laughter to go up in pitch. “I know this one is a male human, but that laughter sure sounds like it belongs to a female,” the other tickle slave taunts. “I wonder if all humans are this ticklish. They sure would be fun to tickle if they are.”

“I definitely agree,” the first tickle slave agrees. “I really would like to tickle another human to test the entire species. It could be a very exciting experience. Human, can we tickle more of your species?”

“NAHAHAHAT YEHEHEHET!” you yell in laughter. “MAHAHAHABEHEHE WHEHEHEN WEHEHEHEHE GEHEHET BEHEHETEHEHER TRAHAHANSPOHOHORTAHAHATION! STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!” The two Kichi slaves keep tickle torturing you with their feathers for another few minutes before…
113311111111212121111211312331313311.title: Recliner Tickles

1133111111112121211112113123313133111.content:
“You can take a break from tickling him,” Reclos commands her tickle slaves. The two Kichi tickle slaves cease your tickle torture, and you gasp for breath. “Go in the next room.” Once the tickle slaves have left, Reclos addresses you, “What do you think of the tickle customs so far?”

“It’s a lot of tickling to take in,” you answer. “I’m not sure I can take fourteen hours of it.”

“I’ll have them go slower when they get back,” Reclos promises. “Hopefully that will make it more bearable for you. Do you have any questions before I bring them back in?”

“Yes,” you quickly interject. “What all species of tickle slaves do you have?”

“Just Kichi,” Reclos declares. “They are the cheapest and easiest to obtain.”

“What kinds of species do Kichi enslave?” you wonder.

“That’s a tough question,” Reclos replies. “I’d say it’s mostly Falwikes or Insoes. Falwikes are tall, extremely skinny, purple-skinned humanoids who are also incredibly ticklish on their bellies. They are also vulnerable to hypnosis, and tickle slavers usually ambush them from behind and tickle torture them to get them to look in our eyes, which hypnotizes them. On the other hand, Insoes are small creatures, also vulnerable to our hypnosis, with four eyes and four legs. Their most ticklish spots are their feet, although their legs are also very sensitive. They are typically captured by the tickle slavers because their multiple sets of eyes prevent them from ignoring the Kichi eyes. Once a tickle slave has been caught, they are transported on slave ships to tickle slave markets. There are no tickle slave markets on Feather Jewels, but there are some on nearby planets. Slaves typically go for 1500 to 10000 chiiks, depending on the species. Both Insoes and Falwikes are near the high end of the spectrum, given their sensitivity. Of course, Kichi, like other species, are not above making our own species tickle slaves. It isn’t as common as taking foreign tickle slaves, especially because we can’t hypnotize Kichi and there are several restrictions on taking Kichi as tickle slaves. However, we cannot ignore our own ticklishness, and there are different reasons a Kichi may end up being a tickle slave. Some enjoy being tickled so much that they allow themselves to become domestic tickle slaves, while others go into tickle slavery to pay off debt, and still others are just kidnapped and forced into it. This should be obvious, but the last one is obviously the worst, and it is condemned more than other forms. In fact, Feather Jewels is one of the few Kichi planets where kidnapping any species for the purpose of putting one into tickle slavery is against the law. On most planets, kidnapping all except for a few types of Kichi is illegal, but it is still legal to kidnap other species to put them in tickle slavery. Debt and voluntary tickle slavery usually come with heavy regulations on the use and amount of time that the slave can be tickled and restrained, but I do not mind following these regulations, as they are for the benefit of all. I know I got a bit off topic with regards to your question, but that’s basically the practice of tickle slavery among the Kichi summarized.”

“That’s a lot,” you respond, not knowing what to say.

“Yes, the issue is complicated,” Reclos acknowledges. “However, I do want to assure you that we will not attempt to forcefully make you a tickle slave or hypnotize you. We cannot waste the opportunity to have a wonderful tickler as yourself work for us, and it would be inhumane to force you into tickle slavery just as you are beginning your journey into the galaxy. That being said, I do know there are some who would not care about the implications of making the single representative of a species a tickle slave, but I am sure Marilu will watch out for you. If you get into any trouble with someone who seems like they may be this way, please contact us, and we will send assistance to you. Navel Enterprises has connections with the Merchant Queen of this planet, the honorable Queen Calle, and she will give us assistance to help you if we ask.”

“Thank you for offering this,” you awe at the power that Reclos possesses.

“There are benefits to being the main seller of stomach tickling accessories to the Merchant Queen,” Reclos admits. “She even lets us use her personal tickle slaves to help test the devices that we will sell to her. Wow. I’ve really gotten off topic. Do you have any more questions?”
1133111111112121211112113123313133111.title: Finally! A Break

11331111111121212111121131233131331111.content:
“Why would someone want to volunteer tickle slavery?” you question Reclos. “It seems like it is throwing away potential money to be tickled for as long as someone else wants. Plus, you have to do whatever the other person says or be punished.”

“I think you have a misguided view of tickle slavery,” Reclos announces. “Not all tickle slavery has no monetary benefits. In fact, voluntary tickle slaves are often paid a decent sum by their owners. Additionally, tickle slaves may get tickled for as long as their owner wants, but voluntary tickle slaves usually have some freedom outside of their tickling. While kidnapped and debt tickle slaves are locked up in cells when they are not being tickled or doing chores for their owners, voluntary tickle slaves are often free to roam their owner’s house or even go outside with a way to get contacted by their owner. Most of these tickle slaves are allowed to act like normal citizens in public, as long as they come back when their owner wants to tickle them.”

“Wow,” you are amazed at this. “I had no idea tickle slavery was like that. I just thought it was being locked up and tickled all the time.”

“You are not alone, I’m afraid,” Reclos proclaims. “Many other species look down on the Kichi tickle slave trade because they believe that it is just regular slavery with tickling added in. While I do believe that regular slavery is horrible and should be stopped, tickle slavery is so much different, so I think it should be allowed to continue to flourish. I don’t think I have emphasized how big of a role tickle slavery plays in Kichi culture. The vast majority of Kichi males are voluntary tickle slaves for their day jobs, as it pays very well and is highly respected.”

“How does that work?” you inquire, curious.

“There are tickle slaving companies that sell them out to other Kichi, typically noblewomen,” Reclos explained. “They are sold out as voluntary tickle slaves for the day, and they are paid and released at the end of each day. My husband does this, and he makes about three times what I make at Navel Enterprises.”

“That sounds like quite a bit,” you declare, surprised, before you begin to speak your thoughts. “I wonder what it would be like to be a tickle slave.”

“I’m not sure you would like it, human,” Reclos warns quickly. “It is a lot of tickling, and your owner would not stop when you begged for it. However, if you really would like to learn about it, there is at least one company on Feather Jewels that does tickle slave simulations.”

“Tickle slave simulations?” you ask, your curiosity peaked.

“There is a company named ‘Tickle Slave for a Day’,” Reclos reveals. “They allow customers to simulate being a tickle slave for a day, and if the customer lasts the entire day, they connect them with tickle slaving companies for potential employment.”

“Last the entire day?” you question, a little alarmed.

“Since it is just a simulation and the customer is not actually a tickle slave, a safe word is provided,” Reclos notifies you. “If the safe word is uttered during the stay, all tickling stops and the customer is released. This is to make sure the customer has more control over the situation, and it makes it so they don’t have to endure tickling past their absolute limits. If the customer cannot make it through the entire day, they will not likely enjoy voluntary tickle slavery, so the simulation company allows them to go without informing any of the other potential tickle slaves. In addition, another safe word is given, which will not end the day of tickle slavery, but just tell the tickler to stop tickling and avoid tickling a certain spot. This is used if a ticklee finds that they are uncomfortable being tickled in a tickle spot, and the tickler will not tickle there for the rest of the time. The money is collected before the tickle slave shows up, and there are no refunds for an early release, as per the agreement the ticklee signs before beginning the simulation.”

“That sounds interesting,” you state. “What is the simulation like?”

“Well, all customers come in the night before, where they are put in a locked room, simulating a tickle slave ship,” Reclos begins. “Most tickle slaves, including voluntary ones, are connected with tickle slavers, who lock them in chains on a tickle slave ship before selling them. Voluntary tickle slaves are paid a significant amount of the money they are sold for, but since this is a simulation, no money is paid to the ticklees. During the simulation, customers are tied to the walls of the room, hands above the head, with bondage on the wrists and ankles. However, the ticklees are not stretched out, and the bondage is not painful. In the morning, there is a tickle slave market, where customers are ‘sold’ to employees of the simulation company, who will become the ‘mistresses’ of the customer for the day. A tickling, focusing on the most ticklish spots that were identified in the paperwork filled out during the purchase, is immediately applied to the ticklee. After this, the day progresses as a normal tickle slave’s day would, with a small ‘village’ inside the large building to simulate tickle slaves being able to wander around. Each customer is given a pager so their ‘mistress’ can call them back at any time for more tickling. Of course, if the given safe word, which is initially said at the payment time and restated to the customer before they are bound and in the morning, is said at any time, the customer is quietly released from the simulation building and thanked for their business. At the end of the day, professional tickle slaving companies send representatives to meet with the customers that last, which about 50% of the typical customer load does. The customers are free to negotiate with the tickle slavers to be sold into voluntary tickle slavery then, get contact information and negotiate later, or avoid volunteering to be a tickle slave entirely. When the customers that decide to become tickle slaves choose to act on this desire, they are given a comprehensive form that allows them to choose terms of service, including the time to serve, any particular spots they would like to be tickled in often, and any spots they would not like to be tickled during their service. The tickle slavers use this information to take them and sell them under their terms to a willing owner.”

“That’s quite a process,” you realize.

“Yes, it is,” Reclos affirms, giving you a couple of minutes to process the enormity of information before speaking again. “Do you have any more questions I can answer now, or would you like to continue with your honor tickling?”
11331111111121212111121131233131331111.title: Volunteer Tickle Slavery

choices: Stay in and let the trial go on
1133111111112121211112113123313133112.content:
You hear a knock at the door, and Reclos immediately states, “You can stop tickling him now. We have company.” As the feathers retreat from your abdomen and you recover from the tickling, Reclos goes and answers the door, seeing two Kichi Tickle Police officers. “Hello, officers. Is there something wrong?”

“Perhaps,” one of the tickle officers responds. “We heard rumors that you have a foreigner over at your house. We need to come in and see if the rumors are true.”

“Of course, you can come in, but I can tell you that there is a foreigner currently here,” Reclos declares.

“And I assume that you know the rules for foreigners,” the head officer questions.

“Yes, I do,” Reclos replies. “Foreigners doing business with Kichi living on the planet do not fall under the normal laws.”

“Ah, a common misconception,” the officer proclaims. “This is often the case; however, when it is a new species’ first time interacting with Kichi, that exception does not apply. We must take him in.”

“What’s going on, and where are you taking me?” you inquire, recovered from your tickle torture.

“There is a law on Feather Jewels that foreign species must go through a tickle trial,” the tickle officer explains. “There is an exception for tickle slaves or business partners of Kichi citizens. Nevertheless, there is one category which you fall under that is not included in the exception law. If this is the first planet that a foreign species visits in Kichi territory, they must undergo the tickle trial unless they are a tickle slave, regardless of business affiliation. We’re going to have to bring you to the tickle dungeon to prepare you for your tickle trial. Chances are, you’ll be cleared to conduct business with Kichi at your trial, but there is always the possibility that you end up spending time in the tickle dungeons.”

“I’m sorry, but I can’t do anything about this before the trial,” Reclos announces. “We will be at your trial to try to get you no dungeon time. You will notify us of when the trial is, correct?”

“Yes, of course,” the officer confirms. “You may even come along with us; it will not likely be that long before the trial begins.”

“Alright, release him; the officers need to take him,” Reclos orders her tickle slaves. The two slaves unbind you from the chair, and the officers come over to you, cuffing your hands behind your back. As they are doing this, Reclos retrieves Marilu and comes back to the living room. “Let us go to the dungeons, then.”

“Follow me,” the head officer broadcasts. You are led outside to a larger pod, and a couple of officers usher you into the back. While the head officer and another officer get in the front, the back is occupied by you, Marilu, Reclos and two Kichi Tickle Police officers. Another set of cuffs are placed on your ankles, preventing you from getting up, and you are strapped into your seat. As the police pod begins moving, you notice that despite you being tied up, there is still three of you to two tickle police, so you might be able to escape and avoid this tickle trial. Then again, it might be a better idea to let this trial take its course and just get out without tickle dungeon time. But what if they want you to spend time in the tickle dungeon? You eventually decide to…
1133111111112121211112113123313133112.title: Police Presence

11331111111121212111121131233131331121.content:
You choose to stay in and let your tickle trial happen. These Kichi Tickle Police seem nice, you reason, and they did say that you would probably get out without any time in the tickle dungeons. On your way to the dungeons, the back of the pod is eerily silent, everyone considering their next move in the situation. You finally get to a place where the pod stops after ten long minutes, and the Tickle Police remove the chains from your ankles, although your arms remain behind your back.

Upon exiting the back of the pod, you are taken by the police inside, where you meet more officers. “What is your species name?” an officer questions.

“I am a human,” you respond, a little intimidated by all the Kichi Tickle Police around you.

“What are you here for?” the officer inquires.

“They told me it was for a tickle trial,” you answer, still not quite sure what you are about to go through. You look around nervously, looking for any clue about your situation, but all you get are blank stares from the police.

“Proceed with him to Station 12 and prepare him,” the officer orders the police that brought you in. They immediately usher you to the right, through a series of hallways, and into a corridor. When you get to a room where a guard is holding the door open, you are brought inside.

“Human, we will prepare you for the tickle trial here,” the head officer announces. “First, we need to read you your rights and allowances. You have the right to have at most five Feather Jewels citizens represent you during your tickle trial. You have the right to produce your testimony of why you should be allowed to do business with the Kichi. You have the plead directly to the Kichi Merchant Queen Calle of Feather Jewels, who can declare you fit, partially fit, or unfit for business. You also have the right to not plead to her and instead plead to an eleven-member tickle jury, who can only declare you fit or permanently unfit unanimously. Any indecision among them or a partially fit ruling by Queen Calle will result in a short stay in the tickle dungeons, after which you will be released. The exact time that you will be sentenced depends on either how many judge you fit and how many rule you unfit or Queen Calle’s brilliant judgement. Lastly, you have the right to refuse tickling on a spot without penalty since it is inappropriate for even humans not close to you to touch you there; however, you must let us know of it before the trial begins. Now for your allowances. You are allowed two choice breaks from the tickling every half hour; all you must say is ‘Break’. In addition, you are allowed breaks from tickling if we sense you are having trouble breathing or are in serious physical pain. These types of breaks do not count against your choice breaks. Of course, you can be at any level of laughter during your tickling; you do not have to restrain or let yourself go while being tickled. You are allowed one spot for us to avoid tickling for non-touch reasons, although this will result in your stomach receiving tickling for the time that the other spot would have been tickled. The only constraint on this spot is that it cannot be your most ticklish spot, which in your case is your stomach. Lastly, you can choose to limit yourself to receiving tickling from at most three Kichi at once. The catch with this allowance is that more jurors, as well as Queen Calle, are more respectful of ticklees who allow themselves to be tickled by more than three ticklers at a time. However, you can still get out without dungeon time without exceeding three ticklers, although it is more difficult. Now that you have been read your rights and allowances, we are obliged to ask you about spots you refuse to allow us to tickle for biological reasons. Are there any?”

“Yes,” you reply. “In between my midriff and legs, not including my waist, are the body parts used for human reproduction. I also never allow anyone to touch the backside of this. These are the only spots that I require be avoided, as only very close humans touch each other there. I do not mind if you tickle me anywhere else.”

“We will oblige that when your tickle trial occurs,” the head officer confirms. “Do you want to appeal to Kichi Merchant Queen Calle now? If you do not, you will still have the opportunity to appeal during the tickle trial.”

“No, I would not like to appeal to her right now,” you notify the tickle police.

“That is perfectly fine,” the officer replies. “Now…”
11331111111121212111121131233131331121.title: Tickle Trial Preparation

choices: You are in a tickle torture room
You consult with your defense before your tickle trial
113311111111212121111211312331313311211.content:
“It is the custom before a tickle trial to have Queen Calle meet with the prisoner, even if they are not appealing directly to her,” the officer announces. We will go to her now.” The officers help you up, and they lead you out of the room. As you walk through several more hallways, you wonder what this Queen Calle will be like. Would she be a kind Kichi, looking out for the best interest of all, would she want to tickle torture you, or could she perhaps be somewhere in the middle? As you consider these things, you are stopped in front of a large room.

The two Kichi guards by the doors open them, and when you are ushered inside, you see several Kichi in a row with feathers stretched through the middle of the room. As you walk in, the feathers start shaking up and down, at which point you realize that they are right at your abdomen level. Prompted by the officers, you walk right into the stack of feathers and begin laughing as they caress your bare belly. You continue to endure the ticklish sensations on your midriff for about a minute as you walk through the middle of the room. When you reach the end of the feathers, a Kichi stops you, running her fingers over your ticklish tummy. She then slowly begins to move to the side and stops tickling you as she proclaims, “Human, I present to you, Merchant Queen Calle of the Kichi!”

You look up to the front of the room to see a Kichi relaxing on a large chair, which you assume is a throne. “Welcome to my throne room, human,” Calle broadcasts as she gets up. “It is truly a pleasure of mine to have a human grace me with their presence. I see that you are very ticklish, which I personally think is very attractive.” She walks over to you and places her fingers on your midsection. “Regardless of what the feathers say, I always like to test ticklishness in aliens for myself.” All at once, her fingers move across your ticklish tummy, and you break out in more hysterical laughter. She tickles you for a minute, finding your bare bellybutton particularly amusing. “Wow! I love this human! His ticklishness matches the upper limits of what I have observed. Human, I am even more honored than before to be with you. Officers, please come over here.” The tickle police hurry over to the two of you, and when they get there, the queen continues, “Such a ticklish alien should not be bound as he is. Remove his handcuffs now.” Although they look a little concerned, the officers comply, removing your restraints. You rub your wrists, glad they are free from the cuffs. “Human, you’ve endured quite a bit of tickling, and you’ve proven yourself worthy. Please tickle my stomach now.”

A little surprised by the request, you nevertheless place your fingers on the queen’s abdomen and wiggle them around. “HAHAHAHAHAHA!” the Kichi laughs as she quickly backs away. Not quite sure what to do but not wanting to be too aggressive, you do not follow her to keep tickling. She quickly recovers from the five-second tickle, proceeding to ask, “Why’d you stop?”

“I wasn’t sure how much tickling you wanted, and I didn’t want to go too far,” you reveal.

“Oh, humans are so cute!” she exclaims as she comes back to you. “Were you afraid that if you went too far, you’d have an extra sentence in the dungeon?” You nod affirmatively, and she continues, “Well, this just shows that humans are also very smart. I’m so glad we could meet them! Also, I am really looking forward to doing business with humans. Human, you can keep tickling me if I squirm away. I’ll make sure you know when to stop; it’ll be about a minute. Go ahead and start again.” Knowing your limits now, you reach out and begin to tickle Calle’s bare belly again. “HAHAHAHAHAHA! IHIHIHIT TIHIHIHICKLEHEHES!” The Kichi Queen managed to stand the tickling for a few seconds, but she quickly squirms away, squealing in happy laughter. Not about to let her get away, you follow Calle and dig your fingers into her navel, eliciting a whole new kind of laughter. “NOHOHOHOHOHO! TOHOHOHOHO MUHUHUHUCH!” The very ticklish queen easily succumbed to the tickling that you gave her, and she collapsed to the ground. Still not ready to stop, you get down on your knees and continue focusing on the Kichi bellybutton, and your ticklee squirms side to side, unable to avoid the tickle torture. Finally, after just over a minute has passed, Calle manages to laugh out, “OHOHOHOHOKAHAHAY! IHIHIHITS TIHIHIME TOHOHOHO STHAHAHAHAHAP!” Once you hear the cue to end, you remove your hands from the merchant queen’s midriff and get up. You offer a hand to Queen Calle, and she takes it, standing up as her laughter dies down. “Humans are quite good at tickling. I haven’t been tickled like that in a while, not even by my personal ticklers. I think that humans are some of the most wonderful aliens that the galaxy can offer. Unfortunately, I believe our time here has come to an end; your tickle trial is to start up soon. You have made a very positive impression on me, much better than nearly every other alien I have had the chance to meet up with. Please feel free to appeal to me if you desire, and I would love to meet up with you after your tickle trial.”

“Thank you for allowing me to spend some time with you, Merchant Queen Calle,” you announce, to which the Kichi smiles. “I also hope to see you sometime else.”

Once you have said this, the head guard returns and cuffs your hands behind your back again, reminding you that you are still a prisoner. She leads you out of the room, through another round of the midsection-level feathers, and back into the hallways. You walk for another few minutes until you enter a room.
113311111111212121111211312331313311211.title: Queen Calle

1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
The room that you enter appears to be a courtroom. You are taken to a comfortable chair in the center of the room, where your arms are tied above your head and your ankles are also tied down. In front of you is what you presume is a tickle jury, eleven Kichi sitting down in three rows of benches. Merchant Queen Calle enters and takes a seat next to the tickle jury, and then Reclos, Nolujo, and Marilu come and sit on a bench to your right. To your left, six Kichi with tickle tools reside, waiting for the tickle trial to start. As you are taking this all in, one of the members of the tickle jury broadcasts, “I think everyone is here. Let us commence the tickle trial! The ticklee is a male member of humans, and he is represented by the Kichi Reclos and Nolujo of Navel Enterprises, as well as Marilu of Feather Jewels. Human, would you like to say anything in defense of yourself at this point?”

You look over to your team of Kichi, and Reclos steps up. “Queen Calle and members of the tickle jury,” she addresses, “this human deserves to do business with the powerful Kichi. As I have learned during the short time I have spent with him, humans are very intelligent. This makes them ideal business partners for us because they are incredibly capable of not only assisting us in what we can do well, but also giving us new ideas and helping us expand our knowledge. In addition to this, humans are extremely ticklish and as good, if not better, ticklers than us. This shows that they can share the joy of tickling that the Kichi race has found, both in dishing it out and receiving it from us. Lastly, I would like to make the point that humans are kind and nonviolent. In this way, humans will not try to overthrow us and enslave so all, but instead will work with us for the betterment of both the Kichi and humans. I ask you to please allow humans to do business with Kichi on these conditions.”

“Is there anything else you would like to say before the tickle testing begins?” the juror inquires.

“Not now,” you respond, a little nervous about what will happen next.

“How many ticklers are you willing to have tickle you at once?” the Kichi questions.

“How many do you have?” you retort.

“I see you are brave, human,” the juror observes. “We like a ticklee who doesn’t mind the presence of several ticklers and will have six ticklers for you. I want two ticklers each on his neck, armpits, and ribs, please.” The six ticklers to the right of you all get up and approach your upper body. “Tickle him.”

All at once, you feel sixty fingers running over your upper body, and you burst out into laughter. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you yell. “IHIHIHIHIT REHEHEHEHEHELEHEHEE TIHIHICKLEHEHES!” You squirm and thrash around, trying to escape the tickle torture these Kichi are forcing you to endure. However, you refuse to beg for them to stop, thinking that they will take it as a sign of weakness. “HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” As you hysterically laugh, the Kichi get out tools and begin using them on you, exploiting your vulnerability. “HOHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Your voice goes up in pitch as you are tickle tortured, and then just like the tickling started, it suddenly stops. Still weakened from the tickling, you residually laugh for fifteen seconds.

“That was five minutes of tickling,” the head juror informs you as you recover. “You did not beg at all. We are impressed. Time for your lower body. I need two on his feet and four on his legs. Tickle him again.”

Right as you finish recovering from the last tickle torture, you feel forty fingers run across your legs, while two tails tease your ticklish toes. “HAHAHAHAHA!” you laugh, although your laughter is not as intense as before. The Kichi on your legs increase their tickling speed, trying to get you to laugh harder, but your legs are simply not very ticklish. Meanwhile, the tails on your feet wriggle in and around your toes, keeping you effectively immersed in laughter. Overall, you find it easier to keep control of your ticklish reactions this time, and the five minutes does not seem as long.

“Well, that was five minutes on your lower body, which must be significantly less sensitive than your upper body,” the head juror remarks, looking over at your Kichi representatives.

Reclos stands up and motions to speak, which the head juror acknowledges. “If I may, I would like to point out that the upper body is much more ticklish than the lower body. The human’s midriff is extremely sensitive, as you will find.”

“I guess we shall see,” the juror proclaims. “All six ticklers will now focus on the human’s bare belly. Human, especially for this one, we will not judge you if you beg. Tickle torture him.”

Without warning, you feel the full force of sixty Kichi fingers on your hyper-ticklish tummy. “HAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHO!” you give in to begging right away. You thrash around, trying to escape the tickle trap the Kichi have set for you. Nevertheless, it is all in vain, as the ticklers seem content to torment you. Around a minute in, tails and other tools are introduced, and you are overwhelmed by the ticklish feeling. “NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO! DOHOHOHOHOHOHOHNT DOHOHOHOHOHO THAHAHAHAT!” You endure four minutes of pure tickle torture, and then the Kichi abruptly cease, stepping away from you. Sweating profusely, you continue to laugh for another full minute as the effect wears off.

When you are finished laughing, the head tickle juror declares, “Well, the jury has reached a decision on your fate. You will..."
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Tickle Trial

choices: “I’m going to tickle interrogate some aliens.”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“go free,” the tickle juror finished up her statement. “Based on the evidence presented by Ms. Reclos and your tickle tests, we have concluded that humans would make good business partners for the Kichi. The defining factors were the evidence that you would not likely become hostile to the Kichi race, the tickling skill that Merchant Queen Calle told us you have, and the incredible resilience you showed while being tickled. In particular, the testimony by Reclos and the sensitivity of the human midriff are what convinced us that you will not be hostile to the Kichi. We would like to congratulate you on allying the human race with the Kichi, and may both races be bettered as a result of this. The tickle trial is now over.”

Right after the head tickle juror concludes her speech, the tickle police officers come over and unbind you from the chair, helping you up. You walk over to Reclos, Marilu, and Nolujo, who begin to escort you out of the courtroom. “Wait!” Queen Calle exclaims, causing the four of you to turn around. “I would like to request the human to come to my throne room again. Of course, your Kichi representatives would also be welcome. Would you like to come?”

“Yes, I would, Merchant Queen Calle,” you enthusiastically respond, happy for the invitation.

“Then please follow me,” Calle states. The five of you follow the queen to a small pod outside the courtroom. “Please get in the pod. My driver will take us to the throne room.” At this, you all squeeze into the pod, with the driver, Calle, and Nolujo filling up the front. You end up in the middle of the backseat, Marilu on your left and Reclos on your right.

Not long after the pod starts moving, you feel a poke to your left side. “HEHEHE!” you let out a tiny giggle as you accusingly look at Marilu. Then comes a poke to your right side. “HEHEHE!” You jerk back over and stare at Reclos. Suddenly, a whole complement of fingers runs up and down your left side, followed quickly by the same on your right side, and you lose your control. “HAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHO!” Hearing your laughter, Calle glances back at you and smiles, soon joining her own fingers in the mix on the front of your bare belly. “STAHAHAHAP THAHAHAHAHAT NOHOHOHOHOHOW!” Your entire stomach gets tickle tortured on the ride to the throne room, with even your navel getting its good share of the tickle treatment. By the time you get back, you are pleading with the three Kichi to stop and let you out. “Was that really necessary?” you ask once you stop laughing. “I just went through a tickle trial, you know.”

“Well, I am the Merchant Queen of a planet whose main attraction is feathers,” Queen Calle counters. “You didn’t go to the tickle dungeon, so I think this was an acceptable alternative. Come with me; the throne room awaits us.” Slightly reluctantly, you and your group follow the queen into her throne room. When you arrive, the entire group enters the ornately decorated room, and Calle goes to sit on her throne again. “Please bring two couches for my guests to sit on.” A few attendants quickly rush out of the room and bring back two couches, which they set down facing the throne. You and Marilu sit down on the left couch, while Reclos and Nolujo recline on the right couch. “Well, I invited you to get to know humans a little more. So far, I know that humans are extremely ticklish, but they are also skilled ticklers who happen to be kind. What else should I know about humans?”

“Well, I have gotten the opportunity to work as a tickle interrogator with Marilu here,” you announce. “We haven’t gotten any jobs yet, as we’ve been touring Feather Jewels. Is there anything specific that you would like to know?”

“What made you come to the Kichi?” Queen Calle asks. “There are several thousand species in the galaxy, so why us?”

“Well, I wanted to meet a species that was partially like humans, but looked a little different,” you answer. “I figured that I’d probably be dealing with all sorts of different species on my exploration of the galaxies, and I wanted to see how I’d react to someone who looked different than me. I was also very intrigued by the fact that Kichi have tails, so I decided to meet them first.”

“Very intriguing,” Queen Calle comments. “How ticklish did you think the Kichi were before you visited us?”

“I actually had no idea about how much the universe was based on tickling had before I came here,” you admit. “I was surprised when one of the first things that I did when I met Marilu was get tickled, and even more shocked that once I spoke to her, the first thing she asked me was my most ticklish spot.”

“Interesting,” Calle proclaims. “I heard that the Erimosi were the first ones to encounter humans. They did not tell you about the tickling customs?”

“No,” you confirm. “They told us that other aliens in the galaxy had particular customs, but not what they were.”

“That is particularly strange, since the Erimosi are very adept ticklers,” the queen declares. “In fact, this palace sometimes brings in Erimosi if I want an extended tickling. I hire them to tickle my bare belly for however long I want to be tickled, and they have never disappointed. If you are going into a career of tickle interrogation, they will likely be your most qualified competitors for jobs. Even the palace at Kich, which has almost exclusively Kichi employees, has some Erimosi hired as royal ticklers. They are experts at manipulating their fingers and tools to get the most ticklish reaction out of ticklees. If you get the chance, have an Erimosi tickle you; it is a very fun and revealing experience. Then again, you may not end up having a choice, since you are in the tickle interrogation business. I hear that Erimosi interrogators sometimes practice their techniques on competitors to eliminate the competition. Anyways, what is your plan after you depart from the Kichi?”

You think before responding,
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Freedom!

choices: See what else you can do here
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“I think I’ll continue to partner with Marilu and tickle interrogate some aliens to make some money,” you inform Queen Calle.

“An honorable career path,” the queen notes. “If you or Marilu ever need any support, please let us know, and the Kichi at Feather Jewels would be happy to assist you. Also, I am sure that we can get you some jobs, as I have seen your talent up close. As a matter of fact, I think some of the prisoners in my dungeon could use some of your tongue loosening effects, if you would be willing to take on the challenge. I must warn you, however, that interrogators who fail are punished severely, typically as new prisoners in the dungeon for some time. In that time, they will frequently become subjects for other tickle interrogators to practice their craft on. On that point, I have some former interrogators who are available for tickle practice, with no consequences for failure, if you would like to take some time before you interrogate the real criminals. Rewards for success will be very handsome, in the range of one to five thousand chiiks per successful interrogation, in addition to private tickle sessions with me if desired. You may have as much time as you desire to discuss it with your partner and decide whether you would like to start now or not. If you do decide to move on to somewhere else, I will always have an opening for you to tickle interrogate my prisoners. I also have openings for you to simply tickle torture my prisoners, without the risk of becoming a prisoner yourself. Anyway, take all the time you want.”

“We will take some time to think about it,” Marilu dictated before you had a chance to say the same. “Is there a private room nearby where the human and I can discuss this?”

“Yes, of course,” Queen Calle confirmed, seeming pleased. “Sabrene, would you please show them to the noble quarters?”

“Yes, of course, my queen,” one of Calle’s guards agreed before turning to you. “Please follow me. I will show you to your quarters for as long as you stay here.”

“Would you like us to come with you two?” Nolujo questioned us.

“No, thank you,” Marilu politely declined. “This should just be our discussion, since we are the interrogators. We will still be in contact with you regarding tickle interrogation jobs for Navel Enterprises.”

“Of course,” Reclos stated. “We will let you know if we require your services.”

“Before we go, I would like to know: how quickly can we meet with you if we have further questions or make our decision, Queen Calle?” I inquired.

“Is there anything on my schedule for the rest of the day?” Queen Calle asked an attendant.

“No, my queen, you are free for the rest of the day,” the attendant quickly answered.

“Then I will be free for the rest of the day to meet with you for whatever you need,” Queen Calle informed us. “I will have an attendant go with you. Laubeller, go with them, and attend to all their needs.”

“Yes, my queen,” an attendant responded as she came over to Marilu and you.

After around thirty seconds of awkward silence, Queen Calle spoke up again, “Human and Marilu, please take all the time you need to discuss this. We would be happy to host you for however long you want to stay here.”

“Thank you, Queen Calle,” you thank the queen again, and Marilu does the same. “Sabrene, was it? Thank you for waiting for us. I think we are ready to go now.”

“Please follow me,” Sabrene instructed. She guided Marilu and you down several hallways until you came to an ornate wing of the palace. In the wing, you see several well-dressed Kichi primarily tickling, but also being tickled by, Kichi in servant outfits. Feathers adorn the walls, although some of them have been taken off to be used in the ticklings that have caused laughter to fill the air. “This is the wing for the noble quarters. I must say, Queen Calle must be very impressed with you to invite you to stay here. Not very many non-nobles even get to see this wing. Here is your room.” Your room is very similar to the outside, with feathers adorning the walls, as well as paintings of Kichi dressed like the ones you saw outside tickling both other Kichi and foreign species. Several beds, all with restraints on them, were around the room under the paintings. “If you need anything, please ask Laubeller, and as the queen indicated, please feel free to take your time discussing her proposal. She did not say this, but the way she talked to you, I don’t believe that she necessarily wants you to only talk about it while you are here. Laubeller can fill you in on the other activities that you are welcome to participate in here. I hope to see you again, but I do have to go back and do my job for the queen.”

“Thank you,” Marilu thanked the Kichi guard before she left. “Well, human, what would you like to do?”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Tickle Interrogator for Life

1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“I guess I’m really not sure what I’ll do after I finish everything with the Kichi,” you say.

“May I suggest a tickle world?” Queen Calle questions. “They will take great care of that stomach of yours, and they’ll make sure you keep smiling. It’s the equivalent of pleasure worlds, except tickle worlds focus on just tickling you while you stay there. To summarize them, several ticklers tickle you all over day and night, with just a few breaks per day. This may sound like tickle torture, but their ticklers are specialized in making sure that their ticklees are having fun while being tickled. When the tickling is getting exhausting and torturous, the ticklers lighten up on the more sensitive areas and focus on the areas where the ticklee just giggles instead of taking breaks. I will say that I have never heard a bad review of a tickle world, and every tickle world that I have been to, I would go again. When I asked them, the employees of the tickle world said that their favorite type of ticklee is one with an extremely ticklish tummy, as it is a very easy spot to toy with and multiple ticklers can be there at once. This means that you would be very welcome as a ticklee, so you would be able to pick your ticklers at the tickle world. However, this is just a suggestion for you. I should get back to business. Are there any other species that you are particularly interested in meeting? We could possibly provide a place to ensure that you make contact.”

“Well, I was told that the Erimosi would also like me to make contact with the Ufu, Yathi, and Giglin species,” you reveal to Calle. “If it is in your power to provide a place for this, I would like to meet these species.”

“We can provide contact with the Ufu and possibly the Yathi, but we have not established any relations with the Giglin yet,” Queen Calle informs you. “In fact, there is an Ufu embassy on Feather Jewels, if you would like to us to introduce you to them there. For the Yathi, we would have to go to Tail Slithers. It is another Kichi planet where the Yathi have established an embassy. Of course, if you do not want to meet another species yet, we can delay the introductions. What would you like to do?”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Options

1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“You are hereby being sentenced to the tickle dungeon,” the head juror reveals. “Even though you seemed like a good business partner for the Kichi, it is much more beneficial now for the Kichi to determine all the details of the sensitivity of humans. You may begin tickling him again now, and just tickle his stomach.”

“NOHOHOHO!” you yell out as sixty Kichi fingers make their way back to your bare belly. The expert ticklers quickly break any resistance that you have left following your tickle torture, and then they begin to toy with your midriff. Soon your only movements are spasms in reaction to different tickling techniques, and your laughter goes from loud to silent to loud again. “HAHAHAHA NAHAHAT ------- HAHAHAHAHA!” With the intense tickle torture eventually becoming too much to bear, you finally permanently fall into silent laughter after fifteen minutes, and the tickling slows down and eventually stops.

“Good,” the head juror declares as you gasp to catch your breath after the unbearable torment. “Human, you must understand that you are much weaker than the Kichi, and we can force you to submit whenever we want. If you ever try to turn on us, we will tickle torture you until you realize your place as inferior to the Kichi. Now, I have not yet told you the extent of your sentence. You will be in the tickle dungeon…”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Sentenced

1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“You will be in the tickle dungeon for two days,” the head juror announces. “You found favor with many on the jury because of your current partnership with Marilu and your kindness to the Kichi so far, so only two of us wanted to see your ticklishness examined further. Luckily for you, since so many jurors sided with you, your tickling sentence will not be as harsh. You will be tickled for four hours a day for these two days, and the tickling can be divided up significantly. All tickling will be on your bare belly, and your ticklers will clarify any further questions you have when you get to your cell. In addition, since your Kichi representatives failed to successfully represent you, they will also be sentenced to two days in the tickle dungeon. The tickle trial will now be adjourned.” You are unlocked and taken out of the courtroom by two Kichi guards, who bring you to a cell.

Once you are in the cell, the guards sit you down on a chair and tie your arms above your head. They leave the cell, and a few minutes later, two new Kichi enter. “Hello,” one of them addresses you. “My name is Wufof, and my partner is Oveuza. We will be your ticklers during your tickle dungeon sentence. Before we begin your tickling, do you have any questions about what will happen?”

“Yes,” you answer. “Can you go over what all this sentence entails? The head juror wasn’t really clear.”

“Of course,” Wufof declares. “Basically, you have been sentenced to a very small time in the tickle dungeon. The Kichi would like to know more about the human species’ ticklishness, specifically on the midriff, so we will be performing a total of sixteen tickle tests on your stomach. Each test will be approximately fifteen minutes long, and some will be structured so one begins right after the last one ends. In addition to this, we will also tickle your tummy for another three hours, but not test it then. All this tickling will be divided up so that you do not get exhausted, with thirty minutes of tickling at a time maximum. Once that tickling session is done, you will get at least a thirty-minute break so you can recover. You can yell out a safe word that we will give you if you need the tickling to stop during part of the three-hour free tickling span. If you say the safe word during the tests, we will inform you that a test is going on, finish the test, and then give you at least two hours afterwards for a break. Also, you will be kept healthy, as we have healing liquid and food so that you do not become weak during your short time here. Four hours today will be spent tickling you, and you will get four more hours of tickling tomorrow, making eight hours in total. Does that answer your question?”

“Yes, thank you,” you respond. “I have another question. What kinds of tickle tests will be performed on me?”

“Most of the tests will focus on how your midsection reacts to being tickled by different tools and methods,” Oveuza informs you. “These include fingers, tails, feathers, feather dusters, tongues, raspberries, squeezing, writing utensils, electric brushes, standard brushes, oils, and tendrils, and we will test each all over your abdomen. The purpose of these tests is to observe how the molecules inside the human body react when each different substance hits a very ticklish spot. This tells much about the sensitivity of the ticklee, including why the spot is so ticklish and how to safely make the spot more sensitive. Of course, we will share this information with humans if they do not already possess it.”

“Wow!” you interject. “You can do all that with just a fifteen-minute tickle test? Humans have definitely not come that far in science, at least not on tickling. We will be very interested in the results when you get them.”

“I am glad you are excited, human,” Oveuza states, smiling. “The Kichi are always happy to share scientific discoveries with fellow allied species, which humans are set to become. Of course, we are also always happy to find out any species’ ticklish weaknesses and ways to exploit them, in this case to help both Kichi and human have fun while a Kichi tickles a human. If you would like, I can also put in a request to include what happens when a Kichi’s belly is tickled, along with your test results, in the information delivery to your ship.”

“That would be nice,” you confirm. “Humans also would like to know how to most efficiently and enjoyably tickle the Kichi so that both species can have fun as the tickler and the ticklee. Also, sorry for getting so off topic. You were telling me about the tests that you were going to perform on me, and I interrupted. If there is nothing else on the molecular analysis of tickling, can you please continue with this?”

“That was all we have on the molecular analysis,” Oveuza affirms. “We will also be performing a spot test on your midriff, which will tell us the most ticklish part of the human midriff. There is also one test that takes up two sessions, and we will not be your only ticklers for it. We are bringing in a total of ten ticklers to tickle your tummy and test how you react to a sudden gang tickling. The practical application of this test is to see how well humans would stand up against a common method of interrogation practiced by some species, where they bring in several ticklers to torment the most ticklish spot of the prisoner. In most cases, the ticklee gives up the information in a short time, but some species last significantly longer than others. I do not believe anyone has lasted thirty minutes, but we will keep our promise to stop if you endure it that long. In that test, you will be asked an extremely revealing question and then tickled until you give up the answer. Following your ‘surrender’, Wufof and I will lightly tickle you for the remainder of the thirty minutes. I know that might sound horrible, but keep in mind that these tests are to get a better feel for the relationship between humans and tickling, and they are not designed to purely torture you. We will be extra careful to make sure you have plenty of time to recover from that tickle session, and just so you know, your answer from that test will not be recorded or leave your cell. All of the equipment for our tests is in the back of the chair that you are sitting on, and it will automatically record data as you are tickled. I believe we have explained all the tests to you. Do you have any further questions?”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Short Tickle Sentence

1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.content:
“No, I don’t think I have any more questions,” you notify Oveuza and Wufof.

“Well, if that is the case, we can get started,” Wufof announces. “Be sure to let us know if you have any questions; we’ve tickled enough aliens to know when someone wants to ask us a question. Also, the safe word is going to be ‘Blue’ for your tickle sentence. We’ll start with testing our fingers on your bare belly. Let the tickling begin!”

“AHAHAHAHA!” you burst out in laughter as the skilled Kichi begin tickling your midriff. “OHOHO THAHAHAT TIHIHIHICKLEHES SOHOHO MUHUHUHUHUCH!”

“Well, of course is does, human,” Oveuza teases. “We’re tickle testing you, and we are getting great data! Laugh for us, human!”

“HAHAHAHAHAHA!” you endure the tickling, although your body squirms the small amount that your bonds allow vigorously. “AHAHAHAHA!” Although your words do not change, just simple laughter, your pitch goes up when the Kichi go to the center of your stomach and lower when they move out to the sides, telling them that your center is more ticklish. You thrash around for about six minutes, and then you stop for the rest of the session, as you are nearly out of energy.

Once the fifteen minutes are up, the Kichi remove their fingers from your skin. “Impressive, human,” Wufof comments. “You did not beg one time for us to stop tickling you. Most species would be crying within at most the ten-minute mark, but you lasted. I think that we will have a solid ally in humans when we get to release you. Anyways, the tests must go on. The next tool we will use is our…”
1133111111112121211112113123313133112111.title: Let the Tickling Begin!

113311111111212121111211312332.content:
“As much as I enjoyed this day, I’m getting pretty tired,” you admit. “I think I’ll go to a hotel for the night.”

“That is fine, human,” Reclos declares. “We can take you there and pay for your stay, since you are our guest. What about you, Marilu? Would you like to go to the tickle club?”

“I will stay with the human,” Marilu decides. “I have also had a long day, and I can use the rest for tonight. I can pay for my share of the room.”

“No, no, you are both our guests,” Reclos insists. “You showed us a great time out on your ship today. We will pay for both of you to stay at the Quills Hotel. I can take you in my pod. It is on the way to the tickle club, anyways.”

“Are you sure you want to pay for the Quills Hotel?” Marilu questions. “That is the most expensive hotel on Feather Jewels.”

“And you have shown us a wonderful time,” Nolujo responds as the four of you walk out to a circular car. “You deserve the best we can offer.” Nolujo and Marilu get in the back of the pod, while Reclos and you take the front. A comfortable ride takes you to a large building, and Reclos stops by the entrance, allowing Nolujo, Marilu, and you to exit and head inside.

When you enter the massive lobby, you are amazed by what you see. Thousands of feathers and Kichi symbols line the walls, and everything is ornately decorated. “Welcome to the Quills Hotel,” a Kichi receptionists warmly welcomes you. “How may I help you tonight?”

“A suite for two,” Nolujo requested.

“Any extra accommodations?” the receptionist asks with a smile.

“Meat for the human’s breakfast, and anything else they would like,” Nolujo answers, getting out a card from her pocket. “Put all of it on my card.”

“That will be 375 chooks,” the receptionist announces before taking the card. “You will be in Room 425. Your attendant will lead you there and take any luggage you have.”

“Enjoy your stay!” Nolujo encourages as she heads out and another Kichi comes out from a door by the receptionist.

“Hello,” she greets Marilu and you with a wide smile. “Welcome to the Quills Hotel. I am Rinaba, and I will be your attendant for the night. Here are the keys to your room.” She hands a small keycard to both Marilu and you as you get in an elevator. After she presses the button for level 4, Rinaba turns back to you. “So, what brings you to Feather Jewels?”

“Work,” Marilu comments happily. “We contract with Navel Enterprises.”

“Very nice,” Rinaba replies. “We get many customers working with Navel Enterprises to come here. Would it be too much to ask what you contract in?”

“Interrogation,” Marilu responds.

“I guess you must be pretty good ticklers, then?” Rinaba assumes.

“You could say that,” Marilu proclaims. “We enjoy our job.”

“Well, if you would like it, the hotel has some tickle slaves that we could bring up to your room,” Rinaba declares.

“We’ll think about it,” Marilu dictates as the elevator comes to a stop.

“Just let me know if you end up deciding to take them,” Rinaba states. “Follow me; your room is not too far from here.” After thirty more seconds, you show up at a room. “Here it is. Room 425. The chambermaids will be here in just a minute, and just dial the front office number if you would like anything from me. I will be happy to provide any services. Enjoy your stay!”

You unlock and open the door, and Marilu follows you in. Like the rest of the hotel, you are amazed at the décor that the suite exhibits. A few feathers are on the wall of the first room, along with a Kichi painting and some symbols. A large bed sits on the right side of the room, and a cabinet resides beside it. Walking past the bathroom into the other room, you find a similar setup. “Which room would you like, human?” Marilu offers you the choice.

“I think I’ll take this one,” you choose the second room. “Although both look very nice. Do you know what Rinaba meant by the chambermaids would be arriving soon?”

“I have heard of this hotel, but I have never stayed in here,” Marilu responds. “I’ve never heard anything about chambermaids, though, so I’m not sure why they are coming.”

Suddenly, you hear a knock at the door. “Room service!” a Kichi voice calls in. You head over and open the door, showing two Kichi with feather dusters standing outside. “Hello, you must be one of our guests tonight. We are pleased to be your chambermaids. Have you ever stayed at the Quills Hotel before?”

“No,” you say, still wondering why the chambermaids are in your suite.

“Well, we are happy to welcome you to your first stay here,” the maid kindly comments. “Now, we will have to ask each of you to go and lie down on your beds. Get comfortable.” Reluctantly, you obey the chambermaids, and one of them follows you, leaving the other with Marilu. “One of our customs at the Quills Hotel is to tickle all guests.”

Before you know it, the feather duster that the chambermaid is holding has made contact with your bare belly. “HAHAHAHAHA!” you laugh as the ticklish feeling. “OHOHOHOHO NOHOHOHOHO! NAHAHAHT THEHEHEHE BEHEHEHEHELEHEHEHE!” The duster continues its ticklish journey across your sensitive stomach, making short stops at your bellybutton and each of your sides. You try to squirm away and block the tickle attack, but it is no use, as the feathers consistently maintain contact with your midsection. A while later, when you have no idea how much time has passed, the feather duster finally come off and stop tickling you. Still giggling, you take a few minutes to recover.

“Thank you for allowing us to provide you with an insight to our customs,” the chambermaid addresses you. “Rinaba should be back soon to explain some of the choices you have for the night. Let her know if you would like to have us come back to tickle you more.”

She heads into the other room, and then both maids leave the hotel room, leaving you with Marilu. “Well, that was unexpected,” you admit to your companion.

“Kind of,” she allows. “Tickling is pretty important for Kichi society, so it can be expected. I wasn’t thinking it would be that intense, though.”

You are about to respond when the door opens and Rinaba walks in. “Hello, again,” she pleasantly greets you. “I hope you had fun with the chambermaids. Their dusters always seem to find the most ticklish places on our guests and make them giggle with excitement. However, I am not here to dwell on our chambermaids’ actions, although you are free to give me comments about them, good or bad. I would like to notify you of some of our services that you can choose to pick from. I believe I told you this earlier, but we have tickle slaves that we could bring to your room and let you tickle for the night. In addition to this, we have specialized ticklers that can tickle you, along with the chambermaids. The chambermaids are particularly ticklish themselves, so if you get the chance, you could engage them in a tickle fight. We also have a variety of oils and ticklishness enhancers that you can use to enhance your or others’ ticklishness. You may pick and choose from the list, or suggest something. I could not have covered it all, and we hopefully have what you are looking for.”

“I think I’ll get one of those tickle slaves for the night,” Marilu states. “What about you, human?”
113311111111212121111211312332.title: Tickle Hotel

1133111111112121211112113123321.content:
“I think I’ll get something from you,” you tell Rinaba. “You said you had tickle slaves, ticklers, and chambermaids. Is there anything else you have?”

“We also have ticklishness enhancers, and you would be able to choose how strong, that you can use on yourself or someone else,” Rinaba begins. “In addition, we have a full stock of tickle tools that you can use or have used on you. I’m sure if you ask about something, we probably have it.”

“Alright,” you state before you think about whether you want to tickle or be tickled. You eventually decide that for the night, you will be a…
1133111111112121211112113123321.title: Ordering from the Hotel

1133111111112121211112113123322.content:
“I think I’ll go to bed,” you announce with a yawn. “I’ve had a long day, and I need some rest.”

“Just let me know if you change your mind,” Rinaba responds. “I’ll have your tickle slave brought up for you right away. Also, human, if you want soundproofing, just shut the door, and you won’t be able to hear anything. Enjoy your stay at the Quills Hotel!”

You go back to your room and close the door, enjoying one of the first moments of silence since you arrived at Feather Jewels. After relaxing on your bed for a few minutes, you fall asleep.

You wake up…
1133111111112121211112113123322.title: Sleep

choices: We should have a tickle fight
We should go our separate ways
11331111111122.content:
You decide to take the high road and free Marilu without tickling further tickling. “Erin, remove the strap from her tail,” you order. The strap on top of the Kichi’s tail comes off, and then you detach the tape from her wrists.

Freed, she stands up and declares, “Well, we have done everything that we agreed to in our deal except for going our separate ways. When I leave, I will notify the rest of the Kichi about what I know of humanity. The Kichi will respect you as an equal species, and we will be able to establish friendly diplomatic relations with you when humans become more advanced. I’ll be happy to tell my people about your ticklish tummy, but we’ll also let you tickle our bare bellies. Would you like me to leave now, or should I spend some more time here? I should let you know that I have some presents on my ship for you because I enjoyed your company. If you would like me to leave, I will go get them and bring them here; otherwise, I will give them to you later.”

“I think that…”
11331111111122.title: Let her out

113311111111221.content:
“We should have a tickle fight,” I dictated to Marilu.

“A tickle fight?” she wonders.

“Yeah, we try to tickle each other into submission at the same time,” you explain, thinking that the Kichi does not know what you are talking about.

“I know what a tickle fight is; I’ve been in many of them before,” Marilu states. “I was just a little surprised that you wanted to have one. Kichi start tickle fighting at a young age; Kich is a very dangerous planet. Let me explain it to you. Kich is notorious for having many native Kichi taken and sold into tickle slavery. On the planet, tickle slaver gangs will do anything to get tickle slaves, and many Kichi are afraid of them. Sometimes they even threaten schools to make them hand over a certain number of students as tickle slaves. When someone is taken into tickle slavery, they are often tickled by their kidnapper in order to coerce them to go into the vehicle. Kichi learn how to tickle fight in order to be able to defend themselves. If someone is going to try to force you somewhere by tickling, knowing how to tickle fight can allow you to gain the upper hand and defend yourself. We get very good at tickle fights so that we can protect ourselves from the tickle slavers. With that in mind, do you still want to have a tickle fight?”

You think about what Marilu has just said. If this is all true, you probably don’t have much of a chance against her; she’ll probably tickle you silly before you can lay a finger on her. On the contrary, if you don’t do this, you may never to have the chance to tickle her again. “I think that we should still have one,” you decide. “Mercy will be the safe word to stop the tickle fight. However, because you have the obvious advantage of being trained to tickle fight, I get a feather duster to make the fight fair. Is that acceptable?”

“You can have two feather dusters,” the Kichi confirms. “Nevertheless, there is still one more thing required to make the tickle fight fair, and this is why I am allowing you to have two dusters. You must take the top of your spacesuit off so that both our midriffs are bare. I’m sure you’ll agree that only one of us having their most ticklish spot exposed makes for an unfair fight.”

“I can do that,” you affirm, removing the top part of your spacesuit. Once you have done this, you go over to the tickle table and retrieve two feather dusters. You turn around and face Marilu, who is about two meters away from you. “What’s the winner’s reward?”

“I think that the loser should have to go through a ten-minute bare belly tickling from your computer on that table,” Marilu announces. “The winner can tickle them anywhere else during the ten minutes.”

“That sounds like an acceptable reward,” you respond. “Well, are you ready to start? Ready, set, go!”

At the signal to begin the tickle fight, the Kichi quickly slithers over to you and…
113311111111221.title: Tickle Fight

choices: Try the tickle table out first
113311111111222.content:
“It’s been really fun spending this time with you, but I think that we should go our separate ways,” you announce to Marilu. “We both have other things that we need to do, and we shouldn’t put them off any longer.”

“Alright, I’ll go get your gifts,” the Kichi proclaims. She hurries back to her ship, and you sit down on the chair near the tickle table. Two minutes later, she drives in on a vehicle with a large crate on the back of it. You go to the back of the vehicle, seeing that the crate is actually magnetically attached to the back of the car. As you observe the crate, you notice that it is about six meters long and wide and seven meters high. “This is a mobile tickle crate, along with the car that can move it. In here are two machines. Come in, and I’ll show you what it can do.”

Marilu goes up to the door of the crate and unlocks it using the car key, and the two of you walk in. Once you are in, you look around and see two tables in opposite corners, with chairs near each of them. Feathers and feather dusters line the back wall, while electric toothbrushes and brushes are along the right wall. On all the walls, everything is locked in clear cases, with a small door to open each case. Bottles and bottles of baby oil cover the left wall, and small contraptions fill on the wall behind you. On the far left corner, you see a few small machines with vertical X restraint patterns, probably for upper body tickling. In the final corner, you see several sets of stocks, most just for feet but one set of double stocks. “What are each of these for?” you wonder.

“Let’s start with these tables,” Marilu dictates as the two of you both observe one of the tables. “They are identical tables, so I’ll just explain one of them. This is the control screen. Before I tell you about it, you can use this machine alone or have someone else controlling the machine. First off, the ticklee will expose all of their tickle spots and stand right beside the control screen and have a body scan. This will give a layout of their body for when the tickling screen comes up. Next, you tell the machine if there is just a ticklee or if there are ticklers present. Press ‘single’ for if you are alone or ‘multiple’ if there are other people there. After you select one of these, the next screen that will appear is the bondage screen. You have the options of being restrained in an X, Y, or I position. Following bondage, if you selected ‘single’, the tickling screen comes up. You select tools, spots, and the tickle speed, and once you are done with that, you select a time. This can be done multiple times so that you can have different kinds of tickling during your session. Once you have done this, you get into the position on the table, the restraints secure you, and the tickling commences. The tickling will go where you entered for as long as you selected with the tools you chose. However, if you need to stop in an emergency, the safe word is ‘blue’; the tickling will stop if you say that. This is how the single program works. If you had selected ‘multiple’, after the bondage selection, the ticklee gets on the table and is restrained. The tickling screen comes up, and the other people can move tools to body parts and select a speed. On here, once a tool has reached a body part on the screen and has been assigned a speed, it comes and begins tickling the ticklee in that spot. Multiple tools can be put on the same body part, and tools can also go to multiple body parts. In order to make a tool stop, just remove it from that body part, and it will retract from the tickling. There are three ways to completely stop the tickling session. First off, you can press this red button, which will immediately stop the tickling; the second way is to move all of the tickle tools away from the body on the screen. The final way the tickling stops is if the ticklee says the safe word, ‘blue’. That is how the ‘multiple’ program works. Any questions?”

“I don’t think so,” you answer, still comprehending the powers of this tickle table. “What are you going to talk about next?”

“We can talk about the vertical chains or the stocks next,” the Kichi gives you the options. “What would you like to learn about first?”
113311111111222.title: Gifts: Tickle Table

choices: Try out the vertical chains first
1133111111112221.content:
“I’d like to hear about the vertical chains next,” you notify Marilu.

“Good choice, human,” the Kichi responds. “You will probably get a lot of use out of these, as they are primarily focused on tickling the upper body. This machine requires that all the tickle spots on the upper body be exposed, probably the belly, armpits, and ribs for humans. Like the tickle tables, this can be used by one person or multiple people, and the ticklee stands in front of the control panel to have their body analyzed. At this, the chains will move to the correct places to restrain the ticklee. The body analysis not only picks out body parts on the ticklee, but also determines the most sensitive spots on the ticklee’s upper body. Once the ticklee is restrained, if no one presses the flashing ‘multiple’ button on the control panel in one minute, the machine will ask where to tickle, giving the ticklee verbal options with a visible diagram to aid. The ticklee picks a spot, and if it is the stomach, the machine will ask whether the tickle spot should be the sides, bellybutton, or the whole midriff. Also, the ticklee can request multiple areas in either stage, such as both the armpits and the tummy. When the tickle spot or spots have been chosen, the machine will display tickle tools and inquire which tools the ticklee wants where. You can mix and match tickle tools, and you do not have to use all of them. Following each selection of a tickle tool, the intensity of the tool is chosen by the ticklee, and then the ticklee informs the machine how long they want each tool to tickle them. After all of this, the tickling occurs, and that is what happens if there is no separate tickler.

“If there is another tickler, they can either just tickle the ticklee themselves, have the machine do the tickling, or combine the two. The involvement of a non-machine tickler will cause tickle tools to be placed within the tickler’s reach so that they are able to tickle their prisoner. Should the machine do any tickling, the tickler will dictate this similarly to the way the tickle tables work. Machine-only tickling runs like the ‘multiple’ setting on the tickle table, while combined person and machine tickling is controlled like the ‘single’ program on the tickle table, where the tickling routine is selected before it starts. However, I must warn you that non-machine only and combined person and machine tickling often leads to a tickle torture situation. Lastly, there is also a safe word on the vertical chains for any situation; it is ‘green’. The saying of the safe word, even through laughter, will cause all tickling to cease. Non-machine ticklers will be suspended by chains from the ceiling until the ticklee is released, at which point they will be let down. Any questions here?”

“No, I think I’ve got a good idea of what this does,” you answer.

“Should we head over to the stocks now?” Marilu wonders.
1133111111112221.title: Gifts: Vertical Chains

choices: “Can I tickle you in one of these?”
“Can you tickle me in one of these?”
“I guess you should head out now.”
11331111111122211.content:
“Yes, we should check out the stocks,” you decide.

“You may not use these as much, but if you happen to come across someone with very ticklish feet, they will come in very handy,” Marilu proclaims as you walk to the opposite corner of the room. “The control screen here is on the front of each set of stocks, and it requires that the lower legs and below are exposed. Like the other machines in here, you can have just a single ticklee or ticklers and a ticklee. The ticklee always has to stand in front of the stocks; it will scan your lower body for ticklish spots. For the single ticklee, you press ‘single’ on the screen, and it will bring up the tickling screen. The tickling screen will only contain anything on the front side of the stocks. Similar to the tickle tables, you just move the tool to where you want it and assign a speed, a starting time, and how long it will last. Once you are finished with this, you get in the stocks, and the tickling commences when you are locked up. That is how you control the ‘single’ method. The other mode, ‘multiple’, works exactly like the vertical chains, and it also has all of the features that the chains do. For the stocks, the safe word is ‘orange’, and it will stop all tickling. Any questions?”

“Do the double stocks operate differently?” you wonder.

“They scan your entire body to alter the restraints if necessary,” Marilu states. “For instance, for the lower body, they would reduce the number of holes to one because I only have a tail, and they would put it at the appropriate size. The double stocks also restrain your arms, but the machine was not made to tickle any upper body parts. That said, if there was a live tickler present, they could have the machine tickle your feet while they tickled your upper body. This could lead to a very torturous predicament for the ticklee and a fun situation for the tickler. I must note, however, that the safe word will still be acknowledged, and the upper body tickling will still cease. Are there any more questions?”

“No, I think I get it now,” you declare.
11331111111122211.title: Gifts: Stocks

choices: “I'm going to meet with the Erimosi”
“I’m just going to relax here for a little bit”
113311111111222113.content:
“Well, I suppose you should head out now,” you reluctantly announce to Marilu. “I really appreciate the gifts that you gave me, and I enjoyed the time we got to spend together. I hope that humans and the Kichi can have a productive and friendly relationship. Have fun on your adventures, and make sure the next prisoner you interrogate laughs as hard as we did in that machine.”

“It was fun to meet you, also,” the Kichi proclaims with a smile. “You are certainly welcome for the mobile tickle crate; it was the least I could do to help advance humanity. Like I said before, you and I had a good time here, and so you deserve the gift to assist your species in becoming a powerful race in the universe. I hope to see you again, and I hope that I get another shot at that ticklish tummy of yours. I assure you that the relations between the Kichi and humans will be friendly and productive for both sides. As for your final request, I will try to make all of my ticklees laugh as hard as we did before they give me their information. Now I have two last suggestions for you as we depart; you are free to reject one or both of them if you want. First off, your bare belly is extraordinarily ticklish; don’t cover it up!
