Embrace your extreme ticklishness and expose your tickle spots. I can assure you that life will be much more fun and exciting if your tickle spots are exposed. Most aliens in the universe enjoy tickling and show off even their most ticklish spots for easy access. Secondly, let yourself get tickled a ton. Getting tickled is a way to have a weakness exposed in an enjoyable way, especially if the ticklee is very ticklish and therefore laughing hard. As well as having a good time being tickled, the vast majority of alien species love being the tickler. This is a very common method of getting to know other races because of the pleasurable aspect of it. I have no doubt that given the chance, humans will relish the opportunity to laugh as they are tickled by all sorts of aliens. If you allow yourself to be tickled often, it can be both profitable and exciting, and it can open all sorts of doors for you. Tickle testers make very good money, and extremely ticklish people like you are the most sought after tickle testers. Of course, you are free to reject one or both of these suggestions, but I have learned that these can lead to a happier life. That is my opinion for you. Goodbye, and I wish you fun and very ticklish adventures in the universe!”

“Goodbye, Marilu!” you call out as she begins to leave your ship. “Have exciting and ticklish adventures, too!” The Kichi turns around and smiles at you, then waves goodbye and slithers back onto her ship. When she is gone, you head back to the cockpit of your ship.

“Disengaging from the Kichi ship,” Erin broadcasts to you, and your ship floats back into free space. Marilu’s ship separates from yours, and within a minute, she activates her warp drive, leaving you alone again. “Well, captain, you have successfully made contact with the Kichi species. Congratulations! Where do you want to go now?”

After thinking for a minute, you respond…
113311111111222113.title: Mission Completed

1133111111112221133.content:
“I think that after having completed a mission, I’m going to relax here for a little bit,” you tell Erin. “I have a few questions for you to learn more about the universe. Right before she left, the Kichi told me that many species use tickling as a way to get to know other species. Is that the ‘strange custom’ that the Erimosi told us about?”

“Yes, it is,” Erin responds. “Tickling has widespread use, and its enjoyment in many species makes it a normal sight. It is usually a peaceful way for different alien races to find common ground, so it is often used in first contact situations, as you have already experienced. In some cultures, it is actually illegal to cover up ticklish spots because of the amount of tickling that goes on. You would be given time to adapt to the custom because it is humans’ first contact there, but the typical lawbreaker would be forced to bare their tickle spots and then sentenced to public tickle torture.”

“Wait, they would be sentenced to a public tickle torture for not showing off their tickle spots?” you wonder. “Aren’t governments prevented from using torture to punish criminals?”

“Actually, tickle torture is a standard punishment in many prisons, and tickle interrogation is often used to extract information from unwilling aliens,” Erin explains. “These are both legal and endorsed by governments in an effort to lower crime; all other torture is banned throughout the universe.”

“So, I need to make sure I don’t break any laws and I should be fine, right?” you inquire.

“I should tell you a few things with regards to that,” Erin declares. “First off, you will likely be given immunity because you are a peaceful representative of another species, and at the very least they will explain the rules to you and give you time to get in line with them. You will not be sentenced to any punishment for unintentionally breaking rules, and you will probably not be required to adhere to most customs during a short stay. Switching gears, if you encounter individual aliens, you will not have all the protections of government officials. In most cases, this will not make a difference, but some aliens will not hesitate to take advantage of vulnerable, ticklish humans. Due to the widespread popularity of tickling, tickle slavery is very common in the universe, and the Kichi in particular are heavily involved in the tickle slave markets. They typically will capture innocent victims and sell them into tickle slavery for a profit. I should note that people and families owning tickle slaves is legal in most nations here, although there are rules about how an owner can treat their slaves. In contrast, using tickle slaves to gain profit is almost universally illegal. With all that said, the vast majority of tickling that goes on is for the mutual happiness of tickler and ticklee. Many businesses make tickle tools and machines to emphasize the enjoyment of tickling, and high ticklishness is actually a respected trait among the universe. Additionally, most pleasure worlds and the equivalents of Earth theme parks have tickling as a central theme in them. The fun that is an inevitable part of basic tickling is the reason why most species enjoy it so much and allow themselves to be tickled a ton. I encourage you to enjoy all the tickling that occurs during your adventure, both getting the chance to tickle others and being tickled yourself.”

“Thank you, Erin,” you state after the long explanation. “I have one other question regarding my contact with the Kichi. If I’m so ticklish and they kidnap and sell tickle slaves, why didn’t I get taken as a tickle slave?”

“When I was telling you about the Kichi, I told you that they like to rely on cunning,” Erin proclaims. “You must have convinced the Kichi that you were not going to be manipulated easily, so she was not able to trap you. Other than that, another reason could be that the Kichi you encountered took a liking to you. One of those reasons is why you are not a tickle slave now.”

“Alright,” you reply. “Near the end, the Kichi mentioned ‘tickle testers’ and said that they make a lot of money. Can you elaborate on that?”

“As I said earlier, the popularity of tickling in the universe has created companies dedicated to making tickle machines,” Erin announces. “They hire ticklish aliens as tickle testers to test out their machines to ensure that they work as intended. Since most of the job involves extended periods of being tied up and tickled, tickle testers have high salaries to keep them there. Nevertheless, while the majority of companies are honest and pay their tickle testers, a few businesses use tickle slaves as testers to achieve maximum profit. This is illegal, and governments are trying to crack down on it, sentencing the people involved in these deals to maximum prison time. Ironically, in prison, they will inevitably be forced to endure long sessions of tickle torture, which is what they did to others in order to get incarcerated in the first place. However, if you get to a good company, being a tickle teeter would be a very profitable occupation. Typically, a tickle tester only has to work about twenty to twenty-five years before they have enough money to retire comfortably and live until ninety years old. Another option for tickle testers is working for a military. Since tickling is a weakness for every species, all of the fighting is done with tickle weapons. Governments pay double to triple the amount private companies pay their tickle testers because tickle weapons are designed to tickle torture their ticklees. If you are brave and ticklish enough to test tickle weapons, you should have a long and fun retirement. Does that answer your question?”

“Yes,” you answer, not expecting the long answer from Erin. “Well, I think I’m going to…”

Picking out a can of baby oil, you open it up and lift up the top of your spacesuit. You spread about an eighth of the small can of oil on your stomach, which begins to feel a little more sensitive even without tickling. 11331111111122211331.title: Mobile Tickle Crate

11331111112.content:
The tummy tickling stops, but Marilu starts to head away from the machine. “Hold on!” you call out, causing her to turn around. “Aren’t you going to let me out?”

“You gave yourself up,” she responds. “You surrendered your services to me, and I am going to make you a tickle slave.”

“What?” you ask, bewildered. “I never said anything about surrendering to you. I was just trying out the tickle machine.”

“Oh, you didn’t know?” she innocently questions. “When someone says ‘Prison’ to get out of a tickling, it means that they are surrendering themselves to the tickler. The tickler can do anything they want to the ticklee, and I am choosing to make you a tickle slave.”

“This wasn’t a part of our agreement,” you protest. “You said you would let me go after I said the safe word.”

“You tossed that agreement when you let me put you in those chains,” Marilu claims. “Now stop protesting, tickle slave. I think you need to be punished.” She walks back to you and removes your helmet, causing you to look away before she can hypnotize you. “Look at me.”

“No,” you answer, closing your eyes tightly.

“Fine; have it your way,” the Kichi declares. Fifty seconds later, you hear something whirring, and then the feathers all return to your bare belly. “If you won’t look at me willingly, I’ll have to tickle you into doing it.” You break out in hysterical laughter, trying to keep your eyes shut. After around five and a half minutes…
11331111112.title: Tickle Slave

113311111121.content:
You finally opened your eyes, and Marilu’s face was right in front of you. Powerless and still laughing from the machine, you stare into her eyes and fall under the Kichi spell. “Good,” the Kichi announces, noticing that she has control over you now. “You are now my tickle slave. Whatever I tell you must be done quickly or punishment will ensue. I am going to let you out of the tickle machine now.” The tickling abruptly ceases, and the holders are moved away from you. Next, the restraints on your wrists and ankles come off, and you drop to the ground, landing on your feet. “Take off your spacesuit and lay on that table.” Although you are not sure why, you obey the instructions, and soon you are on the table in nothing but your underwear. “Stretch your arms and legs out.” You stretch your arms and legs to their extensions, and Marilu duct tapes you to the table.

Soon after you are tied, you feel the Kichi’s fingers lightly wiggling over your bare belly, and you break out in laughter. “HAHAHAHA!” you laugh as you naturally squirm, it does not cross your mind to try and escape the tickling. In fact, you are enjoying the tickling, in spite of the fact that this is your most ticklish spot. “KEHEHEP GOHOHOIHIHING!” Smiling, Marilu intensifies the tickling as she continually stares into your eyes, only causing you to become more satisfied. After what you think is five minutes or so, the Kichi stops tickling you, despite your encouragements. “Why’d you stop?”

“I wanted to show you a more fun method of tickling,” she promises, and you go along with it, entranced by her eyes. “I’m going to untie you, and you are going to stand up with your arms above your head. Understand?” You give a compliant nod, so your captor takes the duct tape off of your wrists and ankles. Once you are freed, you get up and raise your arms as high as you can.

Marilu sits down on the table next to you, and you soon feel her tail wrapping up your legs. Despite the fact that the Kichi’s own tummy is bare and very ticklish, it does not cross your mind to tickle her to make her stop, and the tail keeps continuing up towards your tickle spot. As it gets to your stomach, the tip suddenly rubs across your side, causing you to let out a squeal. The tickler moves her tail to your bellybutton, where it starts wriggling violently. “OHAHAHAHA!” you break out in hysterical laughter as you are tickle tortured. Nevertheless, your arms stay put above your head, despite the logic of moving them down to defend yourself. Your captor uses this method to keep you laughing for around an hour, and then she finally ceases, although you keep giggling for another five minutes.

When you finally finish laughing, Marilu declares, “We’re going to…”
113311111121.title: Hypnotized

113312.content:
"You did ok for a Female human, I guess. Come on into my living quarters, and we can... What did you earthlings like to say? 'Talk this over a cup of tea?' Ah well, just come on in."

You hear her voice echo through the ship, as you walk through the corridors, making your way to the main area of her ship. Opening the door, you find yourself in a small room. A quick glance around, and you see a table with two chairs, a resting pod at one corner of the room, as well as the many different decorations lining the room, a couple of jewels lining the walls, as well as... you gulp audibly, as you realize that besides the jewels, feathers also lined the walls, interlaced with the jewels. There was also a mirror on the wall, for vanity reasons, you presume.

A hissing sound alerted you to the other presence in the room, resting on her tail at one end of the table. She beckons you to come over, gesturing for you to sit in the chair opposite her.

"Well, human. I extend my greeting. My name is Miranda. It's actually the first time any of our kind has met any of yours, although we have heard about you before from other species." She says, offering you a cup of tea. "I'm actually quite curious about you lot. Some of the other species have said that human's are the most ticklish life form that anyone has ever found. Is that true?" She asks, giving you a mischievous smile as you gulp down your tea.

As you quickly wave your hands to gesture that it wasn't true, you felt the tip of something stroke against the soles of your bare feet, making you grit your teeth as you barely kept your giggles in. You coyly look under the table, and saw the tip of Miranda's tail wiggling a little in the air. As you look back up, you notice a sly grin at the corner of her mouth before she took another sip of her tea.

Continuing your conversation with her, you found it harder and harder for you to keep a straight face, as her playful tail continued to tease your feet underneath the table, stroking the soles of your feet slowly and quickly, her features keeping an innocent air at all times. When you tried to pull your feet back, you felt the coils of her tail wrapping around your ankles, preventing movement and allowing the tip of her tail to continue it's ticklish work.

After a while, you finally...
113312.title: Female human.

1133122.content:
"Snrkkkk... eeeeeppp.... HAHAHAHAHA!" The ticklish tail tip proves too much for your sensitive soles, and you can no longer hold in your delicious laughter.

The devious Kichi woman smiles mischievously. "It seems it's true what they say! Humans are just the most sensitive species ever!" You feel her coil further up your legs, wrapping them tight to stop any escape attempts. "Tickle tickle tickle little human!" Her tail tip dances right underneath your ticklish toes, wiggling in between them and teasing each individual tootsie.

"Ehehehahahaeha!" You struggle in vain as the sensations overwhelm you. "Whhahahy are you TICKLING MY FEET!" You manage to gasp in between guffaws.

Her devilish grin grows even wider. "Do I really need a reason to tickle you? Let me have my fun!" Your laughter continues to increase in volume as she teases your heels. Scrunching your soles only encourages her to force the tail tip into the wrinkles and tickle even harder! As you wiggle and squeal, you start to realize she has been wrapping further and further up your body... she's going to leave you completely helpless if you don't do something!

She slides from across the table to be closer to you, never letting up the tickling. "Such a pretty laugh..." As she gets closer, you notice her own midriff is bare... you begin to wonder if this might be your chance! "Come on... laugh for me..." This could be your last shot! Before she can wrap your arms, you have to tickle her!

You attempt to reach out... and then....
1133122.title: You couldn't hold your laughter in

choices: "Ok, I've decided to make you my prisoner."
11331221.content:
"Why don't you look over here, sweet heart..." Momentarily forgetting the warning that Erin gave you about not looking the Kichi in the eyes, for they have the power to make anyone go into a hypnotic trance just from brief eye contact, you look directly into Miranda's serpentine eyes, for just a brief moment. However, in that brief second, you start to feel your mind getting cloudy, your eyes having trouble on focusing on anything, your ears not hearing anything else, other than the sound of Miranda's silky voice. Slowly, your body begins to relax in the grip of Miranda's coils, a goofy smile crawling on your lips as her tail climbs higher and higher.

"Doesn't the sound of my voice just sound so delicious, you ticklish human? You just adore hearing me talk, don't you? You would do anything to try and make me happy... won't you?" She gives you a playful smile, as you slowly nod your head with a lopsided grin, your body not trying to escape from her climbing tail anymore.

"In fact, you're so ticklish, I bet that belly of your's is just itching for me to tickle it, am I right?" All you could do was just continuously nod your head as the tip of her tail slowly crawls into your shirt, the ticklish tip carefully tracing circles around your taut tummy. Starting to giggle anew, your mind doesn't even want to try and escape. In fact, you start to think that maybe this tickling wasn't so bad at all...

A midst your girlish giggling, you hear the Kichi's honey-coated voice say...
11331221.title: "Look into my eyes..."

113312211.content:
"You're going to become my prisoner." Miranda tells you in a syrupy sweet tone. "You'd like to be my prisoner, wouldn't you?" She asks you, deliberately making eye contact with you for a long moment, your eyes locking with hers. Looking into those strange reptilian eyes makes your head feel cloudy, but in a pleasant way. As if you were floating on a cloud. You nod, a silly grin still plastered on your hypnotized face.

"Goood…" Miranda hisses slowly. "Now, I can't say I care for these human clothes. Kichi garments are so much prettier, wouldn't you agree?" Miranda sits up straighter, arching her back and showing off her exposed, curvaceous form. You nod again, and honestly you'd have to agree even if you weren't compelled to. She's quite the attractive alien, and her revealing clothes only accentuate it. "Yess, I knew you would. Now, would you like some Kichi clothes of your own? You don't have to say anything, just giggle if you agree." Miranda tells you slyly, as that tail tip of hers makes another teasing circle around your belly underneath your shirt. You easily comply, giggling at the ticklish strokes, the thought of batting away that tail with your hands somehow not occurring to you.

Miranda taps a few buttons at a control on the table, and to your astonishment clothing starts to materialize on the table! The top is just like Miranda's, a tight black material that wraps around your chest and shoulders almost like wide tape. The bottom piece is a skirt that would be scandalously short on each, barely covering your rear and exposing the entirety of your thighs. "There, just your size!" Miranda coos, continuing to tease your belly with her tail, the tip softly wandering across your trembling skin, tickling effortlessly as you giggle.

"Mmm, I'll have to stop tickling you to let you put these on." Miranda says in a pout, her tail reluctantly withdrawing from underneath your shirt. After a moment you finally stop laughing, feeling the giddy aftereffects long after the dexterous appendage has pulled away. "Now, slip into those and meet me on the bridge, my lovely little human!" Miranda commands, and you snap to obey.

As Miranda slithers to the front of the ship, you quickly disrobe out of the things you had previously been wearing underneath your spacesuit, little more than undergarments really, and into the even skimpier clothing given to you by Miranda. The fabric feels soft and comfortable against your skin, although something about it strikes you as odd. The inside of the garments are somewhat fuzzy or velvety, and as you start walking in them it brushes against you in a distinctly ticklish way. It moves against your rear and upper thighs in a feeling that makes you giddy, and the way the top brushes against your breasts makes you want to blush. While it tickles, it's also a strikingly pleasing sensation.

But you don't dwell too long on the clothing, as Miranda's command rings in your mind. You have to join her at the bridge! You follow her to the forward section of the ship, finding her nestled in what was effectively a large beanbag, the seat perfect for the snake-tailed woman. Miranda beckons you closer as she quickly taps on a wide panel of instruments.

"Come human, come! Sit on my lap here!" Miranda says, patting herself. You slowly walk forward, obeying the command, although a tiny voice in the back of your mind starts to begin to wonder why you should do everything the serpentine alien says. "Excellent! I'll have plenty of time to cuddle and tease you before we arrive." Miranda tells you, wrapping her arms around your bare midsection as you lay on her. Her fingers gently stroke across your belly, exploring every inch of it in a way that makes you wriggle against her. She tickles with a slow and steady hand, as if not wanting to wear out or overwhelm you too quickly. It makes you wonder how long she's planning on tickling you…

"Now, I'll just engage the autopilot, and we can have a nice, tickly snuggle, my pretty human pet!" Miranda coos at you as she tickles. "Because I am going to take you…"
113312211.title: A Kichi's Prisoner

This sounds amazing to you and you happily nod along to this.

One of the snake woman's hands creeps to just below your breasts and the other gos down to your thigh, and she continues her ticklish exploration of your exotic body. Despite the fact she's essentially taking you as a slave/pet her words are strangely comforting to you.

Miranda coos and caws as she gently tickles you, after a few more minutes of gentle exploration she smiles and whispers in your ear, "Ahh my pet i see you're quite ticklish on your..."
1133122111.title: Home with me.

choices: She goes off to get the builder.
She decides to play with her pet.
11331221111.content:
"Chest and stomach, a very intresting developement. Say pet, did you know that most of us kichi are actually most ticklish where you would consider our waist to be? Its just that non Kichi tend to be terrible at tickling compared to us so they just don't find the right spots" she says as she guides your hand to a certain spot on the area where her snake portion transitions to her more human portion. "Try it out a bit pet, but be gentle. I was not kidding when i said were quite sensitive there!". You lightly glide your nails across the rough and slightly scaly skin. Even with the gentleness with which your tickling when your hand passes over a certain spot she bellows out with a hearty laugh and squeezes you unintentionally.

"Oh my, human you seem to be just as good at tickling as you are at being tickled!" She says as she swats your hand away from her waist. She worms further into her bean bag and loosens her bear hug she still had on you. "Let me tell you about myself human, For the first few years of my life i studied the great minds of my race, sir slargoth, madam microarch, and many others. Once i was old enough to engage in research i quickly began to study the art of tickling and I worked on some revolutionary eye implants that would allow us to hypnotise even those of my own species. After 3 years of study i finnaly had a breakthrough and i was well on my way to finishing the project. But about three months before the product was ready i was kidnapped by a rival corp. They held me for six months and attempted to tickle torture company secrets out of me. Saddly for them i was quite well trained on resisting such attempts and eventually a joint strike by my corporation and the local government set me free. Because i did'nt give up the info and because i then helped finish the project my corp decided to award me with a executive level retirement package. I usex the money to invest to the point that i now make a living off of just stocks and i can cruse this beuty around the galexy. I was actually planning on full stop retiring from everything, maybe buy a mansion and a few tickle slaves, but now that i have you, my dear, i may just forgo getting those other tickle slaves."

You relax into her chest as she tells you the story, with foggy eyes you watch the cosmos stream by you, patterns forming in the brightness of hyperspace. You both sit in silence for a few minutes reflecting on your life journeys. Miranda moves one hand onto your breast and asks, "what does your species call your chest mounds, ours are fairly pointless and they arn't very sensitive but yours appear to be quite the oppisite.". You recline onto her and reply, "We call them breasts, ma'am. They are indeed pretty important to our species, our young suckle them and they release a nutriant rich milk. As such they are quite sensitive to pain and tickling.". "Fasinating." She says quietly, shifting her hand back towards your stomach.

Even though you are speeding through space at an insane spped, breaking the spped of light like one would break a horse, time seems to go by slowly. You and your master make alot of small talk but she had stopped tickling you long ago and now you just cuddled.

The ship slowed down and you heard the AI state "gravity well detected, sub-light thrusters engaged.". Ahead of you is a great orange star, still fresh with life and likly still having a few billion years of life in her. You still can't see any planets though.

"Welcome to our new home human, Sol." The Kichi says with a happy smile. "Sol? Thats the human home star!" You said in confusion. Miranda responded with equal confusion, "Odd, must be a translation error, out stars name also means home star. I assure you that this is quite a different star.".

This trip is much quicker, the powerful thrusters and the small ship size mean that even at sub-light speed the ship still goes stupidly fast. Soon the Kichi homeworld comes into view and both you and the Kichi get up to examine the amazing sight, the Kichi is sure to look into your eyes for awhile to make sure you stay sedated.

"And this is my home planet human. Just a thousand years ago it was mostly desert, but 300 years ago we began to push the desert back and now most non preserve land is either a tropical paridise or rollong flatlands. Most of the world was once covered in mega cities but once the colony arch ships left property in the core systems became insanely expensive in an attempt by the core government to push Kichi to the frontiers. Rioting was pretty rare even by the people forced off their land because the if a family seriously wanted to stay they could find a way, also the mega cities were shitholes anyways. I grew up on a frontier so i havnt called this planet home for too long. Now for the most part the cities have been scrapped for materials and theres just the ocasional mansion or mega mansion. Because of our adaptability we are able to live in some pretty extreme environments so we have enough land to no longer need large cities anywhere. Truth be told my pet, you are a very lucky woman. If you had been picked up by a frontier colony ship they would have just sold you to the highest bidder regardless of their morals. Not to say im very moral but i like to think im in the 5th percentile of morality for my race"

"So.. you said you didn't own property earlier, where are we going?" You ask now rather concerned. "I actually do have a small wharehouse property, i was planning on buying a one use insta builder pod but even for me they're quite expensive, but i think i will get one in a few days. For now you'll just have to live in the whare house, pet." And once again her words oddlly sooth you.

The ship glides through the sky, gentle as an alien's feather. Somehow the ship breaks atmoshphere quietly, very diffrent than the shockwaves made by earth ships. You and Miranda land in the hanger of her modderatly large wharehouse just in time to see a outgoing cargo ship leave. Inside the facility you see a great host of crates and robots through the ship window. The robots are fairly similar to the automated wharehouse bots of earth but they are floating on great pads that project a blue light.

"Let me guide you to you temporary room human!" She says with her standard smile "Its been a few weeks simce ive had this much open space!" She says slithering off into the great stacks of crates. You quickly follow her down the winding hallways. You eventually arrive in a hallowed out cargo container, inside is a large bed, a fridge, and other basic ammenities. Your master hands you a pair of glasses and says, "These will keep you calm, theres going to be alot of culture shock" you put them on and they keep you in a constant state of calm and hypnosis (you of course don't know this).
11331221111.title: Chest/belly

113312211112.content:
"Okay human, settle in then come find me, the robots will guide you if you get lost. Were going to have a bit of fun in about an hour (automatic time conversion) so be there." You respond, "Okay master, i'll find you!"

Your room is a bit small evdn compared to your quarters on earth but at the same time you know its the best that could be done in the hour or so it took since the order was made to convert the cargo container.

You try and get in a powernap but give up after 5 minutes, your breasts are your most ticklish spot and the fuzzy strips you're wearing tickle you gently whenever you slightly move. It's not terible but it is distracting. Instead you get up and spend a few minutes figuring out how the hell the water cooler worked. It was a sealed black cube with an internal resivoiur. A small spout was on the side that faced you, in addition there were four buttons. The first two you pressed made a mechanical whirl noise. The next sent out a stream of mild water. The final button sent out a puff of hot steam which you just managed to avoid being burned by. Turns out that the first two buttons made the first dispencer toggle between crushed ice or mildly cold water while at the same time toggeling the second dispenser button between hot water and steam.

The hour passed quickly and slightly tickley the former due to the many odd machines in your room and the latter due to your fuzzy breast coverings. A gentle beep comes from your glasses letting you know its time to go, on a whim you say "show time" and to your supprise it actually does. It appears that these glasses are like our smart watches.

You set off onto the path that appears on your left glass lens. It takes you down one of the more busy paths, a host of bots glide past you in both directions giving you just enough room to walk down the center of the path. Its fairly trippy to you now that you think about it, just this morning you left earth as an explorer and now you were a servant of a mildly important alien. Is this how the men who first landed on the moon felt? Sure eventually it became common place to visit the moon but all those years ago it wasn't so maybe they felt the same way as you do.

The map leads you to a side room with a closed room. You knock on the door and it swings open, then once you enter it swings shut and locks, looks like this is happening. Ahead of you is a spiral stair case which you journey up till you find another locked door. You knock and hear Miranda's voice tell you to come in.

As you open the door the lights are off, shes clearly going to suprise you with something. You step through the door with a sly smile and a slight eye roll. Suddenly Miranda flies at you, stunning you and wrapping part of her tail around your legs constricting them. 'Oh yeah' you think to yourself, 'Snakes are really good at jumping huh?'. She has your legs completely stuck, and then she pulls you around so your facing her.

"How are you doing pet?" She asks. "Uhh... fine... startled would be a better descriptive word.". "Oh, sorry for the startle dear but i wanted to show you this room at a gradual pace." Just as she says this the rooms lights turn on.

You are in a carpeted room with 3 doors on each side of the room, you entered via the south door, there is also a exit/entrance door on the far north wall.

Miranda pulls you toward the first door on the west side of the room. "As you know you are my tickle pet, obviously this will involve tickling which is what i have theese rooms for!" She says turning you around so you wont be able to see inside then unlocking and opening the door. "This room is just a warm up room, you'll be getting used to it." She flips you around the room showing you it. From what you can tell she'll put a code into a panel then whatever she calls for will be taken out of the warehouse and deposit it in the room. The room is a decent sized room that could fit about 10 people comfortably. On the right side of the room is what looks like a coat hanger but which has a variety of basic tickle tools: alien feathers, brushes, etc.

"So my pet, do you want to just cut to the chase or do you want to warm up?
113312211112.title: She decides to play with her pet.

1133122111121.content:
"Okay pet, there are three machines we will use today. The first is a frame for loose bondage that lets you squirm, the second is for tight bondage, and the third can switch between the two as well as auto tickle you. Were going to start simple."

She inputs 1-2-3-4 into the keypad and a sloped metal board descends, on each corner is a strap that will prevent you hands and feet from moving but not the rest of your body.

Before starting she removes the ticklish breast covering and de-activates the calming feature of the glasses, not making you flip out now, but allowing you to properly react when tickled.

She positions you next to the machine and tells you to strap in an arm. You do and she lets go of your legs. She then puts your other hand it the strap and then does each of your ankles.

"Okay human, you ready?". "As much as a human turned tickle slave could be!" You reply. She grabs a feather and slithers to you and begins toying with your stomach. "A fun fact on the kichi race, we origionally despised tickling." She said befor doing a quick flutter of the feather on your stomach. " but after some time we realised that such a weakness was the greatess weakness we had... so we purged it." She draws a circle around your naval. "Starting from when we open our eyes first our parents tickle us, then as we grow older we tickle our friends and they tickle us. This begins to strengthen us both in terms of manuvering politicaly to not make too many enemies, as well as teaches us how to defend ourselves. With the occasional giggle you say, "Tha-hats actually alot like our tickli-hing, we evolved tickling to condition us to avoid physical contact at a yoh-hong age.

"Really now?" She asks , "Very intresting. You simply must tell me more once im done. She moves the feather to your left side and begins flicking it up and down, making you recoil to the right and let out more serious laughs.

"Oh, looks like I hit a soft spot huh?" She says with a worrying smile. Then she starts digging the feather deeper into your side. She suddenly stops and just stares at you, but before you can ask her what happened she just says, "Such an odd race." Before she starts to work on your other side.

"A-h-hnd you-hoo said it-a gets worse from here?" You struggle out. "Well as you saw back on the ship we are much more ticklish then you in spots, but it is my duty to press you to the limit. Anyways i wantes to finish my little speech on my species," She stated dragging the feather from the top of your side to the start of your thigh slowly, eliceting a series of smaller giggles as she continues her story. "Anyways, eventually we become obsessed with tickling to the point where our greatess weakness at birth is out largest strenth by our teenage years, about 23-45 years in your time. I tell you all this because i don't plan to hold you forever, one day you will return but..." she quickly begins drilling your naval with the feather making you laugh till you gasp, "today is not that day!" She finishes.
1133122111121.title: Warm up

choices: Let her go and take the plunder
11331222.content:
Your hands hit the Kichi’s bare sides, and you start wiggling your fingers on them. Surprised, she breaks out in a squeal, and you quickly take advantage, moving your fingers on her belly faster. The woman’s hands move back towards her stomach to try and be protective, but you move your fingers in, and her hands swipe past your attack. At this point, the Kichi starts realizing that her defense is ineffective, and she closes her eyes, allowing her laughter to go up in pitch. With the Kichi immobilized, you go for her bellybutton, and your luck just keeps growing.
Once you start tickling her bellybutton, the Kichi’s tail starts uncoiling from around your ankles, leaving your bare feet free from the tickling. You push her to the ground, still tickling her bellybutton, and hold her hands above her head with one hand. As she is going down, the Kichi starts writhing, attempting to free herself from the tickle torture. “Are you ready to give up?” you ask her.
“HAHAHAYEYEYESSSSSS!” she hisses from underneath your tickling. You grab the woman’s hands with one of your own so she cannot pull any tricks on you and drag her over to a place where you find rope. Within a few minutes, the alien’s hands are secured tightly in the bondage, and you tie her tail up to completely immobilize her. “I guess humans are not as vulnerable as I thought they would be. I will have to report this to my superiors if I ever see them again. You have been very strong, and humans will be a strong race in the galaxy. Since you defeated me, you may take me as your slave if you so wish. If you do not choose this, I will be glad to give you many of my weapons, and you will not be tickled further here. I will also be willing to act as a liaison between your species and the Kichi, and you will have much power in our race. It is your choice.” Do you take the Kichi woman as a slave, or do you take the plunder and the power?
11331222.title: Revenge!

113312221.content:
“You know, Miranda, it would be nice to have you give humanity good relations with the Kichi, but I can’t pass up the opportunity to have a tickle slave,” you announce.

“As you wish, human,” Miranda accepts.

“First of all, we’re going to my ship,” you proclaim as you pick up a feather. “I am going to untie you from the pole and then tie your arms behind your back. If you resist at all, this feather will make a quick trip to your tummy and attack that navel of yours. Once you are found, we will head back to my ship, and you will be restrained there. I will come back here and acquire the necessary tools to make your slavery fun for me, by which I mean tickle tools. After that, our ships will disengage, and then I will have plenty of fun tickling you, especially that bare belly of yours. Your ship will just float free in space until someone decides to pick it up.” The Kichi just nods, and you untie her. Even though she puts up no resistance, once her hands are again restrained, you make the feather enter her bare bellybutton and swirl around. Miranda breaks out in hysterical laughter and squirms side to side, to no avail. Following five minutes of torturing the Kichi with the feather, you stop and force her onto your ship. You tightly tie her down in your cockpit, and then you return to her ship, leaving her alone.

Upon arriving in the Kichi ship, you begin to investigate to find out what she has here. You eventually find a cart, which you take back to her stores of tickle tools. After filling up the cart with familiar and new tickle tools from the alien’s collection, you roll it back onto your ship. You open a container on your ship that was meant for storing gifts from the aliens and place all of the tickle tools in there. Bringing the cart with you, you hurry back to the Kichi ship to acquire even more tools to torture Miranda with. You end up procuring four carts full of tickling tools from the alien vessel, and once this is all done, you return to the cockpit. “Erin, disengage from the Kichi ship; we’re going away.”

“I assume we are taking the Kichi with us, Captain?” Erin inquires.

“Yes, Miranda is my tickle slave,” you confirm. “She tried to tickle me into a trap, but I ended up tickling her and making her submit to me. She then gave me the choice to take her as a tickle slave, and I took that choice. I have acquired everything that is necessary from her ship, and we are ready to depart from it.”

“Alright, Captain,” Erin responds. “I would like to inform you now that there is a large market for tickle slaves in the galaxy, and it is not a criminal organization. In fact, Kichi tickle slaves are very rare, so they sell for very large sums. If you would like to, we could go to a tickle slave market and sell this Kichi; you would probably be able to get enough money to purchase about ten tickle slaves. This would allow you to interact with other species of aliens as well as coming out with another tickle slaves and likely tons of money. Of course, if you would like to keep the Kichi, you still have some options. You could just float around in space and tickle your new slave, or I could give you more options of what we could do. What do you want?”
113312221.title: Taking a Tickle Slave

choices: The Kichi guard enters your ship.
You willingly come aboard the Kichi ship.
Your ship starts filling up with a strange gas!
11332.content:
Everything seems to be going well, and you're just about to unstrap yourself from your pilot's seat, when the ship jostles violently. If you had stood up a second sooner, your helmet would've smacked hard into a control panel, but thankfully you were still belted into the seat. "What the…!" you cry out, looking frantically at your instruments. "What's going on?"

Your question is soon answered by a stern feminine voice on the communicator. "Alien vessel. You have entered a restricted zone. This is the personal space belonging to the Kichi Imperial Family. By order of Princess Shaiya, your ship will be boarded and you submit yourself to questioning by the Imperial Guard. Do not resist."

"Wait, what? This is all a mistake!" You protest, hailing the Kichi ship back. "Please, I didn't know this area was restricted! I'm just trying to make peaceful contact with…"

The Kichi, apparently belonging to some kind of Imperial Guard, interrupts you. "Save your breath, alien. I don't know who or even what you are, but I'll figure it out during official questioning." The Kichi ship cuts off communications, and you feel another jolt as the larger ship presses forcefully against your own.

"Erin, what's going on? Why is she ramming us?" You ask, hoping to make some sense out of the situation.

"Our ships are docked with each other, but she's linking us up in a way that keeps us from disengaging." Erin tells you. "When I figured out she was trying to lock onto us like that, I tried to break the link-up. Apparently she didn't like that."

You start to hear sounds on the other side of the airlock, your mind racing as you try to figure out what to do. "Can we warp away? Is there anything we can do?"

"Sorry, captain." Erin responds. "The warp engines need time to recharge. Even if they were ready, we can't warp while attached like this. Either both ships would get torn apart, or we'd warp somewhere together. I don't think either of those helps. For now, we're stuck." Erin pauses for a moment, as if consulting her databanks. "But the Kichi have no record of harming prisoners or criminals. Even if they assume the worst, they shouldn't hurt you! If you can explain to them you aren't a threat, everything should be ok!"

You think about that last part. Erin's got a ton of information stored in the ship's computer, so its probably true that the Kichi don’t hurt their captives. Then again, the Kichi just now didn't exactly sound friendly. But if they're going to interrogate you, you still have the truth on your side. All you wanted was to make peaceful contact. Hopefully you can sort that out with the Kichi, and get on with it. And just who was this 'Princess Shaiya' the Kichi mentioned? Did you stumble onto some vacationing noble with an over-protective bodyguard? Before you can think too hard about any of that, the airlock of your ship begins to open.
11332.title: She's hostile!

choices: More Kichi Guards arrive on your ship!
You decide to be adventurous, crossing over to their ship.
Interrogate one of the Kichi, try to figure out what's going on.
113321.content:
Looking through the cameras of your console, you see a number of the Kichi Guard crossing into your ship through the airlock, all of them wearing something akin to a roman helmet on their heads, a spear with a variety of feathers on their tips and a not-so-kind look on their faces. You gulp, unsure as to whether you could take all of them at once.

"Shall I activate Protocol: Repel? You know, the one the Erimosi gave us just in case something that we didn't like invaded our ship?" Panicking, you nod your head, not even knowing what 'Protocol: Repel' will do.

"Alright, here goes nothing!" As alarms started to blare across the entire ship, you hear from behind you the door to the cockpit open, a Kichi Guard standing between you and the exit, her feather spear already pointed towards you.

"So you must be the captain of this ship. Now if you would just put your hands where I can see them, I'm sure we can resolve this diplomatically." Gulping, you started to raise your hands, panic rising in your mind. Just as she was within an arms length of you, multiple mechanical two-clawed arms shot out from hidden sockets in the cockpit, grabbing at the surprised Kichi, and pulling her airborne towards the ceiling, her feather spear uselessly rolling to the ground in front of you.

"Let me go this instant, flesh-ling, or you'll be sorry! Wait, no, stop... Don't do tha-hahahahahahaat! Kehhehheehhehee!" As the Kichi burst into a frenzy of giggles, you move to the side, seeing the claws that were grabbing around her hips start to vibrate vigorously, causing the Kichi to explode in a burst of ticklish spasms.

"No... gnrhrhhgg... Let me go... Right now-hahahhahaa!" Head shaking with laughter, you see the arms move up and down her ribs and sides, their ticklish vibrations making the normally proud guard shake her head wildly, hands clenching and unclenching in frustration.

"So this was Protocol: Repel, Erin?" Hearing a happy beep sound from your console, you move past the giggling Kichi Guard to your main living area in the space ship. Walking past your bathroom, you found it locked, hearing what seemed to be a multitude of mechanical arms inside, along with the laughter of another Kichi Guard. "WAIT NOT THE BRUSHEHEHEHEHHEHEHHEE! STAHAHAHHAHAAAP! DON'T 'CLEAN' MEHEHEHEEE!" Shaking your head in pity, you proceeded on wards to your main living quarters, checking to see if anything was amiss.

As soon as you opened the door, you come face to face with a feather spear, the tip of it almost touching your nose. "Deactivate your defense systems on this ship, or I will help to convince you myself-HEY!" Grinning, you see two mechanical arms grab at the Kichi's own, pulling her into your bed, before a blanket ties her down to the bed, leaving only her head exposed. As more hands slowly crept into the blanket, you hear Erin's voice over the intercoms, "Initiating Wake-up procedures." As the hands started to poke and prod the trapped Kichi, you slowly see her facade crack, a wide smile appearing on her face. As soon as Erin said "Initiating Phase 2", you heard the Kichi before you scream out in laughter, before struggling like mad to get out of the bed.

Closing the door, you headed on towards your cockpit, seeing various Kichi being kept busy by your ship systems. One Kichi was fighting against your Egg-Beater, which had magically sprouted feathers on it's ends, while another two was trapped lying and sitting on your couch and chair respectively, both of them getting tickled by multiple mechanical appendages with feathers on their ends.

As you finally reach the cockpit to decide what to do...
113321.title: The Kichi guard enters your ship.

choices: The Kichi ship is completely deserted.
1133212.content:
It looks like Erin has the situation well in hand with her "Protocol:Repel." The displays on the cockpit show the six Kichi invaders properly subdued. The Kichi next to you in the cockpit is held aloft by Erin's mechanical hands, which continue to wriggle up and down her sides. The alien woman is curled up in laughter, but the hands continue to wriggle against her hips and up to her ribs, keeping her in hysterical laughter.

A screen showing your bathroom has another Kichi squirming in the shower as hands and brushes rub her all over, soaping her up in what seems to be the most ticklish way possible. Erin has the shower door locked, leaving the Kichi stuck with the plethora of tickling instruments. The Kichi on the bed is wrapped up tightly, but the blankets aren't thick enough to protect her from more of Erin's arms, little hands poking at her ribs and belly. Other hands appear to be snaking their way underneath the blanket for even more mischief. You recall Erin saying something about "wake up procedures." With a shiver, you try to remember not to hit the snooze button on the rest of this trip, wondering if Erin was just making a joke or had that in mind for you, too.

In the main room, two Kichi had their backs to each other as they attempted to fend off feathery mechanical tendrils extending from the wall. You have no idea where Erin got all those feathers, but it seems to be working. The Kichi are outnumbered ten to one. For each one they bat away, at least two more wriggle against their skin, stroking underarms, sides, even grazing over the tops of their breasts. And in the kitchen… well, you had no idea so many cooking utensils could be turned to ticklish purposes, the Kichi soldier on the ground, curled up and laughing as she doesn't even try to fend off the horde of brushes and feathers.

"Erin, it seems like you've got things under control here. I'm going to go take a look at the Kichi ship. Keep them occupied, ok?" Erin gives another happy sounding beep. It must be taking a lot of her focus to tickle six aliens to tears. It's a curious defense mechanism, but then again the Kichi all seem to be very ticklish, a fact you file away in your mind for future reference. If they're aggressive, you have an unconventional weapon against them.

You move to the airlock, not bothering to take your helmet. The air between the two vessels had already been mixing, and it looks like both species breathe the same kind of atmosphere. You walk across to the other ship, looking around. There's a wide entrance area, and inclines instead of stairs for the snake-like aliens. The lights of the Kichi ship are dimmer than yours, but still visible. You move quietly through the ship, wary in case there are other Kichi guards still around. But as you move from room to room, the ship seems deserted. Apparently all of them came on board in an attempt to capture you. Even the bridge is empty, although with the alien controls you couldn't hope to operate it.

Then you realize there's one room you haven't entered. Near the bridge is a closed door with a control panel to one side. You decide to push one of the buttons randomly. The door begins to open! Peering inside the last room, you find…
1133212.title: Board the Kichi Vessel

choices: Go back and talk to a Kichi guard
Get back in the tickle machine
11332123.content:
You looked inside the room, but no one was there. As you walk around the room, you start to wonder why the Kichi claimed that it was royal property. You notice a that a multitude of feathers reside on the walls of the ship, and you begin to wonder if the tickling in Protocol: Repel was not an unconventional method after all. As you are about to leave the Kichi ship to return to your own, however, you notice what appears to be a machine in the corner. Curious, you walk over to investigate.

As you start to examine the machine, you notice that the outside is covered in symbols, which you assume are part of Kichi writing. The machine is open, so you look on the inside. There you find that several feathers rest on the sides and on the lower part of the front. In addition to this, there is a chair in the middle of everything. You look up, and restraints appear to be at the top, right next to a button. The button seems placed so that one can only press it if one’s arms are through the restraints. Wondering what the button does, you sit down on the chair, put your hands through the restraints, and press the button.

Suddenly, the restraints close around your wrists, and the machine shuts, trapping you inside. Hands come out from the bottom side of the machine and put your ankles in different restraints, and the feathers rush to your exposed sides and feet. All at once, the feathers hit their targets, and you break out in ticklish laughter. “HAHAHAWHAHATAHA ISHA GOHOOING OHOHON?” you scream. The feathers torment your ticklish tummy and feet, tracing out ticklish patterns on you. After a few minutes of the tickling treatment, you finally think to hit the button again. The button releases you from the tickle torture, the restraints loosen, and the machine opens up.

Freed from the tickling, you get out of the machine and look back. Is that what these Kichi guards were protecting? A tickle machine? You think back and realize the logic of the methods of Protocol: Repel. However, you thought you should probably get back to your mission: establishing relations with the Kichi. You could go back over and talk to one of the Kichi guards, try to establish some common ground with one of them so they wouldn’t be so hostile. But the tickling maybe wasn’t so bad, after all. You did get to control how long it was. Surely the Kichi wouldn’t mind if went took another round in their machine?

You eventually decide to…
11332123.title: A Deserted Alien Ship

1133213.content:
When you get back to the cockpit, you go straight to the first Kichi guard you saw. “Erin, will you lock the doors between the ships?” you request. “I want to know that we will not be disturbed.”

“The doors are secure,” Erin notifies you as you hear something shut and lock on some other part of the ship.

“Also, I need you to stop tickling this one Kichi for a little bit; I need to talk to her,” you command. Erin beeps as she stops tickling the Kichi, although she still restrains the alien’s hands and tail. “What is your name?”

“I am Chae of the Kichi Guard,” the female guard reluctantly responds. “What are you doing in a restricted zone?”

“I’m asking the questions here,” you declare, tickling Chae’s belly for a few seconds and making her laugh. “I want to put out some rules here. First of all, you don’t get to ask any questions. A violation of this will get you tickled. Secondly, if you refuse to answer a question, I will tickle you. Thirdly, if you give an unsatisfactory answer, I will tickle you. Basically, I’m going to ask you questions, and if you do not give me a good answer within a reasonable time, you get tickled. Do you understand?” Chae nods, so you continue, “Why is this part of space restricted?”

“The Kichi Imperial Guard is passing by here to go back to Princess Shaiya,” Chae answers.

“I am the first human to ever have contact with the Kichi,” you announce. “Why would you suspect that I am here to harm you, even though there is nothing to indicate it? I even informed you that we were on a peaceful mission before you boarded, and I was not lying.”

“We needed to make sure,” Chae replies. “We are never sure of the intentions when a ship docks with us.”

“You lie,” you claim, tickling the Kichi’s stomach again with your fingers. “You slowed down and let us link up with you. If you did not want us to link with you, you should have just sped by and avoided us.”

“STAHAHAP!” Chae yells in ticklish laughter. “I’HIHIHILL TEHEHELL YOUHUHUHU!” You stop, and Chae catches her breath for ten seconds. “We did not recognize your vessel. Since we were heading back to the princess, we wanted to make sure that you were not planning on taking over our ship. If you had done this, you could have easily lured the princess in and taken her hostage or killed her.”

“Well, then why did you board after I told you of the peaceful mission?” you demand to know. “I identified myself and my purpose before you came on, but you still came at me armed.”

“Like I said before, we hoped to be sure of your mission,” Chae dictates. “When we were convinced of your peaceful intentions, we would have quickly let you go.”

“So you were going to tickle the truth out of me?” you wonder.

“Yes, that is what would have happened,” Chae confirms, a little more relaxed. “You would have likely been released within the hour.”

“How can I be sure that you are telling the truth?” you inquire, grabbing her feather spear from the ground. “Maybe I should use the same tactics that would have been used on me.” You look over the spear for a few seconds, feeling the feather at the end.

“No, there’s no reason to do that,” Chae stutters, worried.

“I’m not convinced that you are telling the truth yet,” you proclaim, turning back to Chae. “I think that I need to, as you were going to do to me, tickle the truth out of you.”

Wielding the feather spear in your right hand, you put the tip of the weapon on Chae’s right armpit and start moving it back and forth. “HAHAHAHA!” she laughs out as she squirms around in the bondage. Using the spear to tickle the first armpit, you begin wiggling your fingers around Chae’s left armpit. “NOHOHOHO!”

You keep tickling Chae like this for five minutes, and then you suddenly stop. “Are you sure that you have told me the whole truth?” you interrogate.

“Yes,” she quickly answers. “I told you everything that I know.”

“I’m not convinced,” you reveal. “Erin, I’m going to need some help with this. Can you get her stomach and feet? I’m going to keep tickling the armpits.” The mechanical claws return to Chae’s sides and feet, vibrating as they make contact, while you put the feather spear and your fingers back into her hollows.

“NOHOHOHO!” Chae begs with panicked laughter. “PLEHEHEHEASE STAHAHAHAP!” The Kichi prisoner squirms around, trying to escape the tickle torture that you are putting her through.

“I’m sorry, but I still don’t think you are telling the truth,” you declare. “I think that you were going to tickle me until I told you that I was here to harm you, even though it would have been a lie. You would have used that to take me prisoner aboard your ship, and then you would have been able to keep tickling me. That was the real reason you allowed us to dock with you. You just wanted to make me a tickle prisoner.”

“AHAHAHALRIHIHIGHT!” Chae yells out ten minutes later, giving in to your story of the situation.

“Erin, we can stop tickling her now,” you announce, taking away the feather spear. The mechanical claws stop tickling and immediately retreat, and you give Chae a chance to catch her breath. “Did you agree to my statement? Were you just here to tickle me until I gave you the opportunity to make me a tickle prisoner?”

“Yes,” she admits. “We were hoping to bring back a tickle prisoner with us, and we acquired one yet. We were almost done with the mission, and we were desperate, so we decided to link up with you and tickle you. The ship can get pretty boring when there is nothing really significant to do, and a ticklee would have been a nice distraction for us. When you tried to convince us of your peaceful mission before we boarded, we thought that you would be easy bait. We figured that since you would not want to compromise the peacefulness, you would have given into anything, even tickling interrogation. Once we started interrogating you, it was only a matter of time before you confessed to something. Confession would have meant that we could keep you, and you would be our new tickle prisoner. That is the real reason that we boarded the ship.”

You stick the feather spear in her bellybutton, making her laugh a little more, and then you cease and proclaim, “Well, now that you have come clean, I might be able to make something work with you. You see, I still want to make peaceful relations with the Kichi, and now you know for sure that this is the truth. I want you to understand that I would not have tickled you like this if you had not come aboard my ship with such a hostile attitude. Is that clear?”

“Yes,” Chae acknowledges. “I see that now, and I apologize for my crew’s behavior. It was for a fun reason for us, but I now realize what the consequences would have been.”

“Perhaps I could go and meet this Princess Shaiya of yours,” you suggest. “Your crew, with the exception of you, would have to stay on board being tickled to ensure that you do not try to deceive me again. We could begin to make peaceful relations there, and perhaps our species could return to our homes with a better understanding of each other. How does that sound?”
1133213.title: Interrogating the Kichi

11332131.content:
“Alright,” Chae agrees. “On one condition. After we finish making the relations, you must release my crew back to my ship. That is all I ask of you, and we will make sure that you can go in peace.”

“Is all of your crew on my ship?” you inquire.

“Yes, we all came over,” Chae affirms. “We were going to thoroughly investigate your ship while a couple of up took you back onto our ship and tickled you. When we got back to the princess, your ship would have become one more of hers.”

“Does the princess know that you have encountered me?” you question. “Is she expecting to have my ship?”

“We were only going to tell her after we had you,” Chae informs you. “Now, if you don’t mind, will you please answer my question? I’m still curious about my crew’s future.”

“They will be released after the relations are established,” you consent. “It would go against my mission to keep them held here. Necessary measurements on the Kichi species will be obtained while I am meeting with Princess Shaiya. Do we have a deal?”

“We would be happy to make peaceful contact with you,” Chae dictates. “If you want, I can guide our vessels back to the outpost. On the contrary, I could also give you the coordinates, and you could fly us there. I will speak for you to ensure that we get in safely.”

“Please give me the coordinates, and I will get us there,” you request. Chae complies, and soon Erin has prepared to launch there. “Erin, please release Chae so that she can help me contact the Kichi outpost.” Chae is released, and she comes and sits in the copilot’s seat, although you keep her feather sword close to her stomach. After this, you get in your seat, strapping yourself in, and Erin secures all the other Kichi so they will not be affected by the flight.

The Swift Feather and the Kichi ship go jointly to the Kichi outpost, and as you near there, the outpost makes radio contact with you. “Hello, who is this?”

“Chae of the Imperial Guard,” Chae identifies herself. “I have with me a vessel with a human on it. They wish to make contact with our species, and we thought it would be best if we talked to the princess. I have confirmed the peaceful intentions of the human.”

“That will happen,” the Kichi on the radio states, recognizing Chae’s attire. “I’m transmitting landing coordinates to you now. Your ships are being given priority clearance for landing.”

“One more thing,” Chae broadcasts. “I am the only Kichi coming off the ships. My fellow guards are going to be used to give the humans the measurements for our species. I have already given them permission for this.” The Kichi on the radio nods in agreement, and Erin guides you down. When you land, both you and Chae unstrap yourselves from the seats, and Chae informs her crew of what will happen while the contact is being made. “Once we are done, the human will come back on board, and you will be released. You are to come straight back to our ship, and the human will go in peace.” You ensure that your helmet is on good, and then you join Chae to head out of the ship.

“Welcome to Four Laughs, home of Princess Shaiya,” a Kichi guard announces as you follow Chae to the ground. “Please come with me; the princess is waiting for you in earnest.” The two of you trail the guard inside the alien base, and walk for a long while. When you stop in front of doors, the guard motions for them to be opened, revealing a very well decorated room. “I present to you, Princess Shaiya!”

“Welcome!” an alien joyfully proclaims from a throne as you and the entourage walk in. The doors are closed behind you, and you get a chance to observe the room. It is very ornate, with decorations all around. “I am Princess Shaiya of the Kichi. Please come and sit down here.” Two chairs are quickly brought on either side of the throne, and Chae and you sit down. “So, my guards tell me that you are a human. If I am not mistaken, our species have not met before.”

“That is true,” you confirm. “I was hoping to make peaceful contact with the Kichi.”

“I see that you have met Chae,” Shaiya observes. “She is one of my greatest guards. Chae, what do you think of humans?”

“They would make a great ally,” Chae speaks highly of humans. “We do not want to make enemies with them. Peaceful relations would be in our best interest.”

“Well, then it is settled,” Shaiya declares. “We shall have peaceful relations. In addition to being one of my greatest guards, Chae is a great judge of these things. I also heard that you are keeping some of my other guards on your ship to collect measurements. While you are getting those measurements, I would like to request that we get some quick measurements on your species for our scientists.”

“Sure,” you respond. “I have no problem with this.”

“Scientists, it is time for you to come over and evaluate the human,” the princess tells some scientists. They head over to you, and you allow them to take your height and weight. After this, they ask you a few questions, and you tell them common foods for humans, what humans breathe, and basically everything they will need to know about the typical human. Once this is all done, Shaiya continues, “Thank you so very much. If you need any further measurements that the guards on your ship cannot provide, let us know and we will send someone for you. There is one more test that you must undergo, but we cannot do it here. Chae will be sufficient for this, so if you could both please follow me.” Chae and you get up and go with Princess Shaiya to a different room, unaccompanied by Kichi guards. “The last test will be us tickling you. We are very interested in the sensitivity of different species to this phenomenon, so we would like to measure how ticklish you are. Although typically we restrain the ticklee, for the measurement, we would like to make you as comfortable as possible, so you will not be bound. You may keep your helmet on, as we want you to be able to breathe, but for the best measurements, we ask that you please remove the spacesuit and your shoes. I assume that you are wearing something under it.” You nod in agreement, so she continues, “Chae will be tickling you, and then I would like you to tickle Chae. I will then tickle you, and you can tickle me afterwards. Please lie on the bed when you are ready.”

You remove the spacesuit, leaving you in your underwear, and head over to the bed. Chae slithers over, still wielding her feather spear. “How long will this last?” you ask as your tickler approaches, a slight gleam in her eye.

“Thirty seconds on each spot per tool,” Shaiya orders. “You will be tickled on your armpits, ribs, belly, legs, and feet with the feather spear, Chae’s fingers, and Chae’s tail. The measurements will automatically be collected; this is a laboratory. When this is done, you will tickle Chae for ten minutes wherever you want, and then I will tickle you for three minutes. You may end the session by tickling me for three minutes wherever you want. Chae, can you please start with the human’s…”
11332131.title: Kichi Relations

113321311.content:
“Chae, can you please start with the human’s armpits?”

The Kichi guard leans down and places her feather spear into your left armpit. The spear begins to go back and forth, and you immediately break out in laughter, revealing your sensitivity. “HAHAHA! THAHAHAT TIHIHICKLEHES!” Trying to defend yourself, you jerk your left arm down, but Chae uses this opportunity to switch armpits, causing you to laugh even more. The thirty seconds feel like five minutes of tickle torture, but then the guard pulls the feather spear out, letting you rest.

“You are very ticklish, human,” Shaiya observes as you get a break. “Chae, the human’s ribs will be the next target.”

After a thirty-second break, the Kichi takes her feather spear and puts it on your ribs, waving it around. “NAHAHAT AHAHAGAHAHAIN!” you yell, as your ribs are just about as ticklish as your armpits. The feather tickles all over your bare ribs, which highlights your sensitivity. Enjoying her control over you, Chae keeps the feather spear waving at a very quick pace, and your laughter increases in pitch significantly until the tickling stops at thirty seconds.

“I am definitely looking forward to tickling you myself, human,” the princess announces after Chae takes the feather up. “Now it is time to tickle that belly of yours.”

Exhausted, you instinctively cover your stomach, but Chae removes your hands, placing them above your head but not holding them there. The feather spear then returns, waving over your left side and then making its way over your tummy. Extremely ticklish here, you squirm violently to try and get out of the feather’s path. “NOHOHOHOHO! AHANEHEHWHEHERE EHEHELSE!” The Kichi guard quickly inserts the feather spear into your bellybutton for a few seconds, and your laughter jumps up a few pitches at this. “PLEHEHEHESE!” Once the feather gets out of the bellybutton, Chae uses the feather to tickle the rest of your squirming midriff and your right side.

“Wow, you are really going to hate the tail tickling there,” Shaiya proclaims as Chae stops. “The legs are next up.”

At this, the Kichi moves the feather down to your legs and begins tickling your skin. You relax at this, as your legs are not as ticklish. “HEHEHEHEHE,” you giggle, enjoying the test finally. No matter where Chae tries to get you, she cannot find a significant tickle spot on the legs for the thirty seconds.

“I see that this is a more fun tickle spot for you,” the princess states right after the tickling concludes. “That might be a spot where we can tickle you for relaxation. Last but not least is the feet.”

Chae lies her upper body on your ankles, preventing you from moving your feet away from the tickling. The feather spear starts at your heels, which causes you to start to move your legs as it tickles. “HAHAHA!” Knowing how to control her ticklee’s squirming, the Kichi guard easily keeps your feet still as the feather comes up to your soles. “NOHOHO!” Your wriggling gets a little bit more pronounces as a more sensitive spot is it here, and it only gets worse as Chae puts the feather in and around your toes. By the end of the tickling, you are laughing crazily and writhing in ticklish laughter.

“Good, human,” Princess Shaiya declares as Chae ceases the tickle torture. “The next thing we will use to test you is Chae’s…”
113321311.title: Armpits

choices: Tell her you know nothing about this Princess
Try to tell her your peaceful mission again
Lie, and admit to being a spy
113322.content:
You decide that the best thing to do is to go on board the Kichi vessel willingly and explain yourself. Surely they'll figure out your not here to harm or spy on this Princess of theirs? You re-establish communication with the other ship. "Kichi imperial guard, this is the human vessel Swift Feather. I am the only sentient on board, and I am willing to come on board your ship and submit myself for questioning. I have nothing to hide."

You hear the same stern voice of the Kichi guard on your speakers. "We will see about that. Enter slowly, with no weapons, and without that helmet you are wearing. Make no sudden movements." Sighing resignedly, you comply, removing your helmet and strapping out of your seat. You move to the airlock and to the now open airway forcing a connection from your ship to the Kichi vessel. You walk on board slowly, raising your hands above your head and trying to look as non-threatening as possible. "Here I am, I mean no harm! I come in peace!" you say slowly, as you enter the ship. The air inside it is dry, but otherwise normal, and you can smell a vague aroma of spices. Is that how Kichi smell, or is there some kind of perfume in the air?

Before you can think about such things too long, a Kichi woman enters the room. Slithers, you could say, as her lower half undulates back and forth, propelling her forward like a snake. While this alien woman isn't wider than your torso, her body is much longer, you can't quite tell how long she'd be stretched out head to tail. Her 'upper half' looks mostly human, although it's dull gold color wouldn't be natural on anyone you've ever met. She doesn't wear much clothing, some kind of black skirt covers the area where her human-like waist ends and the snake-like parts begin. She also has a black shirt that covers her shoulders and breasts, but no more. Both garments are covered with odd symbols, which you assume are the Kichi writing system. Her torso is elongated compared to a human's, her bare stomach stretched long and taut, with a sizeable navel. Her face is also dull gold in color, with snake eyes the color of burnt orange, and jet black hair hanging from her head.

"Stop gawking, prisoner." The Kichi tells you, in the same voice you heard before. "I am Chiy of the Imperial Guard, and you are my captive. Now I will figure out whether you are a spy or an assassin." You gulp, if she's already that negative on you, you don't like your chances. Still, you're hopeful this Chiy will listen to reason. The Kichi slithers closer to you, leaning her taller form over you as she lifts herself up on her tail. She reaches out to you with one hand and grabs your side, just above your hip. Whether intentional or not, the squeeze to your side managed to tickle considerably. The fabric of your suit conveyed the feel of her fingertips as if you were wearing nothing at all. You twitch in the grasp, and cough, trying to conceal a yelp of embarrassing laughter.

It doesn't seem like you succeeded, as a wide grin spreads on Chiy's face, showing two noticeable fangs. "Ah, I do believe I will be able to get answers out of you. Now tell me, alien, how did you learn Princess Shaiya would be here?" You notice your other hand reaching out to grab you as well, as you struggle to reply.
113322.title: You willingly come aboard the Kichi ship.

113323.content:
As the hatch of your ship opens, you hear a strange hissing noise, and notice some kind of misty gas entering your ship. "Erin! There's some kind of gas coming into the ship! What is it?!" You look around, seeing the substance quickly filling up the ship. And despite the fact that you're wearing a helmet, you start to smell something that reminds you of… cinnamon?

"The gas isn't in any of my databanks!" Erin responds hurriedly. "I'm trying to run an analysis as quickly as I can. It seems to be able to get through our filtration system, and your helmet. Don't breath it in!"

But it's too late. The smell of cinnamon fills your nose, and for some reason you can't muster the will to hold your breath. What's the use, anyway? You'd have to breath sooner or later. And this gas probably isn't doing anything bad to you, is it?

"Captain! This gas has some kind of relaxant and psychoactive properties! I can't tell what it does, but… captain? Captain, are you ok?!" Erin calls out to you, but you don't respond. You don't want to respond. You feel extremely relaxed and content. Whatever this gas is, it feels great. If you could just lie here for a while and enjoy it, you'd be perfectly happy. Erin keeps talking, but you stop paying attention, breathing in the cinnamon-scented gas easily. It smells nice. You feel a wide grin spread across your face, leaning back in the chair.

You decide it's a little hard to breathe in the helmet, and it's not doing any good anyway. You take it off, letting it drop to the floor. Erin is still talking to you, louder now, but you reach up and mute her, not wanting to pay attention to anything she's saying. You don’t want to pay attention to anything at all. Just the gas. But you also notice that you're starting to feel sleepy. Maybe the warp jump tired you out? Yes, that must be it. You lean back in your chair and close your eyes, deciding a nap would be perfect right now...

----

You find yourself slowly waking up some time later, on some kind of large bed. Looking around the room, you see...
113323.title: Your ship starts filling up with a strange gas!

choices: "Just how much tickling can a human male take?"
"Just how much tickling can a human female take?"
1133231.content:
You woke up from the most pleasant and restful sleep of your life feeling refreshed and energetic, yet you still feel very relaxed and easygoing. You decide to really lay back into the soft, plush bed that... wait a minute, where are you? You sit up and look around. You are in a rather large room, a rather... personal room even. There was a large window looking out into the cosmos that caught your eye, but you tore your gaze away from the stars to figure out where exactly you were! You saw a mirror with a large, slightly upstanding cushion in front of it to your left, there was a large vine that curled straight up, twisted tightly. The window was directly in front of you. To the right of the window was another plant, this was seemed to look more like a giant 6-foot tall Venus flytrap with a big wide mouth. Periodically its leaves would move as if they caught a breeze despite the air being still in the room. It sent a shiver of fear down your spine. To the right of that, there was a wall, and the realization that this bed was in the center of the massive room facing away from the door, and seemed to take up a sizable chunk of the massive room. Somewhere behind you, a crystalline light shone dimly on the room in a slightly red tint.

That's when you realized your clothes were gone.

You soon realized your were also bound loosely, but inescapably. Your arms and legs were covered with sleeves that disconnected at the joints and were made of a strange crimson, slightly luminescent gelatin-like substance.
