“I’m interested in what you do on a normal basis,” you declare.

“Well, I work at the assembly here, specializing in the human species,” she reveals. “My team usually just analyzes what humans currently have and how to give you the best chance for improvement. We designed the set of missions that Erin told you on the Swift Feather. However, we also did not know how you would react to it, so we were working on new possibilities for missions. That work usually takes up about half of the day, and the other half is filled with off time and fun activities. Would you like to see some of the new options we were working on, or would you like to do something else?”
144.title: Talk with Avallala

1442.content:
“What do you do for fun?” you ask Avallala. “You said that about half of your day was filled with ‘fun’, and I am interested in knowing what this entails.”

“In order to do this properly, you must excuse me for a minute,” Avallala starts. “I was not necessarily planning on being here a long time, although I do enjoy talking with humans. However, now that we will be staying here, I do not believe there is a reason for me to stay in my formal robes. Is it alright if I leave for a minute to get changed into my normal clothes?”

“Of course,” you allow. “I would not want to make you uncomfortable.”

“Thank you,” she graciously states before leaving for a minute. When Avallala returns, she is wearing an outfit like a human bikini, with her stomach and legs exposed to you. “This is more typical of what Erimosi wear on a normal basis. We wore the formal robes because the research stated that you would respond better to that. However, now that you are the first human scout who will explore the universe, I figure that you should know the true Erimosi. How do you like it?”

“It looks really good on you,” you respond, looking over the Erimosi form.

“Well, I guess we should get back to your question now that I am comfortable,” Avallala declares. “When we have breaks, this is one of the rooms that my coworkers and I usually come to. With the couches providing a very comfortable place, we find it easy to relax and let go of stress. However, the real fun comes if someone falls asleep and does not wake up before we have to end the break. This has happened to me a few times and different colleagues several times. Please take off your shoes; as you can see, we don’t wear them. After that, I want you to lay down on the couch and close your eyes, and I will show you what happens.”

You do as Avallala has instructed, and she leaves you alone for a minute or so, allowing you to really relax and start to fall asleep. Then it comes. The first thing you feel is a feather tip coming up onto the side of your belly, and then another touches the sole of your foot. “HEHEHEHEHE,” you giggle at the light tickles. The feathers progress to the center of your stomach and up to your toes, simply covering your ticklish spots as they go. Realizing that Avallala has put you in a very ticklish situation, you begin to laugh harder. “HAHAHAHA!” Avallala moves the feathers back and forth over your belly and up and down your feet, causing you to break out in hysterical laughter for fifteen minutes. When she finally lets you out of the tickling, you gasp for air for a minute. You look up and Avallala is holding two of the feathers from the vases in the corner. “So you use the feathers to tickle anyone who falls asleep?” you ask her.

“Correct,” Avallala affirms. “The Erimosi are very ticklish on our bellies and feet, and apparently, humans are too. I understand that our space experts did not introduce you to the tickling custom, but we Erimosi very much enjoy tickling, both giving it out and receiving it. There is one more option that we sometimes choose with the sleepers, and this is also done to conscious Erimosi fairly often. Would you like me to show it to you?”

“Sure,” you offer the tickling-obsessed Erimosi.

“Please stand up and place your hands in the air,” Avallala commands. You do as she says, and the Erimosi continues, “These feathers are very flexible, and we will frequently take advantage of that fact.” She wraps the feather around you, and then she starts to press on certain parts of your body.

As the different parts are enclosed, the feather touches them and waves around in small circles, giving a strong tickling feeling. “OAHAHOAHAHAHAHOHOHA!” you exclaim as the different parts of your body are tickled. Avallala takes advantage of your bound state to use the feather to tickle your armpits, chest, ribcage, belly, sides, back, legs, knees, thighs, and feet. With each of these, your laughter’s intensity corresponds to how ticklish that body part is. The hardest laughter occurs at the armpits, belly, and feet, as these are your most ticklish spots. Following the tickling, Avallala unwraps the feather, freeing you. “That tickled quite a bit.”

“Yes, that is a common way for determining someone’s tickle spots,” Avallala notifies you. “We have more ways of tickling each other. Would you like me to show you the different ways and places that we tickle each other, or would you like to tickle me with the ways I have shown you?”
1442.title: Erimosi Fun

14422.content:
“I think I’d like to tickle you,” you announce to Avallala. “I’ll try the couch method first with the feathers.”

She nods in reply and goes to the couch, laying down, putting her hands behind her head. You go and pick out a blue and a white feather from a vase, and they are very light, even for their size. Once you have the feathers, you guide them over to Avallala’s exposed form and move them against her bare belly and feet. “HAHAHA!” Avallala laughs, squirming a tiny bit. “THIHIHIS IHIHIS FUHUHUN!” You start waving the feathers a little faster, and Avallala’s laughter increases, but she stops squirming. “KEHEHEHEP TIHIHICKLIHIHING!” Amazed that the Erimosi actually likes being tickled, you comply with her request and keep the feathers going on her for ten minutes. You then cease the tickling and remove the feathers. “That was fun! Why’d you stop?”

“Since you liked it so much, I wanted to try something else,” you proclaim as you put the feathers back in the vases. “Close your eyes.” Avallala does as you say, and you quietly tiptoe to the couch, trying not to let the Erimosi know what you are up to.

Once you reach Avallala, you plunge your fingers into her tummy and start tickling, causing immediate laughter. “THAHAHAT TIHIHICKLES AHAHA LOHOHOT!” she yells, although she does not try to protect herself at all. Your fingers explore all over the bare midriff of your host, and she just laughs along, appearing to enjoy it.

However, just as you are getting used to having the tickling control, Avallala suddenly places her fingers at your sides and begins tickling you again. “HAHAHA!” you laugh, retracting your fingers and falling down to try and defend yourself. You quickly recover from the tickle attack, as you are out of Avallala’s reach when you hit the ground, and go back to get a feather. When you retrieve an orange feather, you turn around and notice that Avallala has gotten a blue feather. You both slowly advance towards each other, feathers in hand, ready for the tickle fight that is to take place. Who strikes first?
14422.title: Ticklish Erimosi

1443.content:
Talking with Avallala has relaxed you quite a bit, and you decide that the best course of action would be to keep talking with her. “So, you say that half of your day is filled with fun,” you address her earlier remark. “Is that during work or outside of work?”

“Oh, I was talking about during work then,” the Erimosi responds. “Outside of work, there’s almost nothing but fun to do.”

“What do you do outside of work?” you curiously inquire.

“Well, on most days, I actually end up just going home,” Avallala states. “Then I have activities that I love to do with my family.”

“What kind of activities?” you probe for more specific answers.

“Well…” It seemed like Avallala was considering not telling you what it is that she and her family do at night. You thought that maybe it had to do with the ‘strange customs’ that the Erimosi had only revealed to humans in general terms, but you did certainly want to know about them. With you continuing to look at Avallala intently, she eventually broke, “Alright, I guess I can tell you. We typically involve a lot of tickling in our activities. It is a very common base for activities in Erimosi culture, and we enjoy it very much. If you would like, I can give you a firsthand demonstration of the activities, as it ought to prepare you some for what you will experience later in your exploration. I have been authorized, if requested, to give you a tour of my home and introduce you to such activities, and I’d be willing to get into trouble to expand the places I can take you for the sake of curiosity. Would you like to go to my house, or would you like to go somewhere a little more… unique? Of course, I would be happy to provide other options if you would rather get back on mission.”

Your eyes opened by Avallala’s offer, you decide to…
1443.title: More Conversation

choices: Go to a tickle slave auction
14432.content:
You decide that you want to go somewhere other than just the standard Erimosi house, so you tell Avallala, “Thank you for the offer to see your house, but I’d like to see what else is out there, if that’s alright with you.”

“Of course; I was actually hoping you’d say that,” Avallala responded with the smile-like facial expression. “The most notable place I could take you is an Erimosi tickle slave auction. I am sure that you did not know this before, but the Erimosi absolutely love to tickle other Erimosi, as well as other species. One of the ways we express this is through the buying and selling of tickle slaves. At an auction, you would have the opportunity to see several different species of slaves, and I might just be willing to get you one. As a matter of fact, I know of a tickle slave auction going on today on my home planet, which is not very far away. Do you think that wound sound interesting? I can always take you somewhere else if you don’t think that suits you.”

You think about it for a minute before answering…
14432.title: Tickle Slave Auction?

144321.content:
“I think it could be fun to go to a tickle slave auction,” you announce. “Plus, it’d be a great opportunity for me to learn more about Erimosi culture firsthand, which is one of the goals that humanity wanted me to achieve.”

“Yes, that would definitely fulfill that goal,” Avallala confirms. “We will go take my ship back to my home planet, and then we can get a security team and go to the tickle slave auction.”

“Why the security team?” you question, wondering why this is necessary.

“Well, this isn’t a part of Erimosi culture that I’m proud of, but Erimosi often assume that unique species at a tickle slave auction must be tickle slaves being sold,” Avallala responds. “Most Erimosi have never seen a human face-to-face before, and I am afraid that they will mistake you for a tickle slave and try to sell you. To counter that, we will bring a security team that prevent anyone from mistaking you as a tickle slave. I must say, human, that as a unique species, you would bring in a lot of currency to your seller, and because of that fact, I want to make sure that this does not happen. However, with my security team escorting you around, I am sure that you will be safe. I will also inform the event organizers that you are my guest partner for the auction and have their security look out to protect you, which will give you plenty more protection that you could possibly need.

“Are you sure I’ll be safe?” you wonder, now a little worried.

“I guarantee it,” Avallala reassures you. “My full security team is more protection than you will need; the event security team is just a backup to help us get rid of offenders quicker. Now, I might even be able to buy you a tickle slave there. It’s not exactly standard protocol on the typical missions we help other species with, but it could be my gift to the human race.”

“That sounds interesting,” you declare, and with that, the two of you head out to Avallala’s ship.

It is about twice the size of the Swift Feather, and going inside, you see that it is meant for a whole crew, and apparently, there is a crew manning it. “Miss Avallala, who is this?” an Erimosi asks as she grabs you from behind, placing her fingers near your stomach.

“Kazol, release my guest,” Avallala commands, and the Erimosi did so reluctantly. “This is a human. They are a species from the planet Earth, the one I specialize in. With our help, they recently developed their warp drive and have sent out the first explorer, my guest. He/she came and wanted to get to know some about Erimosi culture, so I suggested that we attend the tickle slave auction on Iiloned. Human, that is my home planet, in case you were wondering. Kazol, if you would, we would like to head to Iiloned as soon as possible.”

“Of course, Miss Avallala,” the Erimosi affirms as she tried to comprehend all the information she had just been given. “We will be there in two standard hours.”

“Come with me,” Avallala instructs you as she heads to another room on the ship. “We need to sit down for takeoff, and then I can introduce you to the crew of the Illians. Here; this seat should be good for you.” You sit down and quickly figure out how to strap yourself in; the system is very similar to the one on the Swift Feather, so it is no trouble at all.

Not very long after you and Avallala are strapped in, you hear Kazol’s voice over the ship’s communication system, “Everyone, we will be taking off in a minute! Get strapped in!” True to her word, you soon feel yourself being pushed back and down into your seat as the ship takes off. The ship begins to stabilize a couple of minutes after taking off, and Kazol announces over the radio, “We have reached stability. Feel free to move around the cabin and say hello to our human guest. We will arrive at Iiloned in just under two standard hours.”

“Let’s meet the crew!” Avallala excitedly tells you as the two of you unstrap yourselves. “You’ve already met Kazol. She’s the pilot, and in my absence, the captain of the Illians. We can start by heading to the engineering station.” You follow Avallala through a few hallways, and soon you come upon two Erimosi clad in only bikini-type outfits. “Human, these are my engineers. Meet Prosca and Wennelier. Prosca is the head engineer, and she is training Wennelier to help out with the ship. Prosca, Wennelier, meet this human explorer, who is my guest for this trip.”

“Nice to meet you,” Prosca extends a hand. You reciprocate the move, but instead of shaking your hand, the Erimosi reaches in and tickled your armpit, causing you to shoot your arm back to protect yourself as you giggle. “Good to see that humans are ticklish, too. It makes for a fun time when everyone’s ticklish.”

“Also nice to meet you, human, but I won’t do what my mentor did.” Wennelier decides to instead just smile and wave rather than the traditional greeting. “If there is any problem with the ship itself, please don’t hesitate to come to us.”

“Thanks for meeting the human,” Avallala proclaims before you head off with her again. “Sorry for the tickle greeting; guess I forgot to tell you that Erimosi love to tickle as a greeting, so you’ve got to protect any hot tickle spots. Anyway, let’s go to the…”
144321.title: Going to the Tickle Slave Auction

1443212.content:
“I think we should go to the brig next,” Avallala declares. Seeing the concerned look on your face, she adds, “Human, you should know that I am not intending to put you in there or anything like that. It’s just most Erimosi consider the brig one of the most important parts of the ship, and I want you to see what one is like so that you are not shocked if you ever go on another Erimosi ship. It is also a good introduction to some of the technology you will see at the tickle slave auction. As you may have suspected, given our fascination with tickling, the Erimosi have developed several technologies to assist in or perform tickling, and these are commonplace on Erimosi planets. We have some of them in our brig, and I would like to show you how these devices work so that you have a better idea of what is happening at the tickle slave auction.”

“How exactly do you plan on demonstrating these?” you ask, wondering if this is really a trap just to tickle you.

“Well, I’m not going to have them all tested on you,” Avallala responded with a smirk. “Or probably even most of them. I’m going to be testing some of them myself, and I’ll have Izlef, our brig chief and interrogator, test the ones that I find fun on you. Of course, if Izlef happens to have someone down there already, she might just test all of them on her subject, and none of them on us. I know my belly would prefer that for sure; that’s my most ticklish spot. Speaking of which, I really should ask: What is your most ticklish spot? It’s practically a requirement to step on an Erimosi planet, so you’ll have to say it anyways eventually. I won’t have it tortured, I promise. I’d like you to enjoy this visit.”
1443212.title: Heading to the Brig

choices: “You can test some of your best stuff on her ticklish belly.”
“His tummy is just waiting for tickles.”
14432121.content:
“Ah, so you have a ticklish tummy, too?” Avallala inquired with an understanding smile. “Pretty hard for you to keep that from getting tickled, right?”

“Huh?” you look at her with a confused look on your face.

“Oh, right, I keep forgetting that humans aren’t into tickling as much as the Erimosi, sorry,” Avallala responded, realizing her error. “Since Erimosi love tickling each other, tummies get tickled quite a bit, regardless of whether it’s the most ticklish spot. We tend to think of easy tickle targets and exploit them. Humans probably don’t do that, do they?”

“No, not really,” you laugh off the misunderstanding, returning to a relaxed state. “Although it is a good tool to get someone in a playful mood, so there’s definitely times we seek out the easy tickle spot.”

“Well, in that case, the Erimosi are a very playful species,” Avallala declares, playfully reaching out her hand and tickling you in the stomach. “We love to put others in a playful mood.”

“HAHAHA!” you squeal as you back away, accepting the playful mood and smiling happily. “As much as I’d like to tickle you now, I do want to see what kind of tools and tech you have for tickling. This is sounding more interesting by the minute.”

“I’m glad you’re taking a liking to it,” Avallala announces. “And yes, you are right, we should get over to the brig if we want to see the most. Just so you know, we’re going to have to test some of this tech on your belly and some on my belly so you can get the best picture of what it does.”

“And I’m sure it’s partly so you can find out just how ticklish I am,” you counter playfully, still excited about this.

“Well, the thought had crossed my mind,” Avallala admits as she guides you to the brig. Within a few minutes, you have arrived, and an Erimosi, almost not even wearing the standard crew outfit of a bikini, is messing with something on a table. “Izlef!”

“Yes, Avallala?” Izlef turns her head, noticing you and getting giddy. “Ooh, have you brought me a prisoner that I can interrogate? I’ve been wanting to get my fingers on someone new.”

“What- No, I haven’t,” Avallala answers after a second of confusion. “No, Izlef, this is the human guest that Kazol talked about when we took off. We’re heading to the tickle slave auction, and I wanted to let the human know about some of the tech that we’ll be seeing before we get there.”

“Oh, too bad for me, but fun for the human,” Izlef still seems a little disappointed.

“But we have agreed that as a part of this, we will both be testing the tech,” Avallala proclaims, causing Izlef to perk up a little bit.
14432121.title: A Pair of Ticklish Tummies

144321211.content:
“You can test some of your best stuff on her ticklish belly,” Avallala declares. “And, of course, you can test some others on mine. We both want to laugh a lot.”

“Ooh, two ticklees for me,” Izlef grows excited. “Both of you, lay down on the table.” You comply with her request, and soon Avallala and you are side by side. “In order for this to be effective, I need to tie both your arms and legs up with my energy bonds, and then I need to bare the human’s belly. Got it?” You both nod, and the Erimosi restrains both of you on the table. “I’ll start with a relatively simple testing device called the Rolling Giggler. Essentially, it will roll around the spot that it is placed and test for the most ticklish spots. At tickle slave auctions, it is used to show potential buyers where the most ticklish spots on a tickle slave are. I’ll be testing this on your tummies since that’s where you are both most ticklish.”

Izlef pulls out two small, round devices with flat bottoms and places them on your midriffs. She then presses a button on top, and the device raises up a little bit, revealing a circular brush below it. Almost immediately, you feel giggles coming up through your throat as the brush begins to spin around on your stomach. Determined not to give in right away, you manage to hold in your laughter, at least until the brush begins moving up and down your abdomen. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” you break out laughing. “TIHIHIHIHIHICKLEHEHEHES!” Avallala did not last long either, having started her own laughing the moment the brush on her belly began spinning. To add to your torment, the Rolling Giggler explores all around your belly, finding that your bellybutton is the hottest spot on you, and the front of your midsection is also very ticklish, if just slightly more than your sides. In fact, as the tickle tool enters your bellybutton, you fully surrender to its tickling ministrations and beg Izlef, “IHIHIZLEHEHEF! MAHAHAHAHAHAHAKE IHIHIHIHIHIT STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!” The interrogator, however, refuses to do so, allowing the device plenty of time to explore your navel and prove to anyone who has been listening that this is, without a doubt, your most ticklish spot. On the other hand, Avallala, while also having a ticklish bellybutton, is most ticklish on her sides, followed by her bellybutton, and the front of her belly is the least ticklish spot on her midriff. Once the initial testing is done, the Rolling Gigglers go back to the most ticklish spots, the bellybutton for you and Avallala’s right side, and persistently tickle them, causing you both to beg for mercy for Izlef. Enjoying your torment, the interrogator allows the Rolling Gigglers to work your most ticklish spots over for five minutes before she finally shuts them down and removes them from your ticklish tummies.

“So, I see that the human has a hyper-sensitive bellybutton,” Izlef observes, sticking a finger in your bellybutton and wiggling it around, which elicits shrieks of laughter from you and a few pleas for her to stop. “And Avallala, have your sides gotten more ticklish since I had you in here last?” Izlef conducts a quick ticklish dance over her boss’s sides, causing Avallala to squeal and try to plainly say that she is not more ticklish than before. “I think you are, though, but enough with me talking. We’ve got more tools to test, and I think that we should tickle…”
144321211.title: Device 1: Rolling Giggler

choices: Turn up the intensity of the Button Teaser
1443212111.content:
“I think that we should tickle the human’s bellybutton next,” Izlef announces, poking your bellybutton and earning a squeal from you. “Not knowing much about humans, I’m intrigued by how ticklish you seem to be, and I’d like to test more on that.”

‘Of course it’s me,’ you think to yourself. ‘They will always pick the helpless human who can’t do anything about being tickled.’

“However, given that the human seemed quite tortured by the Rolling Gigglers, I think we might need to go to a lighter touch for now,” Izlef declares, drawing a smirk from Avallala that you cannot see. “I’ll have you test out a Button Teaser.”

“Alright,” you respond, not really knowing what these are but thinking they are less tickly than the Rolling Gigglers based on what Izlef was saying about going with a lighter touch.

“Good, let’s get them on you.” Izlef walks over to a bench and pulls out a small object. It is shaped almost like a semi sphere, but instead of a circle at the middle, it has a square. “Alright, this machine will tease and tickle your bellybutton. In tickle slave auctions, these are often used to keep tickle slaves with ticklish bellybuttons laughing on stage while they’re being auctioned off. Let’s fit this right in here.” Izlef places the device in your bellybutton, with the rounded edge going inside and the rest of the device holding it in place outside. “Now, since Button Teasers focus on one spot, ticklees will often try to buck them out of their bellybuttons, so I’m going to place this suction around your bellybutton and over the Button Teaser. This will just prevent you from pushing the Button Teaser out of your bellybutton. Understand?” You nod in affirmation, now wondering if this is really as light as you thought it would be. Once the suction cup is on, Izlef takes out a remote. “As you might be able to tell, this is the remote for your Button Teaser. I’m going to begin on a really light setting, and I might increase it, depending on how you are doing. Are you ready to start?”

“Well, I guess I’m AHAHA!” you squeal as you feel a few feathers come out from the Button Teaser and lightly brush over your bellybutton. “AHAHAHA THAHAHAHAHAT TIHIHIHICKLEHEHEHES!” Immediately, your defensive reactions take over, and you begin to lightly squirm in response to the tickling in your navel.

“Well, of course it tickles, silly human,” Izlef teases. “Tickle, tickle, tickle! The human’s bellybutton is super ticklish!”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The feathers from the Button Teaser aren’t tickling all that much, but the fact that they are concentrated at your most ticklish spot makes it feel so much worse than usual, and you can’t help but keep laughing hysterically.

After a couple minutes of this, Izlef decides to…
1443212111.title: Of Course It's You

choices: Or does she tickle her some place else, equally as sensitive?
14432121111.content:
Izlef smiles at your hysterical laughter and recognizes that this is only the light setting, so you can handle much more. Or, if you can’t, she thinks to herself, it’ll be fun to watch either way!.

She lifts up the remote and turns the dial from really light to “medium intensity”. You’re eyes fly open as the feathers begin to brush and twist all across the inner walls of your innie belly button,sending tickles through your belly.

hahahahahHAHAHAHAHAHAHANOOOOOOPLLEEEEEAAASSEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH

You guffaw loudly and begin letting out even louder belly laughs due to the Teaser doing its work across the walls and eventually the tiny knot at the bottom of your belly button. Your loud laughter starts to reach levels of hysteria as your partner looks on in fear and wonder.

Izlef realizes you are reaching your breaking point here and shuts off the Teaser. She lets you catch your breath and says “wow! I knew humans were ticklish but that was insane! I didn’t know belly buttons could be that sensitive and your endurance is astounding”.

You, very tired, can only nod and say to her “can you let me go now?” Izlef smiles and says “Sure...after one last test!” She smiles wickedly and turns the dial on the Button Teaser to “deep tickling” and you feel the device whir inside of your belly button.

Suddenly what feels like a vibrating brush like from the head of a toothbrush pops out and runs it’s bristles across your innie’s Walls! You break out in your loudest laughter so far and shake in your bones!

HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHNOOOOOOOIIICAAAANTTTAAAAAKEIIIITTTTTPLEEEEAAAAHAHAHAHAHA H!!

Your laughter reaches silent levels as the bristles play across the knot at the bottom of your bellybutton. The bristles press into it like it’s a tickle button to press and send messages of tickle panic through your body. Your back arches up in response but nothing you can do will make the Teaser stop toying with your belly button. You laugh your head off in silent laughter for a few minutes until Izlef takes pity on you and shits the device off. She removed it from your navel, teasing your rim a little as she brings it out, drawing a few giggles.

“Now”, she says, “what about your friend here? She had a very fun reaction to the Roller and I’m sure she’s a ticklish playground. What should I do with her?”

Does Izlef...
14432121111.title: Turn up the intensity of the Button Teaser

choices: Skip to the tickle slave market
144321211111.content:
Izlef announces, “So human, I only showed you part of the functions of the Button Teaser, but I think Avallala would be more than willing to demonstrate some more of them. Isn’t that right?”

Avallala’s face is full of horror, but you are just happy that someone else is getting tickled, so you interject, “Yes, I’d love to see more functions of the Button Teaser, and it sure looks like Avallala wants to help demonstrate them.”

“Well, the Button Teaser is good for teasing tickles, and as you found out, it can also tickle pretty deep in your bellybutton,” Izlef declares as she places the Button Teaser in Avallala’s navel, “but it also has tools other than feathers and bristles that can be used.” You cock your head curiously at this, wondering what exactly Izlef is talking about. “Here, I’ll demonstrate the flosser tool on Avallala. She’s already had some experience with this, so let’s just start it on medium.”

Suddenly, you see Avallala burst into laughter as Izlef turns the Button Teaser on, and it is pretty obvious that it is doing more than light tickling. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” At first, all she can do is laugh as the ticklish sensations overwhelm her. However, she soon musters up the energy to beg for it to stop, “PLEHEHEHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAHAHAHAP! NAHAHAHAHAHAHAT THAHAHAHAHAHAHAT!” Her squirms become very wild as the tickling overwhelms that one little spot on her body.

“Well, in order for you to know what it is like for the ticklees at the Tickle Slave Market, we’ll keep demonstrating the flosser tool for… let’s say, another five minutes,” Izlef denies Avallala’s request, which half sounds like a demand, for the tickling to stop as you and her enjoy the tickle torture being inflicted on Avallala.

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Within a few minutes, all Avallala can do is laugh, and soon after that, her laughter goes silent, a testament to just how much the flosser implement tickles. She is completely worn out by the time that Izlef actually turns the Button Teaser off. As the Erimosi interrogator removes the Button Teaser from your companion’s belly, she begins to catch her breath, mixing in residual giggles with gasps for air. Finally, she eventually has enough breath to tell Izlef, “That tickled so much, and you better not pull a stunt like that on me again. If you do, I’ll have you put in here; I’m sure some of the other crew members would like to see how ticklish you are.”

“Well, you asked me to demonstrate tickle tools on both the human and you,” Izlef comments. “You’re not done yet. Let’s see what else we have in store for you, Avallala.”

Do you want to see Avallala get tickled more or skip to when everyone gets to the tickle slave market?
144321211111.title: Erimosi have Tickle Buttons, Too

1443212111112.content:
A little while later, Avallala’s ship lands on the Erimosi planet of Iiloned, and the two of you get out. “Human, welcome to my home planet,” Avallala announces as you get out and look around. The planet is quite a beautiful one, with a lot of waterfalls and rivers in the distance, and even a river running very near the place where you land. “What do you think so far?”

“Wow,” you are unable to come up with anything coherent, so that’s all that comes out of your mouth. “I mean, wow! I’ve seen some places like this on Earth, and this is some of my favorite type of scenery. I love the rivers and waterfalls in the distance; it just looks so pretty here.” You keep looking around, and soon you see some Erimosi coming towards you. “Also, I should mention that your species is very nice looking. I’m so glad you invited me here.”

“Well, thank you, human,” Avallala responds. “That should be our security team. They’ll get us a ride to the tickle slave auction and protect you there as we look around.” The group of Erimosi gets closer, and you soon see that they all have what at first looks like standard weapons, but upon closer observation, does not look like anything you’ve ever seen before. It must be some sort of alien technology, and you are very curious about what it does. When the security group gets within hearing range, Avallala addresses them, “Hello, Wokka, and your team. Thank you for coming on such short notice. This is the human I was telling you about. Human, I’d like you to meet our security team. The head guard is Wokka, and here are her associates.”

“Pleasure to meet you,” you say as you extend a hand to the Erimosi who seem to be in charge. She looks at you confused for a second, but then reaches in and tickles your side, causing you to squeal and back away. “HEHEHE!” At this, Wokka looks even more confused, tilting her head at you and looking for an explanation.

“I’m sorry, Wokka; the human has just begun her exploration, and she is still getting used to Erimosi greetings,” Avallala steps in to explain. “What she offered you was a traditional human handshake; it’s how humans greet each other.”

“Ah,” Wokka replies, now understanding what you meant. “Well, hello to you, too, human. It’s our honor to have you here, and it’s our pleasure to be working to protect you today. Now before we get going, we need to know your most ticklish spot. It will help us best protect you by making sure to prevent anyone from tickling you there.”

“It’s my belly, especially the bellybutton,” you admit, sort of sheepishly.

“Alright; that’s a pretty fun spot to have tickled, at least for us Erimosi,” Wokka states. “But we will do everything we can to prevent you from being tickled there, since we want you to be and feel safe here. On that note, do you have any questions before we proceed to the auction?”

“I’ve never seen anything like those tools, I guess, that you have on you,” you point towards some of the things the Erimosi guards have strapped to them. “I was just wondering what they are?”

“Oh, these are our weapons,” Wokka informs you. “Non-lethal, of course, but effective. We can show you what they do, if you’d like.”

“Sure,” you answer hesitantly.

“Human, don’t worry; we’re not going to demonstrate them on you,” Wokka announces, seeing the concerned look on your face and causing a worried look to appear on Avallala’s face. “You are our guest, so we will test them on your host, Avallala.”

“You don’t need to AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Avallala’s protests are quieted when Wokka points her weapon, a small gun, at her and pulls the trigger.

“This is a tickle gun, made by the Erimosi,” Wokka notifies you. “It basically stimulates tickling sensations wherever it hits on the target while it’s being fired.” After tickling Avallala for half a minute with this, she releases the trigger, asking for another weapon from one of her guards. “This is a stun gun. It keeps the target stunned in place for five standard minutes; however, it does nothing to their ability to feel, so you can tickle them while their stunned. It is typically used to trap someone and then tickle them, a particularly useful skill for traveling around tickle slave markets.” Avallala had begun to try and sneak away when she was shot from behind by Wokka and froze in place. “Now that Avallala can’t move, how about we tickle her with some of the other weapons we have? This is a tickle baton. You hold it up against a victim’s ticklish spot and press this button, and it releases some intense tickling sensations on them. This is a standard first weapon for a guard to be issued. It’s a Kichi feather spear. Basically, it just acts as a spear, but instead of a sharp, pointy end, it’s got feathers to you can tickle others with it. Which would you rather try?”
1443212111112.title: Meeting Your Guards

choices: “Thanks, but I’d like to get her with my own hands.”
14432121111121.content:
“I’d like to try out the tickle baton,” you announce. “It sounds like it would be fun to use.”

“Please, human, please don’t do that,” Avallala desperately pleaded.

“Don’t listen to her; you should be having fun here,” Wokka encourages. “If this will be fun for you, you should just do it.”

“Thanks, Wokka, I think I will,” you declare, taking the tickle baton from her. “Tickle, tickle, Avallala!”

“AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Avallala breaks out into hysterical laughter when you press the tickle baton into her bare side. “NOHOHOHOHOHO HUHUHUHUHUMAHAHAHAN! STAHAHAHAHAP IHIHIHIHIT!”

“But this is so fun,” you comment as you press the tickle baton harder against your host’s most ticklish spot.

“Human, would you like me to assist you?” Wokka wonders. “I know for a fact that Avallala has two ticklish sides, and I would be more than happy to get the other. Of course, if you want to tickle it, I’m sure your fingers would do the trick.”

You consider Wokka’s proposal for a minute before deciding,
14432121111121.title: Testing the Tickle Baton

choices: Collapses on the ground to try and escape the tickling
144321211111211.content:
“Sure!” you decide to let Wokka join. “The more ticklers we have on her, the better.”

“I’d be happy to assist, but we do need to do one thing first,” Wokka announces. “Please remove your hands from her stomach. We’re going to add another five minutes onto her stun time so we can have lots of fun.” You comply, and soon Avallala has been hit with the stun gun again. “Jump on in, human!”

“Don’t mind if I do,” you draw a confused look from Wokka, who is clearly not familiar with human slang, until you turn the tickle baton back on and place it on Avallala’s bare side. Seeing this, Wokka points her tickle gun at your host’s other side and turns it on, getting even more laughter out of Avallala. Meanwhile, both your free hand and Wokka’s are exploring around the front of Avallala’s midriff, tickling all the skin you can find.

“AHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAHAHAP!” Avallala pleads, but you are having far too much fun to allow that to happen. The tickling continues, focusing on the ticklee’s bare sides, you with the tickle baton and Wokka with the tickle gun.

Eventually, after around eight more minutes of this tickle torture, it is clear that Avallala is getting exhausted when the stun gun’s effects wear off. Now free to move, Avallala…
144321211111211.title: Tag-Teaming Avallala

choices: Her fingers stop moving, and she shrieks out in laughter
1443212111112111.content: Before you know what’s happening, Avallala’s fingers are tickling your stomach. Surprised, you jerk back and double over in laughter, “NOHOHOHOHOHO DOHOHOHOHOHONT!” Undeterred, Avallala goes after you, keeping her fingers tickling your belly. Your clothes do not offer any protection, as you had learned before, and pretty soon, you are on the ground, laughing hysterically. An evil smirk comes across Avallala’s face as she keeps tickling until…
1443212111112111.title: Avallala's Revenge

choices: Ask to head to the slave market
See something else you have a question about
14432121111121111.content:
Suddenly, Avallala’s fingers retract from your belly, and she stands up. “Well, human, that was certainly a fun detour,” she states. “However, unless you have any further questions, I believe that we should get going to the tickle slave market.”

You take Avallala’s hand and get up, and looking back at Wokka, you…
14432121111121111.title: Well, what now?

choices: “Oh, that’s fine. Come on in! Welcome, human!”
“Sorry, the human will need an ID, or she will have to enter in chains.”
144321211111211111.content:
“I think I’m ready to head to the slave market,” you announce. “I certainly wouldn’t want to miss out on anything there.”

“Then follow me, human,” Wokka and her team lead you and Avallala away from the ship. Before long, you approach what looks like a large coliseum, closed to the outside, but with open air inside. “This is where the tickle slave market is held, human.” You continue until you get to the entrance, where two Erimosi holding tickle guns are waiting.

“Thank you for coming; please show us your galactic ID to get in,” one of the Erimosi guards declares.

“We all have IDs,” Wokka points to the Erimosi in your group, “but this human is newly exploring, and she does not have an ID. Humans recently achieved spaceflight, and she is the first one to come to an Erimosi world. As part of her exploring, she was hoping to see an Erimosi tickle slave auction.”

The guard looks you over and tells Wokka,
144321211111211111.title: Heading to the Market

1443212111112111111.content:
“Well, since it is your first time on an Erimosi world, we do not want to get in the way of your exploring!” the Erimosi guard addresses you. “If you go to the ID station, you can get one for yourself, and you’ll be all set. An ID is required, but we can make an exception for a new race. We’re happy to have you here, human!”

“Thank you,” you respond, a little overwhelmed at the excitement of the Erimosi guard. They step aside, and Wokka and her team lead you in.

Immediately, you realize that the Erimosi guard’s reaction was not the overwhelming thing; the auction is. There are so many places inside, and so much going on. Several hundred (or thousand, there’s too many to count) Erimosi, with different species mixed in, fill the arena. Tickling is going on everywhere around you, and the aliens seem to be having a lot of fun. While you are amazed at the sight, Wokka and her team are all business, as they lead you to the aforementioned ID station. The head of your security addresses an Erimosi at the desk, “Hello, we’re here to get an ID for her. She is a human, and her species has just acquired spaceflight.”

“Alright,” the Erimosi at the desk looks at something similar to a computer. “Human? Name?”

You are still so amazed at the sight of the tickle slave market that you do not hear the Erimosi woman speak until you get a poke in the side from Avallala. “Human, I know this is a lot, but we need your name for the ID,” she states.

“Oh,” you snap back to reality. You give your name and how to spell it, and the Erimosi continues questioning Wokka for information on you.

Eventually, the ID Erimosi wonders, “So, where would you like <your name> to be sold?”

“Oh, no, the human is not being sold,” Wokka corrects her, prompting a confused look from the ID vendor. “She has not had the chance to get an ID yet, but she wanted to see an Erimosi tickle slave auction.”

With an expression that you cannot quite make out, the Erimosi ID vendor…
1443212111112111111.title: Welcome to the Market

choices: You found a slave that you wanted to buy
One of your Erimosi companions wanted to buy a tickle slave
14432121111121111111.content:
“Here you go, human,” the Erimosi vendor hands you your ID and Avallala pays her. “Have fun at the market!”

With that, you head out to explore the tickle slave market. Avallala begins to guide you through the different aliens that you are seeing along the way. Pointing to a feathered alien tickle slave who seems to love being tickled, she announces, “That’s an Ufu. They love tickling and being tickled. Their feathers tickle bare skin quite effectively, and they are very friendly.”

Next up was a fierce-looking wolf-like woman being tickle tortured by a snake-like creature. “That tickle slave is a Yathi. They’re warriors, and it’s not often that they get sold as tickle slaves. She’s probably been captured or made to submit, and now she’s being sold as a tickle slave. The alien tickling her is a Kichi. Be careful around them. They’ll lie and try to deceive you to get any advantage out of you. Also, their eyes can hypnotize several different kinds of species, which they use to their advantage frequently. You can look around them, but never look into those eyes. As you can see, they have tails, which are quite adept at tickling bellybuttons like yours.”

You passed by several more alien ticklers and tickle slaves, including several Erimosi, until…
14432121111121111111.title: Exploring the Market

144321211111211111111.content:
Avallala turns to you and asks you suddenly, “Human, would you like to have a tickle slave of your own? I would be able to procure one for you if you wish.” She says, noticing the way you’ve been looking over the various aliens being tickled at the market. “The standard contract is for one Erimosi standard year, which is plenty of time to get to know your companion and all of their tickle spots.”

“Um… can I really do that?” You ask in surprise, not expecting to be offered the chance to have someone at your beck and call to tickle as much as you want. It’s a strange but intriguing offer to say the least. You look over at some in the market that had caught your eye.

The first is that feathered Ufu. She is covered in a soft coat of white feathers that bristle as she’s tickled by two Erimosi playfully tickling her, one on either side. The Ufu woman is unrestrained, and seems to eagerly welcome the tickling. Whenever the Erimosi stop, the Ufu stretches out and invites them to start again after catching her breath. One is tickling under her arms, which are clamped down but still seem to be very ticklish, while the other has grabbed one of her ankles and is tickling the sole of her foot. The Ufu’s feathers brush against the underarm-tickling Erimosi and cause her to giggle, getting tickled even as she’s tickling. You think that it might be fun to tickle someone who loves being tickled that much, although those feathers might end up tickling you, too.

Then you look to the Yathi woman: tall, strong, and clearly ticklish. She’s trying her best not to laugh, holding her teeth together tightly and resisting as she’s tickled. A Kichi’s fingers roam over the wolf woman’s body, scritching over the short coat of brown fur for tickle spots underneath. She’s doing a good job of holding it in, but its obvious that it’s only a matter of time before she bursts. One of the Erimosi begin softly scratching at the firm abs just below her bellybutton, and the Yathi breaks, crumbling into snickering laughter as the tickles become too much to bear. She’d definitely be a challenge to tickle, but a fun one to get giggling if you can.

Finally, you notice a Kichi tickle slave further down. The snake woman is blindfolded to prevent her eyes from hypnotizing any of her ticklers, which also makes her even more vulnerable to the tickling. She can’t predict where the tickles come from, twitching and giggling in surprise as someone scritches her underarms or twirls around her navel.

“So, which one is your favorite, Human?” Avallala asks. “That Ufu you were looking at volunteered to be a tickle slave, she absolutely loves to be tickled. If you want her you should be prepared to tickle her often, or she’ll start getting frisky and start tickling you! The Yathi is serving a sentence for espionage, so she needs to be a tickle slave for some time. She’s a difficult one, but it is fun to make such a strong warrior weak from tickles! And finally there is that Kichi… beautiful and very ticklish, but you must be careful not to take off that blindfold and let her hypnotize you, or you might end up being the ticklee!”

Which one is your choice?
144321211111211111111.title: You found a slave that you wanted to buy

choices: Someone tickles the Erimosi tickling you
145.content:
“When I got here, I noticed the feathers in the vases,” you declare to Avallala, taking the conversation off of your mission. “They are taller than any feathers on Earth. I was wondering where they come from and what they are used for. Am I out of place to ask this?”

“Of course not,” Avallala responds. “Like I said before, I enjoy finding what makes you humans interesting, and one of these things is your curiosity. The feathers came from my home planet. Where we live, the birds are quite a bit larger, and they shed feathers fairly often. We like to collect them for fun, so we brought some here. You said that you wanted to know what they were used for?”

“Yes,” you affirm, smiling. “I am very curious about it.”

“This will make more sense afterwards, but if you will allow, I am going to change into my normal clothes,” Avallala proclaims. “Will you excuse me for a minute?”

“Of course,” you reply, wanting to see what the Erimosi really looks like under the robes. She departs for a couple minutes and comes back, wearing nothing but a white bikini. When she gets back in, Avallala picks up a green feather and returns to her chair. “So, what are the feathers used for?”

“Tickling,” Avallala answers as she guides the feather over to you. Before you can ask her to not tickle you, the feather has reached your belly, and the Erimosi starts waving it back and forth.

“HAHAHA!” you laugh as you move your hands in to protect your stomach.

“Does someone have a ticklish tummy?” Avallala teases as a few more Erimosi walk in and grab feathers. You fight to get the feather away from your ticklish midriff, laughing hysterically and pleading for mercy.

When you finally are able to get the feather away from your belly, four more feathers come in and begin tickling your entire midsection. “NOHOHOHO!” you yell in ticklish laughter. “IHIHIT TIHIHICKLEHEHES!” Avallala’s feather returns soon, and you become a ticklish mess, going into a laying position on the couch to try and escape. However, this only opens you up more, and the Erimosi take advantage of your vulnerable situation to tickle you further. A couple of the aliens decide to come over to you with rope, and they tie your hands up above your head to the edge of the couch. With your entire upper body exposed, more feathers join the tickle session, targeting your armpits and ribs. “PLEHEHEHEHESE STAHAHAP! NOHOHOHOHO MOHOHORE TIHIHICKLIHIHING!” You beg hysterically for mercy, but your pleas fall on deaf ears, as the Erimosi continue to tickle without slowing down at all.

Eventually…
145.title: Feathers

info.description:
Hello and welcome to this sci-fi themed tickling interactive story! It features an intrepid human explorer, venturing into the unknown of outer space. But what you, brave explorer, are about to realize, is that the alien races you meet all have one thing in common: they're all interested in tickling you! Thankfully, most of the aliens you meet will also be quite ticklish themselves. So go and make first contact with these strange beings! Explore new worlds! And above all, find yourself in one ticklish situation after the other.

Rules:

-All story entries should have at least two substantive paragraphs of text. If you can't think of that much, maybe your idea needs a little work before adding it in. Also, please give some description to the tickling, and not just "hahahaha" laughter.

-This is a second-person story (as in: "you get in the spaceship"). Please try not to give yourself a name. Also, please keep the character gender neutral until having a gender is important to the story.

-If you do give the character a gender, please give a branch that allows for both male and female options.

-This story is focused on tickling in a sci-fi setting. While plenty of other things can happen, the focus of the interactive is tickling.

-That being said, this story is rated GC. Sex, sexual content, and romantic encounters are allowed and encouraged.

-Generally, I'm open to other kinds of things happening, especially if people are into that. One of the major alien races uses hypnosis. Want aliens that shrink or grow gigantic? Fine. (No vore, though).

-All that being said, I reserve the right to delete or edit any content I feel does not meet standards, exhibits poor writing, or takes the interactive in a direction I don't want it to. Hopefully I don't end up doing any of that.

-Anyone is allowed to add-on to anyone else's section. Feel free to move the story onward. That's what an interactive is for.

With all that out of the way, here's a helpful description of some of the alien races in the story so far:

Alien races:

Erimosi: Beautifully statuesque with jet black skin, the Erimosi are the ones who made first contact with humans, and the ones who gave them warp technology, artificial intelligence, and a host of other technology. Humanity owes them much. As one of the older races in the galaxy, the Erimosi vowed to protect the Solar System from the other alien races until humans could stand on their own.
         -View on tickling: The Erimosi have, with difficulty, restrained themselves from tickling humans. The have kept secret from humanity how much tickling occurs in the galaxy, until they can learn it on their own. But they would love to finally be able to tickle their human colleagues until they were weak and hysterical with laughter.

AI: The ship artificial intelligence is programmed to assist human exploration, and protect the new space-farers from harm.
         -View on tickling: An un-ticklish machine, the AI cannot fully understand tickling. But this makes it very curious about the phenomenon.

Ufu: Short and covered in soft white feathers on their limbs and back. A friendly and affectionate race.
         -View on tickling: Since they're covered in feathers, tickling comes effortlessly to the Ufu, just brushing against them is quite a ticklish sensation. The Ufu love to make others smile and laugh, and can sometimes get carried away in their quest to spread mirth.

Yathi: An aggressive warrrior race, tall and covered in short fur with pointed ears, almost werewolf-like in appearance
         -View on tickling: The Yathi use tickling to establish dominance and pack hierarchy. Those who submit must obey their superiors in the pack.

Kichi: A reptilian race with a long tail instead of legs. The Kichi are deceptive and cunning, and can hypnotize most sentients by making eye-contact. Protective eye-wear recommended when dealing with them.
         -View on tickling: The Kichi often tickle in order to coerce eye-contact. They also love to use it to test the effectiveness of their hypnosis.

Giglin: Four armed and red skinned, the Giglin are a mysterious people rumored to pursue hedonism and sensual pleasures above all else.
         -View on tickling: The Giglin are experts of physical pleasures and reactions, and are capable of sensually tickling others until they beg for more. Extreme caution is to be taken around the Giglin, those who are seduced by them seldom return.
